Container.name: 036_ta_mechanized_briefing
Container.situation: player's group leader assigns the first task and gives the order to attack the checkpoint.

Key.Original: ETA, thirty seconds.
Key.Chinese: 預計再30秒抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 预计到达时间，30秒。

Key.Original: Soon as we hit Point Delta, move up and take the checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 抵達"Delta"點以後就開始行動，佔領檢查哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们一到"德尔塔"点，就动手夺取检查站。

Key.Original: Brass check your weapon.
Key.Chinese: 注意開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查你们的武器。

Key.Original: Maintain dispersion and if you hear a loud crack, bury your head in the dirt.
Key.Chinese: 維持適當間距，如果聽見很大的劈啪聲，趕緊五體投地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持分散，如果你们听到一声爆响，就把头埋进土里。

Key.Original: Mavros - you, uh, you got any words of advice?
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"-你、呃，你有什麼建議嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"-你，嗯，你有什么建议吗?

Key.Original: It's the sound of someone trying to kill you.
Key.Chinese: 那是有人要殺你的聲音。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是有人想杀死你的声音。

Key.Original: Nine years prior to the 'East Wind' conflict, civil war rages through the Republic of Altis and Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 時間回到"東風"衝突爆發九年前，阿爾蒂斯與斯特拉蒂斯共和國內戰劇烈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在"东风"冲突的九年之前，内战正在阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国肆虐。

Key.Original: Beyond Hope
Key.Chinese: 毫無指望
Key.Chinesesimp: 毫无希望

Key.Original: Rebel forces were able to retake the convoy, forcing us to retreat!
Key.Chinese: 叛軍重新奪回了車隊，逼迫我們撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军已夺回车队，迫使我们撤退!

Key.Original: HUMANITARIAN CONVOY LOST
Key.Chinese: 人道救援車隊失守
Key.Chinesesimp: 失去人道主义车队

Key.Original: You successfully protected the convoy and friendly units attacking Galati. Great job, Mavros!
Key.Chinese: 您成功保護了車隊，以及攻擊加拉蒂的友軍。做得好啊，"馬夫羅斯"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功地保护了车队和攻击加拉蒂的友军。干得好，"马夫罗斯"!

Key.Original: CONVOY DEFENDED
Key.Chinese: 已守住車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护车队

Key.Original: Rebel forces were able to regain control of the checkpoint, forcing us to retreat!
Key.Chinese: 叛軍重新奪回了管制哨，逼迫我們撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军得以夺回对关卡的控制权，迫使我们撤退!

Key.Original: CHECKPOINT LOST
Key.Chinese: 管制哨失守
Key.Chinesesimp: 失去关卡

Key.Original: You successfully held your position and prevented rebel forces from entering Galati! Great job, Mavros!
Key.Chinese: 您成功守住岡位，並防止叛軍進入加拉蒂!做得好啊，"馬夫羅斯"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功地守住了阵地，阻止叛军进入加拉蒂。干得好，"马夫罗斯"!

Key.Original: ENEMY COUNTERATTACK DESTROYED
Key.Chinese: 已摧毀敵方反攻部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军反冲击被粉碎

Key.Original: Rebel forces inflicted too many casualties on our forces attacking the town.
Key.Chinese: 叛軍攻擊城鎮，造成我軍重大傷亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军给我们攻击城镇的部队造成了太多伤亡。

Key.Original: UNABLE TO SECURE GALATI
Key.Chinese: 無法肅清加拉蒂
Key.Chinesesimp: 无法夺取加拉蒂

Key.Original: You managed to capture Galati! Now the convoy can move freely to Abdera. Great job, Mavros!
Key.Chinese: 您設法佔領了加拉蒂!車隊現在可以自由前往阿布德拉了。做得好啊，"馬夫羅斯"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你设法夺取了加拉蒂!现在车队可以自由前往阿布德拉了。干得好，"马夫罗斯"!

Key.Original: GALATI SECURED
Key.Chinese: 已肅清加拉蒂
Key.Chinesesimp: 成功夺取加拉蒂

Key.Original: 30 Minutes Later...
Key.Chinesesimp: 30分钟之后...

Key.Original: 1 Hour Later...
Key.Chinese: 1小時後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 1小时之后...

Key.Original: Wait
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Stand by, rearm, and wait for further orders from Olympos.
Key.Chinese: 做好準備，重整武裝，等待"奧林波斯"的進一步指示。
Key.Chinesesimp: 待命，补充装备，等待"奥林波斯"的下一步命令。

Key.Original: Attack Galati (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 攻擊加拉蒂(支線)
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击加拉蒂(可选)

Key.Original: Support friendly forces as they attempt to capture the town of Galati.
Key.Chinese: 友軍試圖佔領加拉蒂城時，給予支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在友军试图夺取加拉蒂镇的时候提供支援。

Key.Original: Start Operation
Key.Chinese: 開始行動
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始行动

Key.Original: Signal to friendly units and commence the attack! (Press 0-8-1)
Key.Chinese: 對友軍打信號，發動攻擊!(按0-8-1)
Key.Chinesesimp: 向友军发出信号，开始进攻!(按0-8-1)

Key.Original: Prepare Ambush (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 準備突襲(支線)
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备伏击(可选)

Key.Original: Setup an ambush on the road to stop any quick reaction force from Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 在路上設下埋伏，阻止任何從西爾塔來襲的快速反應部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在路上设置伏击，阻止来自西尔塔的任何快速反应部队。

Key.Original: Provide cover for Hoplite and help them secure the humanitarian convoy.
Key.Chinese: 掩護"重步兵"，幫助他們保衛人道救援車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为"重步兵"提供掩护，帮助他们夺取人道主义车队。

Key.Original: Secure Convoy
Key.Chinese: 保衛車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取车队

Key.Original: Approach the humanitarian convoy and secure it.
Key.Chinese: 接近並保衛人道救援車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 接近人道主义车队并夺取它。

Key.Original: Clear Buildings
Key.Chinese: 掃蕩建築物
Key.Chinesesimp: 扫荡建筑物

Key.Original: Search the barricaded buildings and eliminate any defenders found.
Key.Chinese: 搜查被敵方盤據的建築，殲滅任何守軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜查设有路障的建筑物，消灭发现的任何守兵。

Key.Original: Rearm (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 重整武裝(支線)
Key.Chinesesimp: 补充装备(可选)

Key.Original: Rearm your APC at the ammo truck near the checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 彈藥卡車停在檢查哨附近，為裝甲運兵車重整武裝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在关卡附近的弹药运输车为你的装甲输送车补充弹药。

Key.Original: Join Falcon (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 加入"獵鷹"(支線)
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"猎鹰"(可选)

Key.Original: Assist British special forces and setup an ambush, providing accurate sniper fire to cover supporting elements.
Key.Chinese: 支援英國特種部隊並設下埋伏，以精準狙擊掩護支援部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 协助英国特种部队并设置伏击，提供精确狙击来掩护支援分队。

Key.Original: Join Centaur (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 加入"半人馬"(支線)
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"半人马"(可选)

Key.Original: Move with armored units and block possible reinforcements, attacking from the east.
Key.Chinese: 與裝甲部隊一同行動，阻止敵方增援從東邊來襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与装甲部队一道行动，阻挡可能从东面发起进攻的增援部队。

Key.Original: Join Hoplite (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 加入"重步兵"(支線)
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"重步兵"(可选)

Key.Original: Go with an infantry group and secure the convoy, before engaging the enemy in the streets of Galati.
Key.Chinese: 與步兵部隊一同行動，保衛車隊，而後在加拉蒂街上與敵方交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与步兵小组一道行动并夺取车队，随后在加拉蒂的街道上与敌军交战。

Key.Original: Capture Galati
Key.Chinese: 佔領加拉蒂
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取加拉蒂

Key.Original: Move with Hoplite and neutralize all enemy units in the town.
Key.Chinese: 與"重步兵"一同行動，殲滅城鎮中所有敵方部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"重步兵"一道行动，消灭镇里的所有敌军。

Key.Original: Defend Convoy
Key.Chinese: 守護車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 守护车队

Key.Original: Find a good firing position and defend the humanitarian convoy.
Key.Chinese: 找好不錯的攻擊位置，守護人道救援車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找一个良好的射击位置，保护人道主义车队。

Key.Original: Defend Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 守護管制哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 守护关卡

Key.Original: Drive back the rebel counterattack, do not let them pass the %2checkpoint%1!
Key.Chinese: 壓制叛軍的反攻，別讓敵人通過%2管制哨%1!
Key.Chinesesimp: 击退叛军的反攻，别让他们通过%2检查站%1!

Key.Original: Select Role
Key.Chinese: 選擇角色
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择角色

Key.Original: Individual groups are preparing for the mission. Join a squad and choose some appropriate gear.
Key.Chinese: 個人隊伍正在為任務做準備。加入分隊，選擇適合的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各小组正准备执行任务。加入一个班并选择适当的装备。

Key.Original: Select Loadout
Key.Chinese: 選擇加載武器
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择装备

Key.Original: Choose weapons and equipment, appropriate for long-range combat.
Key.Chinese: 選擇適合長距離攻擊的武器與裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择适合远程作战的武器和设备。

Key.Original: Choose weapons and equipment, appropriate for infantry and armored combat.
Key.Chinese: 選擇適合步兵與裝甲作戰的武器與裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择适合步兵和装甲部队作战的武器和设备。

Key.Original: Choose weapons and equipment, appropriate for infantry combat and urban operations.
Key.Chinese: 選擇適合步兵與城市作戰的武器和裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择适合步兵战和城市行动的武器和设备。

Key.Original: Capture Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 佔領管制哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取检查站

Key.Original: Move fast and overrun the enemy defending the checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 快速行動，擊潰管制哨的敵方守軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速移动，击溃守卫检查站的敌军。

Key.Original: Get on Quadbike
Key.Chinese: 騎上四輪機車
Key.Chinesesimp: 坐上四轮摩托

Key.Original: Get on one of the quadbikes, waiting to take Falcon to the AO.
Key.Chinese: 騎上要送"獵鷹"去任務區的四輪機車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坐上一辆四轮摩托，等待将"猎鹰"带到行动区域。

Key.Original: Get in APC
Key.Chinese: 進入裝甲運兵車
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入装甲输送车

Key.Original: Get in one of the Gorgon APCs, waiting to take Centaur to the AO.
Key.Chinese: 坐進要送"蛇髮女妖"去任務區的"半人馬"裝甲運兵車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坐上一辆"蛇发女妖"装甲输送车，等待将"半人马"带到行动区域。

Key.Original: Get in Vehicle
Key.Chinese: 進入載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入车辆

Key.Original: Get in one of the vehicles, waiting to take Hoplite to the AO.
Key.Chinese: 坐進要送"重步兵"去任務區的載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坐上一辆车，等待将"重步兵"带到行动区域。

Key.Original: Start Operation
Key.Chinese: 開始行動
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始行动

Key.Original: Mortar Strike
Key.Chinese: 迫擊砲攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 迫击炮打击

Key.Original: Falcon Squad
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"分隊
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"班

Key.Original: Centaur Squad
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"分隊
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马"班

Key.Original: Hoplite Squad
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"分隊
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"班

Key.Original: A humanitarian convoy must be rescued from rebel forces.
Key.Chinese: 必須從叛軍手中救出人道救援車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 必须从叛军手中救回一支人道主义车队。

Key.Original: Avenging Furies
Key.Chinese: 復仇怒火
Key.Chinesesimp: 复仇的烈焰

Key.Original: MISSION FAILED
Key.Chinese: 任務失敗
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务失败

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Join Falcon
Key.Chinese: 加入"獵鷹"
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"猎鹰"

Key.Original: Join Centaur
Key.Chinese: 加入"半人馬"
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"半人马"

Key.Original: Join Hoplite
Key.Chinese: 加入"重步兵"
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"重步兵"

Key.Original: A %2convoy%1 delivering life-saving aid to desperate civilians in %7Abdera%1 has been stopped at a rebel checkpoint near %3Galati%1. It's essential we intervene and get those vehicles to their destination.
Key.Chinese: 載著平民急需救命物資的%2車隊%1，在前往%7阿布德拉%1的路上被阻擋在%3加拉蒂%1附近的叛軍檢查哨。我們必須介入，並將車隊護送到目的地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一支向%7阿布德拉%1绝望的平民运送救援物资的%2车队%1被挡在%3加拉蒂%1附近的一个叛军检查站处。我们介入并让那些车辆到达目的地至关重要。

Key.Original:
%2Hoplite%1 - Ambush element.
%3Falcon%1 - Sniper team.
%4Centaur%1 - Mechanized infantry.
%5Medusa%1 - Ambush element.
%6Sparrowhawk%1 - Spotters.
%7Olympos%1 - Command.
Key.Chinese:
%2"重步兵"%1-突襲部隊。
%3"獵鷹"%1-狙擊隊伍。
%4"半人馬"%1-機械化步兵。
%5"美杜莎"%1-突襲部隊。
%6"雀鷹"k%1-偵查兵。
%7"奧林波斯"%1-指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2"重步兵"%1-伏击分队。
%3"猎鹰"%1-狙击小组。
%4"半人马"%1-机械化步兵。
%5"美杜莎"%1-伏击分队。
%6"雀鹰"%1-侦察员。
%7"奥林波斯"%1-指挥。

Key.Original: Our main task is to rescue the humanitarian %2convoy%1, ensuring it can drive straight through Galati to %3Abdera%1.
Key.Chinese: 我們的主要任務是拯救人道救援%2車隊%1，確保車隊直接從加拉蒂開往%3阿布德拉%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的主要任务是拯救人道主义%2车队%1，确保它可以径直驶过加拉蒂前往%3阿布德拉%1。

Key.Original:
1. %2Medusa%1 will attempt to seize the %3rebel outpost%1 north-west of %4Galati%1 and capture enemy artillery.
2. %5Falcon%1 will then find a suitable position and provide covering fire for %6Hoplite%1 while they approach the %7convoy%1.
3. Next, %6Hoplite%1 squad will assault %4Galati%1. %5Falcon%1 will simultaneously dig in and defend their position.
4.Meanwhile %8Centaur%1 will strike the %9checkpoint%1 and prevent any reinforcements attacking from the east.
Key.Chinese:
1. %2"美杜莎"%1試著佔領%4加拉蒂%1西北的%3叛軍哨站%1，並搶佔敵方火炮。
2. %5"獵鷹"%1尋找適合的地點，當%6"重步兵"%1接近%7車隊%1時提供火力掩護。
3. 接下來，%6"重步兵"%1分隊攻擊%4加拉蒂%1。%5"獵鷹"%1同時間開始堅守岡位。
4. %8"半人馬"%1同時間對%9管制哨%1展開攻擊，避免敵方增援從東方來襲。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. %2"美杜莎"%1将设法占领%4加拉蒂%1西北面的%3叛军哨所%1并夺取敌军火炮。
2. %5"猎鹰"%1随后将找到合适的位置，在%6"重步兵"%1接近%7车队%1时提供火力掩护。
3. 之后，%6"重步兵"%1班将攻击%4加拉蒂%1。%5"猎鹰"%1同时将巩固防守，守住他们的阵地。
4. 与此同时，%8"半人马"%1将攻击%9关卡%1，阻挡任何从东面攻击的增援部队。

Key.Original: Images of rebel forces
Key.Chinese: 叛軍的影像
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军图像

Key.Original: Attachments
Key.Chinese: 附件
Key.Chinesesimp: 附件

Key.Original: 11th May
Key.Chinese: 5月11日
Key.Chinesesimp: 5月11日

Container.name: 074_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_fired_c
Container.situation: provider is answering that shots were fired

Key.Original: Mavros. Shot. Get ready for impact. Out.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"。砲擊。即將命中目標。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"。开火。准备弹着。完毕。

Container.name: 073_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_fired_b
Container.situation: provider is answering that shots were fired

Key.Original: Olympos to Mavros. Shot. Medusa's firing for effect. Out.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"呼叫"馬夫羅斯"。砲擊。"美杜莎"執行效力射擊。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"呼叫"马夫罗斯"。射击。"美杜莎"正进行效力射击。完毕。

Container.name: 072_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_fired_a
Container.situation: provider is answering that shots were fired

Key.Original: Mavros. Shot. Ordnance is inbound. Out.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"。砲擊。砲彈已發射。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"。射击。已开炮。完毕。

Container.name: 071_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_request_c
Container.situation: player sends request for fire support.

Key.Original: Olympos, co-ordinates for fire support. They're coming to you.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，砲擊支援的坐標。我傳給你了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，提供火力支援坐标。正发给你。

Key.Original: Okay, Mavros... got them, wait.
Key.Chinese: 好，"馬夫羅斯"...收到，等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，"马夫罗斯"...收到了，稍等。

Container.name: 070_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_request_b
Container.situation: player sends request for fire support.

Key.Original: I've got target locations, Olympos.
Key.Chinese: 發現目標位置了，"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得到了目标位置，"奥林波斯"。

Key.Original: Transmitting now.
Key.Chinese: 現在傳坐標給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在传输。

Key.Original: Message received... more to follow.
Key.Chinese: 訊息收到...等我消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到...还有更多。

Container.name: 069_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_request_a
Container.situation: player sends request for fire support.

Key.Original: Olympos, it's Mavros.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"馬夫羅斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"马夫罗斯"。

Key.Original: Sending you co-ordinates for a fire mission.
Key.Chinese: 請求火力攻擊，我把坐標傳給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正向你发送射击任务的坐标。

Key.Original: Copy, relaying to Medusa.
Key.Chinese: 收到，轉達給"美杜莎"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，传达给"美杜莎"。

Container.name: 068_su_sniper_mechanized_artillery_in
Container.situation: hq informs the player that artillery support has become available.

Key.Original: Mavros, update.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，新消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，最新消息。

Key.Original: Medusa's captured those guns. They're on their last legs up there but think they can hold them.
Key.Chinese: "美杜莎"佔領了那些迫擊砲。他們受了嚴重損傷，但覺得還可以守住那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: "美杜莎"夺取了那些枪。他们已经损失惨重，不过觉得还能守住它们。

Key.Original: Fire support's on stand by... out.
Key.Chinese: 隨時提供砲擊支援...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 火力支援待命...完毕。

Container.name: 067_ta_sniper_no_stop
Container.situation: enemy reinforcements manage to get past the player's position. the mission end, unsuccessfully.

Key.Original: Olympos, Falcon, pull your lads out of there! Enemy reinforcements have broken through!
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"獵鷹"，叫你們的人撤退!敵人增援突破防線了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，"猎鹰"呼叫，把你的人撤出来!敌军增援部队突破了!

Key.Original: All units, disengage! The road from Syrta's open.
Key.Chinese: 各單位注意，脫離戰鬥!西爾塔那條路可以通行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有部队，停止开火!从西尔塔来的路通了。

Key.Original: Abort the mission - withdraw, we'll fall back towards Orino! Out.
Key.Chinese: 中止任務-撤退，我們退回奧里諾!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中止任务，撤退，我们将撤往奥里诺!完毕。

Container.name: 066_ta_sniper_no_stop_first
Container.situation: first group of enemy reinforcements manage to get past the player's position.

Key.Original: Hoplite, Falcon. Reinforcements are coming at you from the west, better shift a gear.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，這是"獵鷹"。敵方增援從西邊接近你們，準備迎戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，"猎鹰"呼叫。增援部队正从西面接近你们，最好准备一下。

Key.Original: Mavros, you just left us shit outta luck... this whole operation's on a knife-edge, now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 馬夫洛斯，你他媽害慘我們了...這次作戰快被你搞砸了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，你让我们别无选择了...整个行动正处于危险边缘。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, Falcon. Fuck. Okay, we'll try and hold them.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"獵鷹"。幹。好，我們會盡量擋下攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"猎鹰"。干。好吧，我们会设法拖住他们。

Container.name: 065_ta_infantry_galati
Container.situation: convoy is secured. hq order infantry to attack galati. to follow ta_mechanized_checkpoint_clear.

Key.Original: Hoplite, move up!
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，開始行動!
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，行动!

Key.Original: Storm Galati and finish this.
Key.Chinese: 對加拉蒂發動猛攻，結束掉這次任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击加拉蒂，结束这一切。

Key.Original: Freedom or death. Out.
Key.Chinese: 不自由，毋寧死。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自由或死亡。完毕。

Container.name: 064_eve_mechanized_strider_ai
Container.situation: an armored car belonging to the enemy is destroyed by centaur.

Key.Original: Yeah! Got him!
Key.Chinese: 哈!打中了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶!打中它了!

Key.Original: That Strider's history.
Key.Chinese: 那臺"挺進者"沒戲唱了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那辆"挺进者"已经完蛋了。

Container.name: 063_eve_mechanized_strider_player
Container.situation: an armored car belonging to the enemy is destroyed by the player.

Key.Original: Scratch one.
Key.Chinese: 幹掉一個了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干掉一个。

Container.name: 062_eve_mechanized_apc_hit_player
Container.situation: player's apc takes damage.

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼!

Container.name: 061_eve_mechanized_apc_immobile_player_out
Container.situation: player's apc is rendered immobile. centaur one is still alive. to follow eve_mechanized_apc_immobile_player.

Key.Original: I read you.
Key.Chinese: 我知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我收到了你的消息。

Key.Original: But that's not a pass, you ain't dead yet, continue on foot - out.
Key.Chinese: 但你們還活跳跳的呢，這不成藉口，步行繼續作戰...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可那不是借口，你还没死呢，徒步继续执行任务。完毕。

Key.Original: Centaur, our Gorgon's fucked, we gotta bail.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"，我們的"蛇髮女妖"裝甲運兵車掛了，我們得棄車了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马"，我们的"蛇发女妖"完蛋了，我们得弃车了。

Container.name: 060_eve_mechanized_apc_immobile_player
Container.situation: player's apc is rendered immobile.

Key.Original: Ah, fuck.
Key.Chinese: 呃，幹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，操。

Container.name: 059_eve_mechanized_apc_immobile_ai
Container.situation: mechanized infantry group leader's apc is rendered immobile.

Key.Original: Mav', we're immobile.
Key.Chinese: 馬夫'，我們動不了了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马夫'，我们抛锚了。

Key.Original: APC's worth more than we are, so gotta sit tight... can't risk it changing hands again.
Key.Chinese: 裝甲運兵車比我們重要多了，必須撐住...不能讓這車子又落到敵人手上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 装甲输送车比我们还值钱，所以我们得呆着不动...不能冒它再落到敌人手里的风险。

Key.Original: Yeah, any fucking excuse, Thanos...
Key.Chinese: 對，你他媽再找理由嘛，塔諾斯...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，任何该死的借口，塔诺斯...

Container.name: 058_eve_mechanized_leader_kia
Container.situation: mechanized infantry group leader's apc is destroyed.

Key.Original: Argh! Argh! Argh!
Key.Chinese: 呃!呃!呃!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊!啊!啊!

Key.Original: Thanos!
Key.Chinese: 塔諾斯!
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺斯!

Key.Original: Motherfuckers!
Key.Chinese: 這群王八!
Key.Chinesesimp: 王八蛋!

Key.Original: Olympos, this is Mavros. Centaur One is gone. Out.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"馬夫羅斯"。"半人馬"一分隊陣亡了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"马夫罗斯"。"半人马1"完了。完毕。

Container.name: 057_eve_mechanized_gunner_pos
Container.situation: player moves to the gunner's position of the apc.

Key.Original: Okay, move over...
Key.Chinese: 好，過來...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，挪开...

Container.name: 056_eve_mechanized_driver_pos
Container.situation: player moves to the driver's position of the apc.

Key.Original: Switching seats...
Key.Chinese: 換位子...
Key.Chinesesimp: 换座位...

Container.name: 055_eve_mechanized_aiming_remark_c
Container.situation: player makes a remark while he has an armored enemy unit in his sights.

Key.Original: Come on then, you son of a bitch...
Key.Chinese: 來啊，你這小雜種...
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么来吧，你们这些该死的...

Container.name: 054_eve_mechanized_aiming_remark_b
Container.situation: player makes a remark while he has an enemy in his sights.

Key.Original: Yeah!
Key.Chinese: 耶!
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶!

Container.name: 053_eve_mechanized_aiming_remark_a
Container.situation: player makes a remark while he has an enemy in his sights.

Key.Original: Get some!
Key.Chinese: 吃我一記!
Key.Chinesesimp: 尝尝我的厉害!

Container.name: 052_eve_mechanized_repaired_b
Container.situation: player repairs their damaged apc.

Key.Original: Okay, I'm getting the hang of this.
Key.Chinese: 好，我抓住訣竅了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，看来我开始开窍了。

Container.name: 051_eve_mechanized_repaired_a
Container.situation: player repairs their damaged apc.

Key.Original: That oughta do it.
Key.Chinese: 這樣應該就行了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样应该可以了。

Container.name: 050_eve_mechanized_repair_info
Container.situation: player's apc takes damage and group leader orders player to remove repair kit from storage and fix it.

Key.Original: I hear you. There should be a repair kit with you; reckon you can use it?
Key.Chinese: 我知道了。你應該有個維修工具組，我想你會用吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听到了。你那应该有一套修理工具，我想你会用吧?

Key.Original: Centaur Two to Centaur One.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"二分隊呼叫"半人馬"一分隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马2"呼叫"半人马1"。

Key.Original: This thing's falling apart, getting banged up pretty good here.
Key.Chinese: 這車子快解體了，破損得很嚴重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这东西要散架了，受损相当严重。

Key.Original: Maybe. I guess we'll see. Out.
Key.Chinese: 或許會。我們看著辦吧。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许吧。我想我们再看看吧。完毕。

Container.name: 049_eve_mechanized_rearm
Container.situation: player re-arms their apc.

Key.Original: That it...?
Key.Chinese: 就這樣...?

Key.Original: Alright, let's get her back in this fight.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，我們開車回去繼續作戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，我们让她回去参战。

Container.name: 048_ta_mechanized_fail
Container.situation: enemy reinforcements manage to get past the player's position. the mission ends, unsuccessfully.

Key.Original: The rebels are breaking through, we can't stop them!
Key.Chinese: 叛軍突破防線，我們擋不住了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军正在突破，我们没法阻挡他们!

Key.Original: Olympos, it's Mavros.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"馬夫羅斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"马夫罗斯"。

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干!

Key.Original: Hoplite, disengage! Retreat! You're compromised... enemy armor's coming from the east.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，脫離戰鬥!撤退!你們暴露了...敵方裝甲從東邊來襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，停止开火!撤退!你们有危险...敌军装甲车正从东面驶来。

Key.Original: Abort the mission!
Key.Chinese: 中止任務!
Key.Chinesesimp: 中止任务!

Key.Original: All callsigns pull back to Orino...
Key.Chinese: 各呼號撤退到奧里諾...
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号撤回奥里诺...

Container.name: 047_ta_mechanized_counterattack_defeated_player
Container.situation: player repels the enemy's counterattack, but takes heavy casualties. player is a lone survivor. mission ends successfully.

Key.Original: Olympos...
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"...
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"...

Key.Original: Mavros here.
Key.Chinese: 我是"馬夫羅斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"马夫罗斯"。

Key.Original: Centaur Two...
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"二分隊...

Key.Original: It's over, Captain, all enemy armor destroyed.
Key.Chinese: 都結束了，隊長，已經殲滅所有敵方裝甲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 结束了，上尉，已摧毁所有敌军装甲车。

Key.Original: Everybody's dead but me.
Key.Chinese: 整隊弟兄都陣亡了，除了我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 除了我，每个人都死了。

Key.Original: Understood, Centaur Two. CASEVAC is en route, hang in there.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"半人馬"二分隊。派出傷患後送直升機，你撐著點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"半人马2"。现在派出支援救援部队，坚持住。

Container.name: 046_ta_mechanized_counterattack_defeated_b
Container.situation: player repels the enemy's counterattack. mission ends successfully. centaur one is alive.

Key.Original: Centaur One to Olympos.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"一分隊呼叫"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马1"呼叫"奥林波斯"。

Key.Original: Captain, we've defeated the rebel's counterattack.
Key.Chinese: 隊長，我們擊潰叛軍的反攻了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉，我们击退了叛军的反攻。

Key.Original: That's some very welcome news, Centaur. Excellent job!
Key.Chinese: 這消息來得太好了，"半人馬"。表現非常精彩!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这消息真是太好了，"半人马"。干得好!

Container.name: 045_ta_mechanized_counterattack_defeated_a
Container.situation: player repels the enemy's counterattack. mission ends successfully.

Key.Original: Centaur Two to Olympos. Captain, we did it.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"二分隊呼叫"奧林波斯"。隊長，我們做到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马2"呼叫"奥林波斯"。上尉，我们做到了。

Key.Original: All enemy armored threats have been destroyed, over.
Key.Chinese: 已經摧毀所有敵方裝甲威脅，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已摧毁所有敌军装甲威胁，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Mavros...? That's some very welcome news. Good work.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"...?這消息來得太好了。幹得好。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"...?这消息真是太好了。干得好。

Container.name: 044_ta_mechanized_town_cleared
Container.situation: infantry group manages to clear the town with the help of player's apc.

Key.Original: Hoplite to Centaur Two.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"呼叫"半人馬"二分隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"呼叫"半人马2"。

Key.Original: Thanks for the support, we can take it from here. Over.
Key.Chinese: 感謝支援，接下來由我們處理吧。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 多谢支援，这里交给我们吧。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Roger, Hoplite - returning to Point Delta. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"重步兵"-返回"Delta"點。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"重步兵"-返回"德尔塔"点。完毕。

Container.name: 043_ta_mechanized_town_support
Container.situation: to precede eve_infantry_apc_support. player is given the optional objective by the mechanized squad's group leader to support the infantry group.

Key.Original: Centaur Two?
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"二分隊?
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马2"?

Key.Original: If you're confident you can make it back here, go and assist our forces attacking Galati - out.
Key.Chinese: 如果你有信心能及時趕回來，你可以去支援攻擊加拉蒂-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你相信你可以回到这儿，就去协助我军攻击加拉蒂-完毕。

Key.Original: Receiving, Centaur One.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"半人馬"一分隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在接收，"半人马1"。

Container.name: 042_ta_mechanized_defend_prepare
Container.situation: player is ordered to prepare for defence.

Key.Original: Group. Listen up!
Key.Chinese: 各位。聽著!
Key.Chinesesimp: 全队都有。听好了!

Key.Original: Olympos says it's imperative we sit here and defend this road.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"說了，我們必須待在這裡，把守這條路。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"说我们必须呆在这儿守住这条路。

Key.Original: Hoplite's counting on us - so don't let anything through.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"就指望我們了-絕對別讓任何東西通過。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"正指望着我们呢-所以别让任何东西通过。

Container.name: 041_ta_mechanized_apc_arrived
Container.situation: player is told he can re-arm from a nearby ammunition truck.

Key.Original: Centaur One to Centaur Two.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"一分隊呼叫"半人馬"二分隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马1"呼叫"半人马2"。

Key.Original: Mavros, if you wanna re-supply, looks like there's an ammo truck we can use. Over.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，如果你想重新補給，那裡好像有輛可用的彈藥卡車。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，如果你想补充装备，看来有辆弹药运输车我们可以用。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Centaur One, we might need that later, out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"半人馬"一分隊，我們等下可能會需要，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"半人马1"，我们过一阵子也许需要，完毕。

Container.name: 040_eve_mechanized_apc_arriving
Container.situation: player is given command over an apc.

Key.Original: Hey, Mav'.
Key.Chinese: 嗨，馬夫'。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，马夫'

Key.Original: Centaur Two have an empty seat. Can you take command?
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"二分隊還有一個空位。你能指揮嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马2"有个空位。你能接管吗?

Key.Original: No-one has!
Key.Chinese: 也沒人有啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 没人有!

Key.Original: The crew just need to know where to go and what to shoot at. Don't tell me you can't handle that - out.
Key.Chinese: 只要告訴隊員往哪去，開槍射誰就行了。別告訴我你連這點也搞不定-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 乘员只需要知道去哪儿，向哪射击。别告诉我你连这都应付不了。完毕。

Key.Original: Of an APC?
Key.Chinese: 指揮裝甲運兵車?
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆装甲输送车?

Key.Original: That's not a good idea, I've got no experience! Over.
Key.Chinese: 這不是個好主意吧，我沒經驗!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那可不是好主意，我没经验!完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 039_ta_mechanized_checkpoint_clear
Container.situation: player's group clears the enemy checkpoint.

Key.Original: Centaur to Olympos, we are at Point Delta. Over.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"呼叫"奧林波斯"，我們在"Delta"點。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马"呼叫"奥林波斯"，我们在"德尔塔"点。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Yeah... I don't think these fuckers knew what hit them.
Key.Chinese: 嗯...這些混帳應該還在雲裡霧裡呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊...我想这些混蛋不知道是什么击中了他们。

Key.Original: Something tells me they'll wanna reinstate that ceasefire now, over.
Key.Chinese: 我有預感，他們現在希望停火協議重新生效了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我有种感觉，他们现在会恢复那份停火协议，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Is the checkpoint secure?
Key.Chinese: 檢查哨安全了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查站安全了吗?

Key.Original: Copy that, Centaur. Try and contain yourself.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"半人馬"。試著控制自一下自己。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"半人马"。设法克制你自己。

Key.Original: Hold your position - another APC is on its way, out.
Key.Chinese: 堅守岡位-另一臺裝甲運兵車在路上了，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 守住阵地-另一辆装甲输送车正在路上，完毕。

Container.name: 038_ta_mechanized_battle_cry
Container.situation: commander of friendly apc issues a battle cry.

Key.Original: Forwards! For Altis... for the Free Republic!
Key.Chinese: 弟兄們上啊!為了阿爾蒂斯...為了自由共和國!
Key.Chinesesimp: 前进!为了阿尔蒂斯...为了自由共和国!

Container.name: 037_ta_mechanized_disembark
Container.situation: player is ordered to disembark from the apc and attack.

Key.Original: Let's go! Disembark! Everybody out!
Key.Chinese: 走吧!出發!大家下車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走吧!下车!所有人出去!

Container.name: 036_ta_mechanized_briefing
Container.situation: player's group leader assigns the first task and gives the order to attack the checkpoint.

Key.Original: ETA, thirty seconds.
Key.Chinese: 預計再30秒抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 预计到达时间，30秒。

Key.Original: Soon as we hit Point Delta, move up and take the checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 抵達"Delta"點以後就開始行動，佔領檢查哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们一到"德尔塔"点，就动手夺取检查站。

Key.Original: Brass check your weapon.
Key.Chinese: 注意開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查你们的武器。

Key.Original: Maintain dispersion and if you hear a loud crack, bury your head in the dirt.
Key.Chinese: 維持適當間距，如果聽見很大的劈啪聲，趕緊五體投地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持分散，如果你们听到一声爆响，就把头埋进土里。

Key.Original: It's the sound of someone trying to kill you.
Key.Chinese: 那是有人要殺你的聲音。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是有人想杀死你的声音。

Key.Original: Mavros - you, uh, you got any words of advice?
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"-你、呃，你有什麼建議嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"-你，嗯，你有什么建议吗?

Container.name: 035_ta_mechanized_selected
Container.situation: player joins mechanized infantry unit.

Key.Original: That a 'yes'?
Key.Chinese: 你意思是"好"?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么你同意了?

Key.Original: Good! Choose some gear and, uh, get inside an APC.
Key.Chinese: 太好了!挑選裝備然後，呃，坐上裝甲運兵車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好!选择一些装备，并坐进一辆装甲输送车。

Key.Original: Don't scratch my paintwork!
Key.Chinese: 別刮傷板金!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别刮坏了我的车漆!

Container.name: 034_ta_infantry_town_clear
Container.situation: infantry group contacts hq to report mission success. mission ends. also to follow ta_mechanized_counterattack_defeated_a, ta_mechanized_counterattack_defeated_b, and ta_mechanized_counterattack_defeated_player

Key.Original: Olympos, this is Hoplite. The convoy's safe and the town is ours, over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"重步兵"。車隊很安全，城鎮也在掌握內，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"重步兵"。车队安全，城镇是我们的了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Impressive work, Hoplite! All callsigns, primary objectives complete!
Key.Chinese: 令人印象深刻，"重步兵"!各呼號注意，已經達成主要目標了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，"重步兵"!全体呼号，主要目标完成!

Key.Original: Let's get those supplies to Abdera! Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們把補給品送去阿布德拉!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们去把那些补给品送到阿布德拉!完毕。

Container.name: 033_ta_infantry_buildings_cleared_b
Container.situation: player contacts infantry group to confirm that all buildings have been cleared. rest of town is not clear.

Key.Original: Understood, Mavros, thanks for your support...
Key.Chinese: 了解，"馬夫羅斯"，感謝支援...
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"马夫罗斯"，多谢你的支持...

Key.Original: Hoplite, all buildings secure.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，建築都很安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，所有建筑安全。

Key.Original: I'll help you cleanup any remaining resistance.
Key.Chinese: 我會幫你處理掉剩下的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会帮助你清除任何残余的抵抗。

Container.name: 032_ta_infantry_buildings_cleared
Container.situation: player contacts infantry group to confirm that all buildings have been cleared.

Key.Original: Understood, Mavros, thanks for your support...
Key.Chinese: 了解，"馬夫羅斯"，感謝支援...
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"马夫罗斯"，多谢你的支持...

Key.Original: Hoplite, I'm gonna call it.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，我這裡告一段落了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，我想今天到此为止吧。

Key.Original: This shithole is secure... relay to higher, over.
Key.Chinese: 這個鬼地方很安全...正轉達給上級，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个鬼地方安全了...转告给更高层，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 031_ta_infantry_buildings
Container.situation: infantry group orders player's group to clear buildings.

Key.Original: Mavros - you still with us?
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"-你還在嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"-你还在吗?

Key.Original: Search bodies for grenades and help clear these buildings, out.
Key.Chinese: 翻屍體找出手榴彈，幫忙肅清這些建築，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜查尸体，看看有没有手榴弹能用来清理这些建筑，完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。

Container.name: 030_eve_infantry_apc_destroyed
Container.situation: friendly apc is destroyed.

Key.Original: Olympos, it's Hoplite - Centaur Two are gone! Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"重步兵"-"半人馬"二分隊陣亡了!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"重步兵"-"半人马2"完了!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, try and regain control of the situation, Hoplite. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，試著把情勢控制下來，"重步兵"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，设法重新掌控局势，"重步兵"。完毕。

Container.name: 029_eve_infantry_apc_depart
Container.situation: mechanized group recall apc, as they are under attack.

Key.Original: Centaur One to Centaur Two, time to regroup - rebels are advancing west from Athira. Out.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"一分隊呼叫"半人馬"二分隊，該回來整隊了-叛軍從Athira西邊來襲。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马1"呼叫"半人马2"，该重新集结了-叛军正从阿西拉往西前进。完毕。

Container.name: 028_eve_infantry_apc_support
Container.situation: mechanized group sends apc to help infantry group.

Key.Original: Centaur to Hoplite, I reckon we can spare an APC.
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"呼叫"重步兵"，我們可以挪出一臺裝甲運兵車。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马"呼叫"重步兵"，我想我们可以匀出一辆装甲输送车。

Key.Original: You interested? Over.
Key.Chinese: 有興趣嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你感兴趣吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Centaur Two is diverting to assist, you're welcome - out.
Key.Chinese: 轉調"半人馬"二分隊支援你們，不客氣-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马2"正改道来协助你，不用客气-完毕。

Key.Original: It's something for us to get behind at least. Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 總算有點能利用的東西了。嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它至少能帮我们挡挡子弹。好啊。

Container.name: 027_eve_infantry_sniper_covered
Container.situation: british special forces informs infantry that they have them covered.

Key.Original: Falcon to Hoplite. Proceed. We have your back.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"呼叫"重步兵"。繼續任務。我們從後方掩護你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"呼叫"重步兵"。继续行动。我们会支援你。

Key.Original: Good to know. Just be sure to check your targets.
Key.Chinese: 那就好。開火前一定要注意目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息。只是千万要看好你的目标。

Key.Original: Those paramilitary groups, they can look a lot like us. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這些準軍事部隊的穿著打扮，有時和我們非常相像。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些准军事组织，他们看上去挺象我们。完毕。

Container.name: 026_eve_infantry_patrol
Container.situation: player orders his squad to engage the enemy.

Key.Original: Take them out!
Key.Chinese: 收拾他們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干掉他们!

Container.name: 025_ta_infantry_briefing
Container.situation: player is joined by a small group who do not wish to follow any other squad leader. player reiterates the first objective to his comrades.

Key.Original: Mavros...
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"...
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"...

Key.Original: Can we go with you?
Key.Chinese: 我們能跟著你嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们可以和你一起去吗?

Key.Original: No way.
Key.Chinese: 不可能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没门。

Key.Original: Fuck off back to your group.
Key.Chinese: 滾開，回去你們的隊上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 滚回你们的小队去。

Key.Original: Christ...
Key.Chinese: 天啊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊...

Key.Original: Do what I say when I say it then.
Key.Chinese: 那就照我說的做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么照我说的做吧。

Container.name: 024_ta_infantry_selected
Container.situation: player joins infantry unit.

Key.Original: Glad to hear it.
Key.Chinese: 真是個好消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴听你这么说。

Key.Original: Go get any weapons or equipment you might need, then jump in the offroad behind me.
Key.Chinese: 帶著需要的武器或裝備，好了就坐上我後面那臺越野車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去拿你可能需要的任何武器或装备，再坐进越野车跟上我。

Key.Original: Alright, I'm in.
Key.Chinese: 好，我加入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，算我一个。

Container.name: 023_eve_sniper_reinforcements_moving
Container.situation: british special forces warn sniper group that a counterattack has begun.

Key.Original: Falcon - movement. Rebel forces are leaving Syrta.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"-有動靜。叛軍正要離開西爾塔。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"-有动静。叛军正在离开西尔塔。

Container.name: 022_ta_sniper_won
Container.situation: player informs hq that the counterattack has been repelled. the mission ends.

Key.Original: Attaboy, Mavros.
Key.Chinese: 太棒了，"馬夫羅斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好样的，"马夫罗斯"。

Key.Original: Olympos - enemy reinforcements have been eliminated, we're RTB. Put the kettle on. Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"-已經殲滅敵方援軍了，我們正要返回基地。危機暫時解除。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"-已消灭敌军增援部队，我们将返回基地。烧好水。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Falcon, I think we're in the clear, over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們這裡安全了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我想我们安全了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Excellent work, Falcon! Both Galati and the humanitarian aid are in our hands.
Key.Chinese: 非常精彩，"獵鷹"!加拉蒂和人道救援物資現在都在我軍的掌握中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，"猎鹰"!加拉蒂和人道主义救援物资都在我们手里了。

Key.Original: This changes everything. Out.
Key.Chinese: 戰局徹底不同了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这改变了一切。完毕。

Container.name: 021_ta_sniper_convoy_secured
Container.situation: british special forces prepare for a counterattack. they tell the player to re-arm, find at weapons, and move to the next map marker.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Sparrowhawk - keep an eye on it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"雀鷹"-繼續盯著。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"雀鹰"-继续盯着。完毕。

Key.Original: Olympos? You get that?
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"?你聽見嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"?你明白了吗?

Key.Original: Sparrowhawk to Falcon.
Key.Chinese: "雀鷹"呼叫"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "雀鹰"呼叫"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: It's all kicking off over here. Got army regulars mounting up on trucks and - ah. Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 這裡的敵人都出動了。部隊正在搭上卡車和-呃。嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有情况。发现坐在卡车上的正规军，还有-啊。

Key.Original: An infantry fighting vehicle. Over.
Key.Chinese: 裝步戰車。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆步兵战车。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Mavros, listen.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，聽我說。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，听着。

Key.Original: Search for mines, launchers, anything that might help slow these fuckers down.
Key.Chinese: 去找地雷、發射器，任何能牽制這些渾球的東西都行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找找地雷、发射器，任何可能帮助我们拖住这些混蛋的东西。

Key.Original: Just like before, they'll be coming from the west.
Key.Chinese: 和之前一樣，敵人會從西邊來襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 和之前一样，他们将从西面来。

Key.Original: If they get past us, we'll lose the convoy... out.
Key.Chinese: 要是敵人突破我軍防線，車隊就失守了...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们没拦住他们，我们将失去车队...完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Falcon... anything you can do to stop them? Over.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，"獵鷹"...你有什麼方法阻止嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，"猎鹰"...你能做些什么阻止他们吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Falcon, come in? Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，請回答?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，请回答?完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 020_ta_infantry_convoy_secured
Container.situation: infantry units take control of a humanitarian aid convoy and informs hq. hq says to wait, re-arm, re-group.

Key.Original: Olympos, it's Hoplite - do you read me? Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"獵鷹"-你收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"重步兵"-你收到了吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: We're at the convoy.
Key.Chinese: 我們到了車隊這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们到了车队这边。

Key.Original: Much appreciated, Olympos - waiting on your signal. Out.
Key.Chinese: 感謝，"奧林波斯"-等你信號。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常感谢，"奥林波斯"-等待你的信号。完毕。

Key.Original: Five by five, Hoplite - what's your message?
Key.Chinese: 很清楚，"重步兵"-有什麼消息?
Key.Chinesesimp: 信号良好，"重步兵"-你有什么消息?

Key.Original: Great job, Hoplite! Stand by, we'll converge on Galati shortly.
Key.Chinese: 做得好，"重步兵"!做好準備，我們隨後就要去Galati會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，"重步兵"!待命，我们很快会在加拉蒂集合。

Key.Original: Take this time to rearm and regroup.
Key.Chinese: 利用時間整裝、整隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用这段时间补充装备并集结。

Key.Original: Siskos and some others are on their way to assist. Over.
Key.Chinese: 西斯克斯和其他部隊正趕來支援。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 西斯克斯和其他一些人正在来帮忙的路上。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 019_inf_hq_orders_attack
Container.situation: hq orders all forces to attack.

Key.Original: All callsigns, immediate execute on your objectives!
Key.Chinese: 各呼號注意，立刻執行各自的目標!
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号，立即执行你们的目标!

Container.name: 018_ta_attack_started_forced
Container.situation: operation begins under imperfect circumstances. to follow immediately after ta_attack_started_a, ta_attack_started_b, and ta_attack_started_c.

Key.Original: Olympos, Falcon - begin the attack!
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"獵鷹"-開始攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，"猎鹰"呼叫-开始进攻!

Container.name: 017_ta_attack_started_d_b
Container.situation: after being informed that the player is ready, british special forces let hq know they can give a greenlight. operation begins.

Key.Original: Olympos, this is Falcon - we're all good here.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"獵鷹"-這裡都安頓好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"猎鹰"-我们这都准备好了。

Key.Original: Go ahead and make some noise. Over.
Key.Chinese: 可以開始攻擊了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 行动吧，去搞些声音出来。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 016_ta_attack_started_d_a
Container.situation: player has prepared the ambush. they contact british special forces to inform them that everything is set.

Key.Original: Expertly done, Mavros, wait one.
Key.Chinese: 幹得非常好，"馬夫羅斯"，等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，"马夫罗斯"。等一下。

Key.Original: Falcon... everything's in place.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"...都準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"...一切准备就绪。

Container.name: 015_ta_attack_started_c
Container.situation: player attacks convoy without placing charges. operation begins.

Key.Original: Mavros... what the hell? I hope you can fucking improvise!
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"...你在搞什麼鬼?你他媽給我腦筋靈光點!
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"...究竟怎么回事?我希望你他妈的想想办法!

Container.name: 014_ta_attack_started_b
Container.situation: the enemy is made aware of the player but they've placed the explosives. operation begins.

Key.Original: Mavros, get into cover... watch out for that QRF!
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，去找掩護...小心快速反應部隊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，找个掩体...留神快速反应部队!

Key.Original: Ah, fuck it!
Key.Chinese: 呃，媽的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，他妈的!

Container.name: 013_ta_attack_started_a
Container.situation: the enemy is made aware of the player and they haven't had a chance to place the explosives. they are caught in the act, unprepared. operation begins.

Key.Original: Damn it, Mavros!
Key.Chinese: 可惡，"馬夫羅斯"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼，"马夫罗斯"!

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕!

Container.name: 012_eve_sniper_qrf_move_ambush_not_set
Container.situation: player has not placed explosives and enemy reinforcements are on the move. to immediately follow eve_sniper_qrf_ambush_set.

Key.Original: Jesus H. Christ, what the fuck have you been doing over there?
Key.Chinese: 老天，這段時間你在那裡繡花啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪，你他妈的在那儿干嘛?

Key.Original: Okay... it's too late now, put some rounds down range when you got eyes on. Falcon, out.
Key.Chinese: 嘖...現在已經來不及了，看見敵人就直接攻擊。"獵鷹"結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...现在太迟了，在你看到的时候打几枪。"猎鹰"，完毕。

Key.Original: Just a second, Falcon!
Key.Chinese: 等一下，"獵鷹"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 等一下，"猎鹰"!

Key.Original: I need a chance to place them!
Key.Chinese: 給我點時間放炸彈!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得找机会安炸药!

Container.name: 011_eve_sniper_qrf_move_ambush_set
Container.situation: british special forces inform the player that enemy reinforcements are on the move. player has placed explosives.

Key.Original: Copy that, Sparrowhawk. Sounds like a cakewalk. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"雀鷹"。聽起來是小事一樁。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"雀鹰"。听起来小事一桩。完毕。

Key.Original: Mavros, you catch that?
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，你聽見了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，你明白了吗?

Key.Original: Head's up, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 先提醒你，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意，"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: That QRF of yours is on the move... one offroad, one truck.
Key.Chinese: 你那邊的快速反應部隊開始行動了...一臺越野車，一臺卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的那个快速反应部队正在移动...一辆越野车，一辆卡车。

Key.Original: Paramilitatries, by the look of it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 從外表看，像是準軍事部隊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看样子是准军事部队。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Good... get ready to detonate those charges.
Key.Chinese: 好...準備引爆炸彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好...准备启爆那些炸药。

Key.Original: Affirmative.
Key.Chinese: 肯定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Container.name: 010_ta_sniper_planted
Container.situation: player sets explosives for the ambush and is ordered to return to an observation post.

Key.Original: Received - so far so good.
Key.Chinese: 收到-狀況很順利。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到-到目前为止一切顺利。

Key.Original: See if you can get somewhere with a decent line of sight.
Key.Chinese: 你去找個視野比較好的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看看你能不能找到一个视线好的地方。

Key.Original: Falcon, charges set. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，炸藥安裝好了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，炸药已设好。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Falcon...?
Let us know as soon as you're set.
Key.Chinese: 到定位以後通知我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你一设好就告诉我们。

Container.name: 009_ta_sniper_briefing
Container.situation: british special forces give their orders to the player. player is tasked with setting up an ambush.

Key.Original: Olympos. This is Falcon.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"。這是"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"。这里是"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: In position above Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 在西爾塔上方就定位了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在西尔塔上方就位。

Key.Original: Relax, nothing's getting through...
Key.Chinese: 別緊張，不會讓任何人突破這裡的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 别紧张，不会让任何人突破的...

Key.Original: Mavros, you copy?
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，你收到了吗?

Key.Original: Roger, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: Don't let anything past. Over.
Key.Chinese: 別讓任何東西通過。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别让任何东西通过。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Plan...?
No idea, mate, we make this shit up as we go along...
Key.Chinese: 沒有，老兄，我們只是照著做，亂掰說有計畫...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不知道，伙计，我们随机应变吧...

Key.Original: Take your explosives. Setup charges on the road.
Key.Chinese: 你帶著炸藥去路上裝設。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带上炸药。在路上设置炸弹。

Key.Original: Don't get bounced.
Key.Chinese: 小心別被敵人發現。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别被人发现。

Key.Original: I'm here, Falcon, what's your plan?
Key.Chinese: 我在，"獵鷹"，有什麼計畫嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在这，"猎鹰"，你有什么计划?

Key.Original: Right now, we've got the element of surprise.
Key.Chinese: 我們要給敵人一個大大的驚喜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们可以打他们个出其不意。

Key.Original: Yeah...?
Let's try and keep it.
Key.Chinese: 得先盡量保持神秘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们试试吧。

Key.Original: What...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么鬼...?

Container.name: 008_eve_sniper_selected
Container.situation: player joins sniper unit.

Key.Original: Alright.
Key.Chinese: 好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。

Key.Original: Grab any kit you'll need and hop on a quad bike.
Key.Chinese: 帶好必要的裝備，坐上四輪摩托車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去拿你需要的任何装备，坐上四轮摩托车。

Container.name: 007_eve_mechanized_invite
Container.situation: player is invited to join mechanized unit.

Key.Original: Mav'.
Key.Chinese: 馬夫'
Key.Chinesesimp: 马夫'

Key.Original: You coming?
Key.Chinese: 你要來嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要来吗?

Key.Original: Depends... you driving?
Key.Chinese: 看情況...你開車?
Key.Chinesesimp: 要看情况...你开车吗?

Key.Original: Okay - then I'll think about it.
Key.Chinese: 好-那我就考慮一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧-那我考虑一下。

Container.name: 006_eve_infantry_invite_c
Container.situation: player is invited to join infantry unit. to follow immediately after eve_infantry_invite_a or eve_infantry_invite_b.

Key.Original: Join up with us, we need to make up our numbers after Orino.
Key.Chinese: 加入我們吧，補齊在奧里諾折損的人手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入我们吧，在奥里诺之后我们急需人手。

Container.name: 005_eve_infantry_invite_b
Container.situation: player is invited to join infantry unit and is reminded of the rescued captives. to follow immediately after eve_infantry_invite_a.

Key.Original: Heard you rescued some of the guys.
Key.Chinese: 聽說你救了一些弟兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听说你救了一些人。

Container.name: 004_eve_infantry_invite_a
Container.situation: player is invited to join infantry unit.

Key.Original: Hey!
Key.Chinese: 喂!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨!

Key.Original: Mavros!
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"!
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"!

Container.name: 003_eve_sniper_invite
Container.situation: player is invited to join sniper unit.

Key.Original: Oi. Hold up, you're ex-army, right?
Key.Chinese: 喂。等等，你之前隸屬政府軍，對吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 噢。等等，你当过兵，对吗?

Key.Original: No, not for us it isn't.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題，不管你是不是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，对我们来说不是。

Key.Original: I'm told you were, uh, part of some special unit.
Key.Chinese: 我聽說你曾經，呃，是特種部隊的成員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听说你是，呃，某个特种部队的成员。

Key.Original: That some kinda problem?
Key.Chinese: 是，有什麼問題嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那有问题吗?

Key.Original: Yeah, well... we're stepping-off at fifteen hundred.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，呃...我們么伍洞洞就出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好吧...我们15:00出发。

Key.Original: Come with us if you want. Could use your particular skillset.
Key.Chinese: 有興趣就跟著來吧。你的特殊技能應該能派上用場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你愿意，和我们一起来吧。你的特殊技能也许能派上用场。

Key.Original: You're well-informed, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 你消息很靈通啊，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的消息真灵通，中士。

Container.name: 002_ta_introduction
Container.situation: player speaks to his commanding officer and is told to choose a mission role.

Key.Original: Fuck you. I'll sleep when I'm dead.
Key.Chinese: 幹你媽的。我死了愛怎麼睡都行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去你的。我死了就能好好睡了。

Key.Original: Mavros, switch off.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，你去休息。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，休息一下。

Key.Original: That's an order - you haven't slept for days.
Key.Chinese: 這是命令-你有幾天沒休息了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是命令-你几天没睡了。

Key.Original: Okay. Better see if anyone will let you tag along then.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。去看看有沒有哪隊願意讓你跟著吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。那最好看看有没人愿意让你跟着。

Container.name: 001_am_briefing
Container.situation: animated briefing with map and strategic information. visual breakdown of objectives.

Key.Original: Brothers... we just got word.
Key.Chinese: 弟兄們聽著...我們剛收到消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 兄弟们...我们刚收到消息。

Key.Original: There's been an unexpected development, here, on the road from Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 出了件意外，在這裡，就在西爾塔外的道路上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 发生了一件意外事件，在这儿，从西尔塔来的路上。

Key.Original: Sparrowhawk, on this elevated position here, above the town, will be observing as spotters.
Key.Chinese: "雀鷹"駐守在城鎮上方的高處，這裡，負責偵查。
Key.Chinesesimp: "雀鹰"，将在这个俯瞰城镇的高处，作为侦察员观察情况。

Key.Original: Obviously, armor from Athira is our main concern - any unopposed attack from this direction could result in catastrophe.
Key.Chinese: 主要問題顯然在於阿西拉的敵方裝甲-要是坐視敵人從那裡攻來，我軍絕對傷亡慘重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然，来自阿西拉的装甲部队是我们担心的主要对象-从这个方向来的任何攻击如果没有遭到抵抗，会导致灾难性后果。

Key.Original: A convoy moving humanitarian aid to Abdera has been detained at a rebel checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 有支載著人道救援物資的車隊，在前往阿布德拉的路上被扣押在叛軍檢查哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一支将人道主义救援物资送往阿布德拉的车队被扣押在叛军的一个关卡。

Key.Original: It seems the town is being punished collectively for its support of our cause.
Key.Chinese: 看來該城因為支持我們，而被連帶懲罰了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来整个城镇因为支持我们的事业而受到了惩罚。

Key.Original: Needless to say, we must respond...
Key.Chinese: 不用我說你們也知道，我們必須回以顏色...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不用说，我们必须做出回应...

Key.Original: The Free Republic cannot stand idly by on this!
Key.Chinese: 自由共和國不會袖手旁觀!
Key.Chinesesimp: 自由共和国不能对此袖手旁观!

Key.Original: So... our plan... first, we have to reach that convoy.
Key.Chinese: 所以...我們的計畫是...首先，接觸車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以...我们的计划...首先，我们得接近那支车队。

Key.Original: Hoplite, located here, will advance and try to capture it.
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，從這裡推進，試著佔領。
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，在这儿，将动身前往，设法夺取它。

Key.Original: Meanwhile, Falcon, here, will prepare an ambush on the road, stopping any reinforcements leaving Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 同一時間，"獵鷹"在這裡的路上設下埋伏，阻止任何來自西爾塔的增援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同时，"猎鹰"，在这儿，将在路上准备一次伏击，阻止离开西尔塔的任何增援部队。

Key.Original: They will also harass the enemy and cover Hoplite by providing accurate sniper fire.
Key.Chinese: 同時負責騷擾敵方，用精準狙擊掩護"重步兵"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们还将进行精确狙击，借此骚扰敌人，掩护"重步兵"。

Key.Original: Therefore, armored units, here, led by Centaur, will overrun this depot and setup a defensive line to cover our assault.
Key.Chinese: 所以，由"半人馬"帶領的裝甲部隊，必須擊潰這座儲藏庫，並拉起防線，掩護主要攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，由"半人马"带队的装甲单位将从这儿占领这个仓库，设置一道防线，掩护我们的进攻。

Key.Original: To the north, Medusa will raid this FOB and take control of the mortars based there.
Key.Chinese: 北邊有"美杜莎"劫掠這處前進作戰基地，把迫擊炮搶過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在北面，"美杜莎"将突袭这个前沿作战基地，控制驻扎在那里的迫击炮。

Key.Original: Once done, Hoplite can continue and liberate Galati.
Key.Chinese: 一切就緒後，"重步兵"就能繼續攻擊，解放Galati。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个一搞定，"重步兵"可以继续进攻，解放加拉蒂。

Key.Original: Okay, good luck. Let's get all this in motion - dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 好，祝好運。我們就照這樣進行吧-解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，祝你们好运。大家行动吧-解散。

Key.Original: You were able to provide pivotal support ahead of the main offensive, ensuring its success - excellent work!
Key.Chinese: 你在主要作戰前的卓越貢獻，確保了作戰成功-表現非常優秀!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你能够在主攻之前提供关键支援，确保了它的成功-干得漂亮!

Key.Original: ORINO SECURE
Key.Chinese: 奧里諾肅清完成
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥里诺安全

Key.Original: YOU KILLED TOO MANY CIVILIANS
Key.Chinese: 你殺死太多平民了
Key.Chinesesimp: 你杀害了太多平民

Key.Original: The enemy were able to repulse our attack, forcing us to retreat!
Key.Chinese: 敵人擋下了我們的攻擊，逼迫我們撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军得以击退我们的进攻，迫使我们撤退!

Key.Original: OFFENSIVE FAILED
Key.Chinese: 攻擊失敗
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击失败

Key.Original: Support Main Assault
Key.Chinese: 支援主要作戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援主攻人员

Key.Original: Join other groups in the offensive and seize Orino.
Key.Chinese: 加入其他隊伍，攻擊並佔領奧里諾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与其他小组一道进攻，夺取奥里诺。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Our forces have taken unacceptable losses! Fall back to the %2staging area%1 now!
Key.Chinese: 我方部隊受到無可容忍的重大傷亡!立刻退回%2轉運區%1!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的军队遭受了无法接受的损失!立即撤回%2集结区%1!

Key.Original: Choose Loadout
Key.Chinese: 選擇加載武器
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择装备

Key.Original: Select your weapons and equipment for the mission.
Key.Chinese: 選擇任務要用的武器和裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择你执行任务需要的武器和装备。

Key.Original: Help Survivor
Key.Chinese: 幫助生還者
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助幸存者

Key.Original: Escort the survivor to a safe location.
Key.Chinese: 護送生還者到安全的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送幸存者前往安全地点。

Key.Original: Destroy APC
Key.Chinese: 摧毀裝甲運兵車
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁装甲输送车

Key.Original: ****TO TRANSLATE****
Defend Orino
Key.Chinese: 守護奧里諾
Key.Chinesesimp: 守卫奥里诺

Key.Original: Assist other elements in the defense of the town.
Key.Chinese: 支援其他部隊守護城鎮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 协助其他小队守卫城镇。

Key.Original: Clear strongpoint
Key.Chinese: 掃蕩據點
Key.Chinesesimp: 清除战略据点

Key.Original: ****TO TRANSLATE****
Search for Captives
Key.Chinese: 搜查戰俘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻俘虏

Key.Original: The survivor from Spartan believes other members of the squad were taken captive. Try and find them.
Key.Chinese: "斯巴達人"隊的生還者認為其他隊友被抓住了。試著找到他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达人"的幸存者相信，小队的其他成员被俘。设法找到他们。

Key.Original: Rescue Captives
Key.Chinese: 拯救戰俘
Key.Chinesesimp: 援救俘虏

Key.Original: Intervene and rescue the captives before it's too late.
Key.Chinese: 趁為時不晚，介入並救出戰俘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在为时过晚之前介入并救出俘虏。

Key.Original: Get In Offroad
Key.Chinese: 進入越野車
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入越野车

Key.Original: Your team is ready and waiting by the Offroad. Enter the vehicle to start the mission.
Key.Chinese: 你的隊伍已經準備就緒，在越野車旁等待。坐進載具，開始任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的小组准备完毕，在越野车旁等候。进入车辆开始行动。

Key.Original: Reconnaissance
Key.Chinese: 偵察
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察

Key.Original: Gather as much information as possible. Pinpoint enemy positions and armored vehicles; we need to know what's where, in order to make informed decisions in the field.
Key.Chinese: 盡可能收集情報。搜查敵方位置與裝甲載具。我們必須知道哪裡有什麼，才能下達具可信度的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收集尽可能多的信息。查明敌军和装甲车的位置;为了在战场上作出明智的决定，我们需要知道哪些东西在哪个位置。

Key.Original: Investigate
Key.Chinese: 調查
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查

Key.Original: Secure Mortar Site
Key.Chinese: 肅清迫擊砲區
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取迫击炮工事

Key.Original: Search this area.
Key.Chinese: 搜查該地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索该地区。

Key.Original: Neutralize the mortars at the given %2co-ordinates%1.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅已知%2坐標%1上的迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁位于指定%2坐标%1位置的迫击炮。

Key.Original: Find lost squad
Key.Chinese: 找到失蹤的分隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索失踪的班

Key.Original:
One of our patrols has failed to report in. Follow their original route and find out what happened:
WP Iota:%2 092(9) 165(8)%1
WP Kappa:%3 093(4) 168(2)%1
WP Lambda:%4 096(9) 170(3)%1
WP Mu:%5 094(9) 175(6)%1
WP Nu:%6 102(7) 177(9)%1
WP Xi:%7 Orino%1
WP Omicron:%8 RTB%1
Begin Offensive
Key.Chinese: 開始攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始进攻

Key.Original: Mark Target
Key.Chinese: 標記目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 标记目标

Key.Original: Artillery Strike
Key.Chinese: 砲擊攻勢
Key.Chinesesimp: 炮兵攻击

Key.Original: Government loyalists search for a missing squad ahead of a major offensive.
Key.Chinese: 在發動主要攻擊前，忠誠的政府軍出發搜查失蹤的分隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 政府拥护者在大规模进攻之前搜索一支失踪的小队。

Key.Original: No Reprieve
Key.Chinese: 無法緩解
Key.Chinesesimp: 刻不容缓

Key.Original: MISSION FAILED
Key.Chinese: 任務失敗
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务失败

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Untie guerilla
Key.Chinese: 為遊擊隊員鬆綁
Key.Chinesesimp: 给游击队员松绑

Key.Original: Heal survivor
Key.Chinese: 治療倖存者
Key.Chinesesimp: 治疗幸存者

Key.Original:
For this mission, our British friends have offered clandestine fire support.
(press 0-8-1 to mark target).

But remember, we can't expect too much. They have a small window of opportunity and a limited number of rounds; we can only call on them once and select a maximum of three locations. So, try and mark co-ordinates accurately.
Key.Chinese:
這次任務，我們的英國朋友會暗中提供砲擊支援。
(按0-8-1標記目標。)

但請記住，不能過度依賴。能使用這項支援的機會不多，次數也有限制，我們只能從三個地點內選擇一處。所以，你務必準確的標出目標坐標。
Key.Chinesesimp:
为完成此任务，我们的英国朋友暗中提供了火力支援。
(按下0-8-1来标注目标)。

不过要记住，我们不能期望过高。他们的机会之窗很小，射击的轮次有限;我们只能呼叫他们一次，最多只能选三个地点。所以，设法精确标注坐标。

Key.Original: Support
Key.Chinese: 支援
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援

Key.Original: A little while ago, we heard gunfire and lost contact with %2Spartan%1. It seems the rebels may have entered the town, using the fog as cover. They've broken the ceasefire. Therefore, we must retaliate, immediately.
Key.Chinese: 交火聲傳來不久，我們就與%2"斯巴達人"%1斷了聯繫。看來叛軍利用霧氣掩護，已經進入城鎮。此舉打破了停火協議。我們必須回以顏色，立刻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在不久之前，我们听到了枪声，失去了与%2斯巴达人%1的联络。看来叛军也许已经利用浓雾作为掩护进入了城镇。他们已经破坏了停火协议。所以，我们必须立即予以回敬。

Key.Original:
%2Hoplite%1 - Ambush element.
%3Spartan%1 - Lost squad.
%4Centaur%1 - Mechanized infantry.
%5Chimera%1 - Your team.
%6Olympos%1 - Command.
%7Falcon%1 - British operatives.
Key.Chinese:
%2"重步兵"%1-突襲部隊。
%3""斯巴達人""%1-失蹤的分隊。
%4"半人馬"%1-機械化步兵。
%5"奇美拉"%1-你的隊伍。
%6"奧林波斯"%1-指揮部。
%7"獵鷹"%1-英國部隊人員。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2"重步兵"%1-伏击分队。
%3"斯巴达人"%1-失踪的班。
%4"半人马"%1-机械化步兵。
%5"奇美拉"%1-你的小组。
%6"奥林波斯"%1-指挥。
%7"猎鹰"%1-英国特战人员。

Key.Original: Our primary objective is to capture %2Orino%1. If we incur heavy casualties, we will fall back to our position %3here%1.
Key.Chinese: 我們的主要任務是佔領%2奧里諾%1。要是死傷慘重，我們就退回%3這裡%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的主要目标是夺取%2奥里诺%1。如果我们遭遇重大伤亡，我们将撤回我们在%3这儿%1的阵地。

Key.Original:
1. Find %2Spartan%1.
2. Conduct reconnaissance with your %3squad%1 and identify armor and defences.
3. Designate targets (via 0-8-1) and transmit co-ordinates for artillery (via 0-8-2). On impact, we will commence our assault. Alternatively, you can give the signal for the offensive personally, by using your radio (via 0-8-3).
4. Hold %4Orino%1, no matter what.
Key.Chinese:
1. 找到%2"斯巴達人"%1。
2. 與%3分隊%1一同執行偵察任務，辨認敵方裝甲與守軍。
3. 指定目標(按0-8-1)，將坐標傳給砲擊部隊(按0-8-2)。砲擊命中後攻擊就開始。也可以利用無線電(按0-8-3)單獨傳達攻擊信號。
4. 無論發生什麼事，務必堅守%4奧里諾%1。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 找到%2斯巴达人%1。
2. 与你的%3小组%1进行侦察，识别装甲车和防御工事。
3. 指定目标(按0-8-1)并传送火炮射击坐标(按0-8-2)。炮击后，我们将开始进攻。你也可以使用你的无线电(按0-8-3)来亲自发出进攻信号。
4. 守住%4奥里诺%1，无论付出什么代价。

Key.Original: Images of rebel forces
Key.Chinese: 叛軍的照片
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军图像

Key.Original: Attachments
Key.Chinese: 附件
Key.Chinesesimp: 附件

Container.name: 004_am_ambient_conversation_b
Container.situation: ambient conversation between two characters.

Key.Original: Yeah. But, they are bringing in the guns.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。可是他們帶來了武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。不过他们带来了枪。

Key.Original: Ah, CTRG have to keep their distance, Dimos - y'know they can't commit.
Key.Chinese: 喔，戰研大隊必須保持一點疏離感，蒂莫斯-你知道的，他們不能明確表達支持。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，战研大队不得不离远点，蒂莫斯-你知道他们不能公开行动。

Key.Original: These...? They're antiques! We need proper weapons!
Key.Chinese: 你說這些...?這些是老古董了!我們需要稱手的武器!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些...?它们是老古董!我们需要合适的武器!

Key.Original: Not hand-me-downs shipped in on the sly from fuck knows where.
Key.Chinese: 不是別人汰舊換新留下來的武器，他媽的還來路不明。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是从不知什么鬼地方偷偷运来的二手货。

Container.name: 065_eve_patrol_a
Container.situation: the player is close to an enemy patrol. there is ambient conversation between them - but they have not noticed the player.

Key.Original: I can't see a thing in this fog.
Key.Chinese: 霧這麼濃，我什麼也看不見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这场大雾里我什么都看不见。

Key.Original: Gikas... if you can't see, shut the fuck up and listen.
Key.Chinese: 吉卡斯...看不見就他媽的把嘴閉上，用耳朵聽。
Key.Chinesesimp: 吉卡斯...如果你看不见，就闭嘴好好听着。

Container.name: 061_eve_civilian
Container.situation: a civilian makes a remark to the player when he enter their home uninvited.

Key.Original: Sure - make yourself at home.
Key.Chinese: 好-當自己家啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然-请别客气，就当在家一样。

Key.Original: No. Close the door on your way out.
Key.Chinese: 沒看見。出去的時候把門關好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。出去的时候关上门。

Key.Original: You seen any rebels, old man?
Key.Chinese: 老頭，有看見叛軍嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你见过任何叛军吗，老伙计?

Key.Original: Mm.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。

Container.name: 069_eve_surprised_b
Container.situation: enemy units are alerted to the player while speaking amongst themselves.

Key.Original: Enemies! Move!
Key.Chinese: 有敵人!移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军!动手!

Container.name: 068_eve_surprised_a
Container.situation: enemy units are alerted to the player while speaking amongst themselves.

Key.Original: Contact!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遇敌!

Container.name: 060_eve_civilian_panicked_b
Container.situation: a panicked civilian expresses their alarm during the fighting.

Key.Original: Please! I'm no part of this!
Key.Chinese: 拜託!我跟這些事無關!
Key.Chinesesimp: 求求你!我和这没关系!

Container.name: 059_eve_civilian_panicked_a
Container.situation: a panicked civilian expresses their alarm during the fighting.

Key.Original: No - no, don't shoot!
Key.Chinese: 不-別，別開槍!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不-不，别开枪!

Container.name: 018_ta_moving_a
Container.situation: player provides british special forces with a grid reference. dialogue occurs immediately after fil_moving_in.

Key.Original: Moving to a, uh - a small house, on grid 096-170. Over.
Key.Chinese: 正前往一座，呃-一間小屋，方格坐標096-170。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动至一幢，呃-一幢小房子，网格位置096-170。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 093_ex_civilian_kia_end
Container.situation: player shoots a civilian or their actions result in the death of one, after already killing non-combatants with artillery.

Key.Original: Chimera, Falcon - that's enough! If you wanna kill innocent people, you fight your own fucking wars - we're leaving. Out.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"，這是"獵鷹"-你夠了沒!要是你只想著殺戮無辜平民，你他媽的自己去玩吧-我們不管你了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"，"猎鹰"呼叫-够了!如果你们想杀害无辜平民，那你们就自己去打吧-我们要离开了。完毕。

Container.name: 092_ex_civilian_kia
Container.situation: player's actions result in the death of a civilian.

Key.Original: Falcon to Chimera - there's civilians in that town - check your goddamn fire! Out.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"呼叫"奇美拉"-城裡有平民-天殺的，開槍小心點!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"呼叫"奇美拉"-那个镇里有平民-检查你们该死的火力!完毕。

Container.name: 091_ex_friendly_fire_a
Container.situation: player kills a friendly unit with artillery strike.

Key.Original: Chimera - you're bringing down fire on friendlies!
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"-你攻擊的是友軍!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"-你在对友军射击!

Container.name: 090_ex_leaving_ao
Container.situation: player is leaving the area of operations.

Key.Original: Ah, not too sure... wait one.
Key.Chinese: 呃，我不確定...等一等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，不太确定...等一下。

Key.Original: Olympos to Chimera, report! What is your position?
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"呼叫"奇美拉"，回報狀況!你在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"呼叫"奇美拉"，报告情况!你的位置在哪?

Key.Original: Check your map and head back to the objective! Out.
Key.Chinese: 看好地圖，回來執行任務!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查地图，回到目标位置!完毕。

Container.name: 089_ex_survivor_too_late
Container.situation: survivor from the lost squad dies from his wounds, because player takes too long or completes tasks in different order.

Key.Original: Message received, Chimera. Best you don't hang around.
Key.Chinese: 收到訊息，"奇美拉"。你最好別在那裡待太久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，"奇美拉"。你最好别多逗留。

Key.Original: Chimera to Falcon.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: Spartan's been ambushed. Looks like they put up a fight, but... I can't see any survivors.
Key.Chinese: "斯巴達人"被突襲了。看來他們曾經奮力抵抗，但是...沒有生還者。
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达人"遭到伏击。看来他们进行了反抗，可是...我没找到任何幸存者。

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。完毕。

Key.Original: So much for a fucking ceasefire...
Key.Chinese: 沒三小路用的停火協議...
Key.Chinesesimp: 停火协议真他妈折腾...

Container.name: 088_su_no_coordinates
Container.situation: player tries to confirm co-ordinates without selecting any.

Key.Original: Mm... I better confirm some targets first.
Key.Chinese: 嗯...我最好先確認一下目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...我最好先确认几个目标。

Container.name: 087_su_coordinates_c
Container.situation: player confirms co-ordinates in their support menu.

Key.Original: Transmitting some magic numbers for your artillery, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 正在傳送神秘數字，請求砲擊，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在给你的火炮捎些神准的数据过去，"猎鹰"。

Container.name: 086_su_coordinates_b
Container.situation: player confirms co-ordinates in their support menu.

Key.Original: Co-ordinates for those big guns are coming to you, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 正在傳送需要重炮轟炸的坐標，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正把给那些大炮的坐标发送给你，"猎鹰"。

Container.name: 085_su_coordinates_a
Container.situation: player confirms co-ordinates in their support menu.

Key.Original: Falcon, it's Chimera here.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這是"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: Fire mission - I'm sending you some co-ordinates.
Key.Chinese: 請求火力攻擊-我把坐標傳給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 火力任务-我正在给你发送一些坐标。

Container.name: 084_su_artillery_support
Container.situation: player calls artillery fire down on the enemy via british special forces.

Key.Original: Relaying. Stand by.
Key.Chinese: 正在轉達消息。等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 传达中。待命。

Key.Original: Shot.
Key.Chinese: 砲擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击。

Key.Original: Okay... shot, over.
Key.Chinese: 好...砲擊，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...射击，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Enjoy the show, chimera... ordnance is on its way, out.
Key.Chinese: 好好欣賞勞動成果，"奇美拉"...砲彈即將著陸，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看场好戏吧，"奇美拉"...已开炮，完毕。

Container.name: 083_eve_introduction_hub
Container.situation: player will apper (after cutscene) around the table with others squad leaders. he should be told by olympos that if he wants he can rearm (optional task), but his squad is already waiting for him (near offroad).

Key.Original: Mavros, your team's outside.
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，你的隊友在外面等你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，你的小组在外面。

Key.Original: It's slim pickings, but there's gear and weapons upstairs, go ahead and take what you need.
Key.Chinese: 能選的東西不多，但這裡是裝備，樓上有武器，去挑選需要的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可选的东西不多，不过楼上有装备和武器，去拿你需要的东西。

Key.Original: But hurry it up, clock's ticking...
Key.Chinese: 不過動作要快，我們時間不多...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过要赶快，时间不多了...

Container.name: 082_eve_stolen_apc
Container.situation: player stole enemy apc and should inform hq about friendlies using enemy apc. (trigered only in gorgon)

Key.Original: All callsigns, Chimera.
Key.Chinese: 各呼號注意，這是"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号，"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: I'm commandeering an enemy Gorgon - check your fire. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們徵用了一臺敵方的"蛇髮女妖"裝甲運兵車-小心開火。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我正在征用一辆敌军的"蛇发女妖"-小心你的火力。完毕。

Container.name: 081_eve_mortar_destroyed
Container.situation: player destroys mortar.

Key.Original: Okay... that worked.
Key.Chinese: 好...這樣就行了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...那奏效了。

Container.name: 080_ta_mortar_info_out
Container.situation: british special forces conclude their transmission and the player informs hq about the possible artillery threat.

Key.Original: He says he saw a couple of med-trucks there, unloading things.
Key.Chinese: 他說看見幾輛醫療卡車，正在卸貨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他说他在那看到几辆医疗车，在卸货。

Key.Original: Look at that location!
Key.Chinese: 看那個地方!
Key.Chinesesimp: 看看那个地方!

Key.Original: My guess is they used them to shift artillery - right under our fucking noses.
Key.Chinese: 我猜那些人是利用卡車來調度砲彈-在我們眼皮子底下搞鬼，真他媽的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我猜他们用它们来转移火炮-就在我们的眼皮底下。

Key.Original: Mm, could be, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，有可能，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，也许吧，"猎鹰"。

Key.Original: Olympos. We have a lead on a possible mortar threat just outside Orino. Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"。我們得到線索，奧里諾外面可能有迫擊砲威脅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"。我们有个线索，关于可能的迫击炮威胁，就在奥里诺外面。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Chimera. Push forward and investigate. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"奇美拉"。向前推進，進行調查。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"奇美拉"。向前推进，调查情况。完毕。

Container.name: 079_ta_mortar_info_c
Container.situation: british special forces provide the player with the location for the mortar site.

Key.Original: Check your map, 096-176.
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看你的地图，096-176。

Container.name: 078_ta_mortar_info_b
Container.situation: british special forces provide the player with the location for the mortar site.

Key.Original: Check your map, 098-177.
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看你的地图，098-177。

Container.name: 077_ta_mortar_info_a
Container.situation: british special forces provide the player with the location for the mortar site.

Key.Original: Check your map, 102-178.
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看你的地图，102-178。

Container.name: 076_ta_mortar_info_in
Container.situation: british special forces relay information to player about mortar site.

Key.Original: Chimera - update.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"-新消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"-最新消息。

Key.Original: We're with the survivor from Spartan.
Key.Chinese: 我們在"斯巴達人"的生還者這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们和"斯巴达人"的幸存者在一起。

Container.name: 075_in_captives_location_out
Container.situation: british special forces contact player to give him additional information on the location of the captives from the lost squad - but player is unaware of them. to follow in_captives_location_in or in_captives_location_unaware.

Key.Original: Check your map. 100-170. It's gotta be the place. Big shed.
Key.Chinese: 你看地圖。100-170。絕對是那裡。大棚屋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看你的地图，100-170。应该是那个地方。大棚。

Key.Original: Mm, could be. I'll see if I can get a closer look. Chimera... out.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，可能是。我盡量靠近查看。"奇美拉"...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，也许。我看看能不能走近点看看。"奇美拉"...完毕。

Container.name: 074_in_captives_location_unaware
Container.situation: british special forces contact player to give him additional information on the location of the captives from the lost squad - but player is unaware of them.

Key.Original: Didn't he say? Some of the lads from Spartan - the rebels have them holed up somewhere.
Key.Chinese: 他沒說嗎?"斯巴達人"隊裡有幾個人-被叛軍關在某個地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他没说吗?"斯巴达人"里的一些人-叛军把他们扣留在什么地方。

Key.Original: I'm not sure I follow... over.
Key.Chinese: 我沒聽懂...完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不确定我明白了...完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: And you know where?
Key.Chinese: 你知道地點了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道在哪吗?

Container.name: 073_in_captives_location_in
Container.situation: british special forces contact player to give him additional information on the location of the captives from the lost squad.

Key.Original: Chimera, you copy?
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"，你收到了吗?

Key.Original: Your survivor from Spartan... I got an idea where his friends are.
Key.Chinese: 你找到的"斯巴達人"生還者...我知道他的其他隊友在哪了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达人"的幸存者...我对他的朋友们在哪有个想法。

Key.Original: Yeah, receiving, Falcon.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我在聽，"獵鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，正在接收，"猎鹰"。

Container.name: 072_eve_enemy_qrf
Container.situation: the enemy fire a pair of flares over orino, as a signal for reinforcements.

Key.Original: Olympos, this is Hoplite - we see a pair of flare above Orino.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"重步兵"-在奧里諾上方出現一對信號彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"重步兵"-我们看到奥里诺上空有两枚照明弹。

Key.Original: Copy, we can see them too.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們也看見了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们也能看到。

Key.Original: That'll be the signal for reinforcements... all teams, better get ready for them... out.
Key.Chinese: 那應該是呼叫援軍的信號...各隊注意，做好準備...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那应该是给增援部队的信号...所有小队，最好对此做好准备...完毕。

Container.name: 071_eve_dead_mans_click
Container.situation: the player tries to fire his weapon in a firefight with an empty magazine.

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死!

Container.name: 070_eve_player_wounded
Container.situation: the player is wounded by enemy fire.

Key.Original: Argh, fuck!
Key.Chinese: 呃，幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，见鬼!

Container.name: 064_eve_orino_cleared_mortars
Container.situation: player secures the town of orino but has not yet eliminated the enemy mortars. to follow immediately after eve_orino_cleared.

Key.Original: Copy, Chimera - now, concentrate on destroying those mortars! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"奇美拉"-現在請專心摧毀迫擊砲!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"奇美拉"-现在，集中火力摧毁那些迫击炮!完毕。

Container.name: 063_eve_orino_cleared_qrf
Container.situation: player secures the town of orino but has yet to repel the enemy's counterattack. he is instructed to keep fighting. to follow immediately after eve_orino_cleared.

Key.Original: Okay, Chimera. Stand your ground...
Key.Chinese: 好，"奇美拉"。堅守陣地...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，"奇美拉"。坚守阵地...

Key.Original: Support Hoplite and Centaur - it is imperative the enemy do not re-take Orino!
Key.Chinese: 支援"重步兵"和"半人馬"-不能讓敵人奪回奧里諾，這是命令!
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援"重步兵"和"半人马"-绝对不能让敌人夺回奥里诺!

Key.Original: Crush their resolve and prevent any counterattack. Out.
Key.Chinese: 擊潰敵人的決心，阻止任何形式的反攻。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 粉碎他们的决心，阻止任何反攻。完毕。

Container.name: 062_eve_orino_cleared
Container.situation: player secures the town of orino.

Key.Original: Olympos, Chimera, come in!
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"奇美拉"，請回答!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，"奇美拉"，请回答!

Key.Original: Seems like we got a foothold on the town, Olympos.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經佔領了城鎮，"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来我们在城镇确保了一处支撑点，"奥林波斯"。

Key.Original: Send it.
Key.Chinese: 說吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开火。

Container.name: 058_ta_orino_failed_out
Container.situation: hq informs all callsigns that the mission is a failure. the mission ends, unsuccessfully. too many casualties.

Key.Original: Olympos, Hoplite. Centaur's nonresponsive, we're losing ground!
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"重步兵"。"半人馬"沒有回應，我們居於劣勢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，"重步兵"呼叫。"半人马"没有回应，我们正在败退!

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Hoplite. Fall back to Agios Dionysus.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"重步兵"。退回AgiosDionysus。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"重步兵"。撤回圣迪奥尼西奥斯。

Key.Original: All callsigns - retreat - abort the mission and withdraw to the staging area! Out.
Key.Chinese: 各呼號注意-撤退-中止任務，退回轉運區!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号-撤退-中止任务，撤回集结区!完毕。

Container.name: 057_ta_orino_secured
Container.situation: player informs hq that the primary objective is complete. the mission ends.

Key.Original: Chimera to Olympos.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫"奥林波斯"。

Key.Original: Orino's ours, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們佔領了奧里諾，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥里诺是我们的了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, well done, Chimera...
Key.Chinese: 確認，幹得好，"奇美拉"...
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得好，"奇美拉"...

Key.Original: Rearm and regroup - we mustn't lose momentum. Out.
Key.Chinese: 整裝、整隊-我們必須延續這股衝勁。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 补充装备，重新集结-我们得乘胜追击。完毕。

Container.name: 056_eve_assault_reports
Container.situation: callsigns respond to hq as the operation begins. dialogue to follow sup_assault_starts or eve_assault_starts_hq.

Key.Original: Centaur, rolling out!
Key.Chinese: "半人馬"，出擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "半人马"，出击!

Key.Original: Hoplite, on the move!
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"，正在行動!
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"，行动!

Key.Original: Give them hell! For Altis - and the Free Republic!
Key.Chinese: 給敵人好看!為了阿爾蒂斯-還有自由共和國!
Key.Chinesesimp: 让他们下地狱去吧!为了阿尔蒂斯-还有自由共和国!

Container.name: 055_eve_assault_starts_hq
Container.situation: hq orders callsigns to begin the assault on the town of orino.

Key.Original: Olympos to all units - commence the assault!
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"呼叫所有單位-開始攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"呼叫所有单位-开始进攻!

Container.name: 054_sup_assault_starts
Container.situation: player orders callsigns to begin the assault on the town of orino.

Key.Original: Chimera to all units - commence the assault!
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫所有單位-開始攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫所有单位-开始进攻!

Container.name: 053_eve_mortar_secured
Container.situation: player informs hq that the mortars have been secured. hq suggests the enemy may try to counterattack.

Key.Original: Olympos - we're in control of those mortars. Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"-迫擊砲歸我們了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"-我们控制了那些迫击炮。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Pleased to hear that, Chimera.
Key.Chinese: 真高興聽你這麼說，"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴听到这消息，"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: Though be advised, it's likely some kinda QRF is inbound.
Key.Chinese: 但請注意，敵方很可能正要派出快速反應部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过请注意，可能有快速反应部队正在赶来。

Key.Original: Destroy the artillery or dig-in and hold them off... Out.
Key.Chinese: 毀掉迫擊砲，或者堅守岡位...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁火炮，或者转入防御挡住他们。完毕。

Container.name: 052_eve_mortar_fired_end_a
Container.situation: hq orders player to hurry up and neutralize the enemy's mortars. to follow eve_mortar_fired_a or eve_mortar_fired_b.

Key.Original: Chimera, expedite! Neutralize those mortar teams! Out.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"，動作快!殲滅敵方迫擊砲隊伍!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"，快点!消灭那些迫击炮小组!完毕。

Container.name: 051_ta_mortar_fired_d
Container.situation: hq reports that they are taking fire from mortars.

Key.Original: Olympos to Chimera, we got incoming mortar fire!
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"呼叫"奇美拉"，迫擊砲來襲!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"呼叫"奇美拉"，有迫击炮向我们开炮!

Key.Original: Find and eliminate those guns! Out.
Key.Chinese: 把砲手找出來殲滅掉!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到并摧毁那些炮!完毕。

Container.name: 050_eve_mortar_fired_c_out
Container.situation: player comes under fire from artillery and player's group are alive. to follow eve_mortar_fired_c

Key.Original: Incoming! Let's move!
Key.Chinese: 飛彈來襲!我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遭炮击!我们走!

Container.name: 049_eve_mortar_fired_c
Container.situation: player comes under fire from artillery.

Key.Original: Ah, no.
Key.Chinese: 天啊，不要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，不。

Container.name: 048_eve_mortar_fired_b
Container.situation: centaur alerts player that they are under fire and compels them to hurry up and neutralize the enemy's mortars.

Key.Original: Mavros, we're getting chewed up here!
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"，我們要被分屍了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"，我们这儿受到攻击!

Key.Original: You gonna silence those fucking mortars?
Key.Chinese: 你到底要不要解決那些天殺的迫擊砲?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你能让那些该死的迫击炮哑火吗?

Key.Original: Hang tough, Centaur - I'm on it.
Key.Chinese: 撐住，"半人馬"-我在做了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚持一下，"半人马"-交给我吧。

Container.name: 047_eve_mortar_fired_a
Container.situation: hoplite are under fire and prompts player to hurry up and neutralize the enemy's mortars.

Key.Original: Hoplite to Chimera, we got incoming artillery fire!
Key.Chinese: "重步兵"呼叫"奇美拉"，我們被砲擊了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "重步兵"呼叫"奇美拉"，有迫击炮向我们开炮!

Key.Original: Taking casualties - I say again, we are taking casualties!
Key.Chinese: 有傷亡者-我強調，有傷亡者!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遭遇伤亡-我再说一遍，我们遭遇伤亡!

Key.Original: Hold on, Hoplite. Out.
Key.Chinese: 撐住，"重步兵"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚持住，"重步兵"。完毕。

Container.name: 046_eve_mortar_revealed_group
Container.situation: player orders squad to engage the enemy mortars.

Key.Original: Light them up!
Key.Chinese: 給他們好看!
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击!

Container.name: 045_loc_captives_executed
Container.situation: player finds the captives, but he is too late. they have all been executed.

Key.Original: Ah, fuck...
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，该死...

Key.Original: Silvanos...? Mikhos...!
Key.Chinese: 西爾瓦諾斯...?米霍斯...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 西尔瓦诺斯...?米霍斯...!

Container.name: 044_ta_captives_rescued_out
Container.situation: player rescues some captives from the lost squad.

Key.Original: Mav'.
Key.Chinese: 馬夫'。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马夫。

Key.Original: For a former rebel, you're alright.
Key.Chinese: 以前叛軍來說，你人還不壞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对一名前叛军来说，你还行。

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinese: 叫我幹嘛?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么?

Key.Original: Sure. Come on, let's go.
Key.Chinese: 當然。來，我們走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。来吧，我们走。

Container.name: 043_ta_captives_rescued_in
Container.situation: player start to rescue some captives from the lost squad.

Key.Original: Hold still.
Key.Chinese: 別亂動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呆着别动。

Container.name: 042_ta_mg_destroyed_c
Container.situation: player clears an enemy strongpoint.

Key.Original: Chimera to Olympos, nailed one more observation post, over.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"奧林波斯"，又剿滅一座觀察站了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫"奥林波斯"，又解决了一个观察哨，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Excellent. That puts us in a strong position, Chimera. Out.
Key.Chinese: 太好了。這樣我們就占了上風，"奇美拉"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太好了。那让我们占了上风，"奇美拉"。完毕。

Container.name: 041_ta_mg_destroyed_b
Container.situation: player clears an enemy strongpoint.

Key.Original: Olympos, this is Chimera... another OP's secure. Out.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"奇美拉"...第二座叛軍觀察站剿滅完畢。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"奇美拉"...又搞定了一个观察哨。完毕。

Container.name: 040_ta_mg_destroyed_a
Container.situation: player clears an enemy strongpoint.

Key.Original: Olympos, Chimera.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，"奇美拉"呼叫。

Key.Original: One rebel OP is clear.
Key.Chinese: 剿滅一座叛軍觀察站了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个叛军观察哨消灭了。

Key.Original: Yeah, no problem. Out.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，當然。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，没问题。完毕。

Key.Original: Great job - but, you shouldn't take any unnecessary risks.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好-但別躁進，惹上不必要的風險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮-不过，你不该冒任何不必要的风险。

Container.name: 039_ta_mg_destroyed_artillery_c
Container.situation: friendly artillery destroys an enemy strongpoint.

Key.Original: Falcon to Chimera... direct hit on that last OP. Out.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"呼叫"奇美拉"...砲擊正中最後一座觀察站。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"呼叫"奇美拉"...直接击中最后一个观察哨。完毕。

Container.name: 038_ta_mg_destroyed_artillery_b
Container.situation: friendly artillery destroys an enemy strongpoint.

Key.Original: Chimera, Falcon. Impact. Observation post destroyed. Out.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"，這是"獵鷹"。砲擊命中。炸毀了觀察站。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"，"猎鹰"。命中。观察哨已摧毁。完毕。

Container.name: 037_ta_mg_destroyed_artillery_a
Container.situation: friendly artillery destroys an enemy strongpoint.

Key.Original: This is Falcon... looks like we hit a rebel OP.
Key.Chinese: 這是"獵鷹"...看來這次砲擊的是叛軍的觀察站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"...看来我们击中了一个叛军观察哨。

Key.Original: Right on the money. Out.
Key.Chinese: 正中目標。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干脆利落。完毕。

Container.name: 036_ta_ifv_destroyed_b
Container.situation: player destroys an enemy vehicle.

Key.Original: Whoo-yeah!
Key.Chinese: 呀呼!
Key.Chinesesimp: 哇-耶!

Container.name: 035_ta_ifv_destroyed_a
Container.situation: player destroys an enemy vehicle.

Key.Original: Fuck-yeah!
Key.Chinese: 真他媽爽!
Key.Chinesesimp: 唉哟-耶!
