Container.name: 034_ta_apc_destroyed_artillery
Container.situation: friendly artillery destroys an enemy vehicle. british special forces congratulate player.

Key.Original: Chimera... confirmed kill on Gorgon APC - Falcon, out.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"...確認擊殺"蛇髮女妖"裝甲運兵車-"獵鷹"結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"...确认摧毁"蛇发女妖"装甲输送车-"猎鹰"，完毕。

Container.name: 033_ta_ifv_destroyed_artillery_b
Container.situation: friendly artillery destroys an enemy vehicle. british special forces congratulate player.

Key.Original: Chimera, Falcon. That other tank is toast, out.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"，這是"獵鷹"。恭喜你又解決一臺戰車。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"，"猎鹰"。击中另一辆坦克，完毕。

Container.name: 032_ta_ifv_destroyed_artillery_a
Container.situation: friendly artillery destroys an enemy vehicle. british special forces congratulate player.

Key.Original: Falcon to Chimera, good fire effect on rebel IFV. Out.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"呼叫"奇美拉"，砲擊炸毀了叛軍的裝步戰車，漂亮。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"呼叫"奇美拉"，摧毁叛军的步兵战车。完毕。

Container.name: 031_ta_captives_detected_close
Container.situation: captives call out to player.

Key.Original: Hey!
Key.Chinese: 喂!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨!

Key.Original: Get us outta here!
Key.Chinese: 放我們出去!
Key.Chinesesimp: 把我们从这儿弄出去!

Container.name: 030_ta_captives_detected
Container.situation: player spots the captives and was not aware of them beforehand.

Key.Original: Olympos, it's Chimera.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"，這是"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，这里是"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: I got optics on some prisoners. Our guys, I think. Maybe from that lost squad... over.
Key.Chinese: 發現一些戰俘。我覺得是我們的人。可能隸屬於失蹤的分隊...完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我从望远镜里看到了一些俘虏。我想是我们的人。也许是失踪的班里的人...完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Help them if you can, Chimera - but do not jeopardize the mission. It's your prerogative. Out.
Key.Chinese: 在能力範圍內盡量幫助他們，"奇美拉"-但別暴露任務。以任務為優先。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你可以，帮帮他们，"奇美拉"-不过别危及你的任务。那是你的优先目标。完毕。

Container.name: 029_ta_mortars_detected
Container.situation: player spots the mortars and was not aware of them beforehand. hq inform the player it is a primary target.

Key.Original: Holy shit...
Key.Chinese: 我操...
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼...

Key.Original: Chimera to Olympos. Sighting. Enemy mortars in our AO!
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"奧林波斯"。發現敵方。任務區出現敵方迫擊砲!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫"奥林波斯"。发现情况。敌军迫击炮在我们的行动区域里!

Key.Original: Understood, Olympos. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"奧林波斯"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"奥林波斯"。完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Chimera - secure that site. Over.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"奇美拉"-肅清該地。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"奇美拉"-夺取那个地方。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 028_ta_mg_detected_c
Container.situation: player spots the third strongpoint.

Key.Original: Mm. There you are.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。原來在這啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。你在这儿啊。

Container.name: 027_ta_mg_detected_b
Container.situation: player spots the second strongpoint.

Key.Original: Okay... I see you.
Key.Chinese: 好...我看見你了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的...我看到你了。

Container.name: 026_ta_mg_detected_a
Container.situation: player spots the first strongpoint.

Key.Original: Gotcha.
Key.Chinese: 找到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到你了。

Container.name: 025_ta_gorgon_detected
Container.situation: player spots the third armored vehicle.

Key.Original: Chimera to Olympos.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫"奥林波斯"。

Key.Original: There's an enemy Gorgon here. Could be a problem. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有臺敵方的"蛇髮女妖"裝甲運兵車。可能會是威脅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这儿有辆敌军"蛇发女妖"。也许是个麻烦。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Roger that Chimera. Mark it up. You know what to do. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"奇美拉"。標記坐標。你知道該怎麼處理。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"奇美拉"。标注它的位置。你知道该怎么办。完毕。

Container.name: 024_ta_moira_detected_b
Container.situation: player spots the second armored vehicle.

Key.Original: Olympos... spotted another infantry fighting vehicle. Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧林波斯"...我又發現一臺敵方裝步戰車。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"...发现另一辆步兵战车。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Mm, okay.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好吧。

Key.Original: Log the co-ordinates, and take care of it when you're ready. Out.
Key.Chinese: 鎖定目標坐標，準備好了就把載具處理掉。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 标注坐标，在你准备好的时候料理它。完毕。

Container.name: 023_ta_moira_detected_a
Container.situation: player spots the first armored vehicle.

Key.Original: Chimera to Olympos.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奇美拉"呼叫"奥林波斯"。

Key.Original: I've got eyes-on a hostile IFV near Point Sigma. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我在西格瑪點附近發現敵方裝步戰車。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在西格玛点附近看到一辆敌军步兵战车。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Good work - make sure you deal with it ahead of the offensive, out.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好-務必在發動攻擊前處理掉，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好-一定要在进攻之前干掉它，完毕。

Container.name: 022_inf_captives_info
Container.situation: player receives hint from the survivor that there may be captives from his squad in the ao.

Key.Original: You know where they are?
Key.Chinese: 你知道他們被抓去哪了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道他们在哪吗?

Key.Original: Okay.
Key.Chinese: 好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。

Key.Original: Listen.
Key.Chinese: 聽我說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着。

Key.Original: The - the others. Some of them were captured. They're alive!
Key.Chinese: 我隊上的其-其他人。有幾個人被抓了。但他們還活著!
Key.Chinesesimp: 其他人。有些人被俘。他们还活着!

Key.Original: Don't worry about that now.
Key.Chinese: 你現在不用擔心這些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在别担心那个。

Key.Original: No... but I heard some talk about a storage shed - it can't be far from here!
Key.Chinese: 不知道...但有人提過儲藏庫-應該離這裡不遠!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不...不过我听说有个放东西的棚子-它应该离这不远!

Key.Original: They - they left on foot, you gotta find them...
Key.Chinese: 他們-他們是步行離開的，一定要找到他們...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们-他们步行离开了，你得找到他们...

Key.Original: Just stay focused and keep pressure on that wound.
Key.Chinese: 專心點，持續加壓傷處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要集中注意力，用力压住伤口就好。

Container.name: 021_ta_survivor_killed
Container.situation: survivor from the lost squad is killed while moving to safety. british special forces not impressed.

Key.Original: Roger, we'll RTB - way to waste our fucking time, Chimera - out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們返回基地-你真他媽會浪費我們時間，"奇美拉"-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们将返回基地-浪费了我们该死的时间，"奇美拉"-完毕。

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死!

Key.Original: Falcon... got a casualty... no need for that extraction.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"...他陣亡了...不用撤出了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"...伤员死亡...不必撤离了。

Container.name: 020_ta_moving_out
Container.situation: british special forces respond to player and inform him they will collect the survivor.

Key.Original: Good enough, Chimera, we'll RV with your guy there... out.
Key.Chinese: 不錯了，"奇美拉"，我們會去找你發現那個弟兄...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 够好的了，"奇美拉"，我们将与你们在那儿会合...完毕。

Container.name: 019_ta_moving_b
Container.situation: player provides british special forces with a grid reference. dialogue occurs immediately after fil_moving_in.

Key.Original: Moving to a, uh - a small house, on grid 094-172. Over.
Key.Chinese: 正前往一座，呃-一間小屋，方格坐標094-172。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动至一幢，呃-一幢小房子，网格位置094-172。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 017_ta_moving_in
Container.situation: player contacts british special forces to report that he has located the lost squad.

Key.Original: Falcon. This is Chimera.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"。這是"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"。这里是"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: Spartan's been ambushed; we got one survivor.
Key.Chinese: "斯巴達人"被襲擊了，我們找到一位生還者。
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达人"遭到伏击。我们找到了一位幸存者。

Container.name: 016_ta_healing
Container.situation: player administers first aid to wounded comrade.

Key.Original: Okay...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...

Key.Original: This should help.
Key.Chinese: 這樣應該會好一些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这应该有帮助。

Key.Original: Forget about it, we need to get out of here.
Key.Chinese: 別管那些了，我們必須離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 忘了它吧，我们得离开这里。

Key.Original: The ceasefire...
Key.Chinese: 停火協議...
Key.Chinesesimp: 停火协议...

Key.Original: They fired first!
Key.Chinese: 他們先動手的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 是他们先开的火!

Key.Original: There's a hunter's lodge. I - I can make it.
Key.Chinese: 那裡有間獵人小屋。我-我撐得住的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有个猎人小屋。我-我可以到那里。

Container.name: 015_inf_survivor_shouting_e
Container.situation: a wounded survivor from lost squad calls out to get the player's attention.

Key.Original: The light - the chemlight!
Key.Chinese: 有光-螢光棒!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那光-那荧光!

Container.name: 014_inf_survivor_shouting_d
Container.situation: a wounded survivor from lost squad calls out to get the player's attention.

Key.Original: Please.
Key.Chinese: 拜託。
Key.Chinesesimp: 行行好。

Container.name: 013_inf_survivor_shouting_c
Container.situation: a wounded survivor from lost squad calls out to get the player's attention.

Key.Original: I'm bleeding.
Key.Chinese: 我在失血。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在流血。

Container.name: 012_inf_survivor_shouting_b
Container.situation: a wounded survivor from lost squad calls out to get the player's attention.

Key.Original: Please, help.
Key.Chinese: 拜託，來人啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请救救我。

Container.name: 011_inf_survivor_shouting_a
Container.situation: a wounded survivor from lost squad calls out to get the player's attention.

Key.Original: Argh. Son of a bitch.
Key.Chinese: 呃。狗娘養的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊。混蛋。

Container.name: 010_ta_lost_squad
Container.situation: player discovers lost squad. there's a single survivor. player es task to help survivor.

Key.Original: Spartan? Fuck - where are you?
Key.Chinese: "斯巴達人"?媽的-你在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达人"?妈的-你在哪?

Key.Original: Over here.
Key.Chinese: 我在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这儿。

Container.name: 009_fil_introduction_c
Container.situation: player advises squad not to alert the enemy or draw attention.

Key.Original: Okay. Keep it quiet.
Key.Chinese: 好。保持安靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。安静。

Key.Original: This fog gives us an advantage.
Key.Chinese: 霧氣對我們有利。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这场雾对我们有利。

Key.Original: But it won't help us much if we get into trouble.
Key.Chinese: 但要是我們惹上麻煩，霧氣也救不了我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过如果我们遇上麻烦，它也帮不上我们什么忙。

Container.name: 008_fil_introduction_b
Container.situation: player checks in with hq.

Key.Original: Olympos, Chimera.
Key.Chinese: "奇美拉"呼叫"奧林波斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥林波斯"，"奇美拉"叫。

Key.Original: The Brits are in position and we're proceeding on task. Over.
Key.Chinese: 英國佬已經就定位，我們正進行任務。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 英国人已经就位，我们要执行任务了。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy that, Olympos - see you on the other side - out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"奧林波斯"-我們要出發了，過會再說-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"奥林波斯"-在另一边见-完毕。

Key.Original: Alright, Chimera.
Key.Chinese: 好，"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: Identify defences and armor...
Key.Chinese: 你負責辨認敵方守軍和裝甲...
Key.Chinesesimp: 识别防御工事和装甲车...

Key.Original: All callsigns and artillery support are waiting on your mark.
Key.Chinese: 各呼號和砲擊支援已經就定位，等你消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号和火炮支援在等待你的信号。

Container.name: 007_ta_introduction_a
Container.situation: dialogue between british special forces and player's squad. succinct overview of first objective.

Key.Original: Better make a move, lads. It's gettin' light.
Key.Chinese: 我們得出發了，弟兄們。天快亮了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最好动身吧，伙计们。天越来越亮了。

Key.Original: If you come across Spartan, call it in - we'll organize extraction.
Key.Chinese: 如果碰上"斯巴達人"，你就呼叫支援-我們會安排撤出。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你遇到"斯巴达人"，把它召来-我们将组织撤离。

Key.Original: Got it.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。

Container.name: 006_am_ambient_conversation_d
Container.situation: ambient conversation between two characters.

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。

Key.Original: Finished them repairs...
Key.Chinese: 剛維修好...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我做了些修理...

Key.Original: Thanos... how's that Gorgon working out for you?
Key.Chinese: 塔諾斯...那臺"蛇髮女妖"狀態如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺斯...那辆"蛇发女妖"还能用吗?

Key.Original: But those tires you shot out - it's not easy to replace them.
Key.Chinese: 不過被你射穿的那幾個輪胎-換輪胎可不輕鬆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过你打烂的轮胎-换掉它们可不容易。

Key.Original: Mr. James?
Key.Chinese: 詹姆斯先生，你怎麼想?
Key.Chinesesimp: 詹姆斯先生呢?

Key.Original: I don't think so - we got the first one for you.
Key.Chinese: 我可不同意-你手上第一臺就是我們幫你弄到手的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不同意-我们已经给你们弄到一辆了。

Key.Original: Huh, well. Tell you what.
Key.Chinese: 哼。老子告訴你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好吧。我给你说啊。

Key.Original: Next time you want a twenty-two ton killing machine, go and ask someone else.
Key.Chinese: 下次你再想弄到一臺二十二噸的殺人機器，找別人幫你吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下次你想要一台22吨重的杀人机器，去找别人要吧。

Container.name: 005_am_ambient_conversation_c
Container.situation: ambient conversation between two characters.

Key.Original: You trust this new guy?
Key.Chinese: 你相信這個新來的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你相信这个新来的家伙?

Key.Original: He was in the army - Argyris, knows him...
Key.Chinese: 他之前隸屬政府軍-阿爾戈里斯認識他...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他过去在军队里-阿尔戈里斯认识他...

Container.name: 003_am_ambient_conversation_a
Container.situation: ambient conversation between two characters.

Key.Original: Nah, mate.
Key.Chinese: 不，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，伙计。

Key.Original: It ain't about that.
Key.Chinese: 不是那樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是这么回事。

Key.Original: Our government's got a lotta vested interests.
Key.Chinese: 我們的政府大多是在謀取自己的利益。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的政府得到了许多既得利益。

Key.Original: If that Colonel and his army remain in power it ain't gonna be business as usual, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 要是那個上校和他的部隊持續掌權，這裡可不能像往常運作了，你懂吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果那个上校和他们的军队继续执政，事情不会一切照旧，能理解吧?

Container.name: 002_br_briefing_b
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence. animated briefing with map and strategic information. visual breakdown of mission objectives.

Key.Original: Spartan group have failed to report and there's been some gunfire, near here... Point Lambda.
Key.Chinese: "斯巴達人"的隊伍沒有回來報到，而且在這裡...拉米塔點附近交火數次。
Key.Chinesesimp: "斯巴达人"班未能报告情况，而且在这儿附近有些枪声...拉米塔点。

Key.Original: Basically, this area.
Key.Chinese: 基本上是這個地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 差不多是这个地区。

Key.Original: They will locate our lost squad and ID enemy positions and armor before a fullscale offensive... yes, we're staging an attack.
Key.Chinese: 他們的任務是找回失蹤的分隊、在全軍出擊前辨認敵人和裝甲的方位...沒錯，我們要還擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们将在全面进攻之前找到我们失踪的班，识别敌军位置和装甲车...是啊，我们在筹划一次进攻。

Key.Original: First, however, we must soften their defences by calling in a rocket strike.
Key.Chinese: 但首先必須呼叫砲彈攻擊削弱敵方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，我们必须先呼叫火箭攻击，削弱他们的防守。

Key.Original: As you can see, it's right on their patrol route.
Key.Chinese: 如你們所見，這地區就在我們的巡邏路線上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以看到，它就在他们的巡逻路线上。

Key.Original: Of course, we haven't seen shit for days.
Key.Chinese: 但幾天下來我們什麼鬼影子也沒看見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，我们好几天什么都没看见。

Key.Original: The weather has us blind and there's a good chance Akhanteros' rebels are taking advantage of that fact.
Key.Chinese: 惡劣天候限制了視線，阿坎特羅斯的叛軍很有可能是利用這點躲過我們的探查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天气让我们什么都看不清，阿坎特罗斯的叛军很有可能利用了这个事实。

Key.Original: I'd say they've already made a play for Orino - effectively putting our forces on the back foot.
Key.Chinese: 我敢說叛軍已經滲透了奧里諾-我們現在落於下風。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得说他们已经设法夺得了奥里诺-有效地让我们的军队处于不利态势。

Key.Original: The town's half-empty and could have fallen without anybody knowing about it.
Key.Chinese: 城裡大多沒人，很可能在不知不覺中已經落入敵手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 城镇半空了，也许已经落入敌手但没人知道。

Key.Original: Truth is, we can't risk waiting, we must take the initiative!
Key.Chinese: 講真的，我們不能冒險繼續等下去，必須先發制人!
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实是，我们不能冒险等待，我们必须先发制人!

Key.Original: Now... Mavros.
Key.Chinese: 現在..."馬夫羅斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在..."马夫罗斯"。

Key.Original: He's volunteered to lead our reconnaissance team, Chimera.
Key.Chinese: 他自願率領偵查小隊"奇美拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他自愿带领我们的侦察小队，"奇美拉"。

Key.Original: Some of you may know Color Sergeant James.
Key.Chinese: 你們之中應該有人已經認識詹姆斯營旗中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们一些人也许认识上士詹姆斯。

Key.Original: His group, callsign: Falcon, have a provider on stand by.
Key.Chinese: 隊伍呼號是:"獵鷹"，他們已經備好了砲擊攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他的小组，呼号:"猎鹰"，有支援力量待命。

Key.Original: Their involvement will not be the subject of any discussion.
Key.Chinese: 這件消息是機密，不準任意談論。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的参与必须保密。

Key.Original: Once everything's set, Hoplite and Centaur will advance on Orino from the south and west.
Key.Chinese: 只要一切就緒，"重步兵"和"半人馬"就從南方和西方進攻奧里諾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦一切准备就绪，"重步兵"和"半人马"将从南面和西面向奥里诺挺进。

Key.Original: Chimera will then swoop in from the west.
Key.Chinese: 然後"奇美拉"將從西面發起突襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 之后"奇美拉"将从西面发起突袭。

Key.Original: As soon as we've captured the town, we may need to defend against quick reaction forces. Here... and, maybe here, from the north.
Key.Chinese: 一旦攻陷城鎮，我們可能得面臨敵方快速反應部隊的攻擊。可能是這裡...和這裡，從北邊來襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦我们夺取了城镇，我们也许需要抵抗快速反应部队的进攻。这里...也许还有这里，从北面来。

Key.Original: So... be prepared.
Key.Chinese: 所以...做好準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以...做好准备。

Key.Original: Any questions...? No? Then gear up. Let's get this done.
Key.Chinese: 有問題嗎...?沒有?那就整裝。大家上吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何问题吗...?没有?那么去准备吧。我们把这个任务搞定。

Container.name: 001_br_briefing_a
Container.situation: first part of briefing sequence. cutscene. a group of soldiers are waiting for a briefing, arguing amongst themselves.

Key.Original: No - the ceasefire's over!
Key.Chinese: 不-停火協議已經失效了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不-停火协议结束了!

Key.Original: You heard those shots! Sounded like a fire-fight to me...
Key.Chinese: 你也聽見槍聲了!就像槍戰的聲音...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你听到了那些枪声!我觉得听上去象是交火...

Key.Original: In this fog? Unlikely.
Key.Chinese: 在這種濃霧裡?不大可能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这场雾里?不可能。

Key.Original: He's got a point. Spartan should've checked in already.
Key.Chinese: 他說得有理。"斯巴達人"應該早就回來報到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他说得有道理。"斯巴达人"本该已经报到了。

Key.Original: How do you know, Thanos?
Key.Chinese: 你怎能確定是槍戰，Thanos?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你怎么知道，塔诺斯?

Key.Original: Georgiou's been late before and the rebels... I mean.
Key.Chinese: 伊奧爾伊奧之前也晚回過，而且那些叛軍...
Key.Chinesesimp: 伊奥尔伊奥之前迟到过，而叛军...我的意思是。

Key.Original: Maybe they're just showing a militia how to shoot straight.
Key.Chinese: 或許那些叛軍就想和正規軍比比誰的準頭好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许他们只是向民兵示范该怎么瞄准打枪。

Key.Original: Nobody asked you, Sergeant... we're not your island any -
Key.Chinese: 沒人問你的意見，中士...這裡已經不是你們的地盤了-
Key.Chinesesimp: 没人问你的意见，军士...这里已经不是你的岛-

Key.Original: Okay.
Key.Chinese: 好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。

Key.Original: That's enough! Squad leaders - this is how it's going to go.
Key.Chinese: 吵夠了!分隊隊長們-我要宣布任務內容。
Key.Chinesesimp: 够了!班长们-现在应该这么搞。

Key.Original: NATO reinforcements responding to the "East Wind" crisis must first secure the strategic island of Malden.
Key.Chinese: 北約增援部隊為回應"東風"危機，必須先清剿具戰略價值的小島馬爾登島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为解决"东风"危机而派遣的北约增援部队必须先夺取具有战略意义的马尔登岛。

Key.Original: Stepping Stone
Key.Chinese: 墊腳石
Key.Chinesesimp: 垫脚石

Key.Original: Infantry Go
Key.Chinese: 步兵行動
Key.Chinesesimp: 步兵上

Key.Original: Artillery Strike
Key.Chinese: 砲擊攻勢
Key.Chinesesimp: 炮兵攻击

Key.Original: Point Yellowstone
Key.Chinese: "黃石"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "黄石"点

Key.Original: Point Sequoia
Key.Chinese: "紅衫"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "红杉"点

Key.Original: Point Redwood
Key.Chinese: "紅木"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "红木"点

Key.Original: Point Katmai
Key.Chinese: "卡特邁"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡特迈"点

Key.Original: Point Everglades
Key.Chinese: "大沼澤地"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "大沼泽地"点

Key.Original: Point Denali
Key.Chinese: "德納里"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "德纳里"点

Key.Original: Point Congaree
Key.Chinese: "康加里"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "康加里"点

Key.Original: Point Carlsbad
Key.Chinese: "卡爾斯巴德"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡尔斯巴德"点

Key.Original: Point Arches
Key.Chinese: "拱門"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "拱门"点

Key.Original: Point Acadia
Key.Chinese: "阿卡迪亞"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿卡迪亚"点

Key.Original: Defend Dourdan
Key.Chinese: 守護杜爾丹
Key.Chinesesimp: 守卫杜尔丹

Key.Original: Stop the armored counterattack from %1La Trinité%2.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍裝甲部隊從%1拉·特里尼特%2反攻，阻止他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阻止装甲部队从%1拉·特里尼特%2发起的反冲击。

Key.Original: Connect to UAV
Key.Chinese: 建立無人機連線
Key.Chinesesimp: 与无人机(UAV)连接

Key.Original: Connect your terminal to the UAV.
Key.Chinese: 將終端機連上無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把你的终端连接至无人机(UAV)。

Key.Original: UAV Terminal
Key.Chinese: 無人機終端機
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人机(UAV)终端

Key.Original: Take the UAV terminal from the truck when it arrives in %1Houdan%2.
Key.Chinese: 卡車抵達%1胡丹%2後，從中拿取無人機終端機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在卡车到达%1胡丹%2时从那里拿取无人机(UAV)终端。

Key.Original: Guard Prisoners
Key.Chinese: 守護戰俘
Key.Chinesesimp: 守护俘虏

Key.Original: Guard enemy prisoners at the %1church%2 until another team can arrive and collect them.
Key.Chinese: 在%1教堂%2守護敵方戰俘，直到其他隊伍抵達並接手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1教堂%2守护敌军俘虏，直到另一支小组到达收容他们。

Key.Original: Seize Houdan
Key.Chinese: 佔領胡丹
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取胡丹

Key.Original: Eliminate the reinforcements from %1Point Everglades%2 and support friendly forces as they assault the town of %1Houdan%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅從%1大沼澤區點%2來襲的敵方增援，當友方部隊攻擊%1胡丹%2城鎮時從旁支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭来自%1大沼泽区点%2的增援部队，在友军攻击%1胡丹%2镇时支援他们。

Key.Original: Seize Dourdan
Key.Chinese: 佔領杜爾丹
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取杜尔丹

Key.Original: Move through the %3valley%2 and support friendly forces, attacking %4Dourdan%2 from the %1south%2.
Key.Chinese: 穿過%3山谷%2並支援友軍，從%1南邊%2攻擊%4杜爾丹%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿过%3山谷%2，支援从%1南面%2攻击%4杜尔丹%2的友军。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Our forces have suffered unacceptable casualties! Fall back to %1Houdan%2, immediately!
Key.Chinese: 我方部隊受到無可容忍的重大傷亡!退回%1胡丹%2，立刻!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的军队遭受了不可接受的伤亡!立即撤回%1胡丹%2!

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Retreat to %1Camp Noe%2.
Key.Chinese: 撤回%1諾伊營地%2
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤回%1诺伊营地%2

Key.Original: Point Yellowstone
Key.Chinese: "黃石"點
Key.Chinesesimp: "黄石"点

Key.Original: Continue to %3Point Yellowstone%2 and prepare for the assault on %7Dourdan%2.
Key.Chinese: 繼續前往%3黃石點%2，準備攻擊%7杜爾丹%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续前往%3黄石点%2，准备对%7杜尔丹%2发起攻击。

Key.Original: Seize Houdan
Key.Chinese: 佔領胡丹
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取胡丹

Key.Original: Support friendly forces as they assault the town of %1Houdan%2.
Key.Chinese: 在友軍攻擊%1胡丹%2城鎮時，給予支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在友军攻击%1胡丹%2镇时提供支援。

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 整隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新集结

Key.Original: Rendezvous with the APC from Foxtrot on the %1crossroads%2.
Key.Chinese: 與裝甲運兵車碰頭，位置在"狐步舞"的%1十字路%2上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1交叉路口%2与从"狐步舞"的装甲输送车会合。

Key.Original: Ambush Reinforcements
Key.Chinese: 突襲敵方援軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击增援部队

Key.Original: Setup an ambush for reinforcements moving between %1Point Everglades%2 to %3Houdan%2.
Key.Chinese: 敵方援軍在%1大沼澤區點%2到%3胡丹%2之間移動，對他們設下埋伏。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置伏击，对付从%1大沼泽区点%2前往%3胡丹%2的增援部队。

Key.Original: Supply Point
Key.Chinese: 補給點
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给点

Key.Original: Move to %3Point Carlsbad%2 and secure the ammunition supply point.
Key.Chinese: 前往%3卡爾斯巴德點%2，守住彈藥補給點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%3卡尔斯巴德点%2，夺取弹药补给点。

Key.Original: Destroy AT Threats
Key.Chinese: 摧毀反戰車部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭所有反坦克威胁

Key.Original: Locate and then destroy any AT threats in the %1specified area%2, then radio command to commence the assault (0-8-1). If you discover any static launchers, be sure to render them inoperable.
Key.Chinese: 定位並消滅%1指定地區%2的任何反坦克威脅，然後用無線電發佈開始攻擊(0-8-1)的命令。如果發現任何靜態發射器，務必將其癱瘓。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到并消灭%1指定地区%2的任何反坦克威胁，然后用无线电发布开始攻击(0-8-1)的命令。如果发现任何静态发射器，务必将其瘫痪。

Key.Original: Seize Houdan
Key.Chinese: 佔領胡丹
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取胡丹

Key.Original: Attack from the south and seize %1Houdan%2.
Key.Chinese: 從南方攻擊，並佔領%1胡丹%2
Key.Chinesesimp: 从南面进攻，夺取%1胡丹%2

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Our forces have suffered unacceptable casualties! Fall back to %1Camp Noe%2, immediately!
Key.Chinese: 我方部隊受到無可容忍的重大傷亡!退回%1諾伊營地%2，立刻!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的军队遭受了不可接受的伤亡!立即撤回%1诺伊营地%2!

Key.Original: %2Guardian%1 - Command. %7%3Pariah%1 - Your Team. %7%4Alpha%1 - Infantry element. %7%5Bravo%1 - Infantry element.%7%6Charlie%1 - Armored element.
Key.Chinese: %2"守護者"%1-指揮部。%7%3"賤民"%1-你的隊伍。%7%4"Alpha"%1-步兵部隊。%7%5"Bravo"%1-步兵部隊。%7%6"Charlie"%1-裝甲部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"守护者"%1-指挥官。%7%3"贱民"%1-你的小组。%7%4"阿尔法"%1-步兵分队。%7%5"布拉沃"%1-步兵分队。%7%6"查理"%1-装甲分队。

Key.Original: Search the %2designated area%1 for potential AT threats. If you discover anything, take it out. Once the main offensive on %3Houdan%1 begins, your group will need to ambush any CSAT reinforcements moving from %4Point Everglades%1 into the town.
Key.Chinese: 搜尋%2指定地區%1，找出潛在的反戰車威脅。只要發現就立刻收拾掉。一旦開始攻擊%3胡丹%1，你必須突襲任何從%4大沼澤區點%1進入城鎮的廣協同盟增援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索%2指定地区%1，寻找潜在的反坦克威胁。如果你发现了任何威胁，消灭它。一旦对%3胡丹%1的主攻开始，你的小组需要伏击从%4大沼泽区点%1进入镇内的任何广协同盟增援部队。

Key.Original: 1. Check for AT systems in %2the forest%1, beside the road. %6%6 2. Prepare an ambush, possibly at %3Point Sequoia%1, for enemy units leaving %4Point Everglades%1. Do not let them reach %5Houdan%1.
Key.Chinese: 1. 搜查%2森林%1，找出位在路旁的反戰車系統。%6%62. 突襲正要離開%4大沼澤區點%1的敵人，可能的埋伏位置在%3紅衫點%1。別讓敵人進入%5胡丹%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1. 在%2森林%1里的路边搜索反坦克系统。%6%62. 准备伏击离开%4大沼泽区点%1的敌军，也许在%3红杉点%1。别让他们到达%5胡丹%1。

Key.Original: A good effort, Sergeant. You were able to accomplish your objectives and bring home the big win, despite receiving heavy casualties.
Key.Chinese: 你盡力了，中士。你完成了任務目標，迎來了勝利，但隊上死傷慘重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得不错，中士。你能够完成你的目标，取得了重大胜利，尽管遭受了严重伤亡。

Key.Original: You've certainly proved yourself a capable soldier, Sergeant. You executed your orders perfectly and displayed exemplary judgement in the field. Outstanding work!
Key.Chinese: 你證明了自己是位稱職的軍人，中士。你完美執行了自己的任務，還展現了傑出的現場判斷能力。非常優秀!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你绝对证明了自己是个出色的士兵，中士。你完美地执行了命令，在战场上表现出卓越的判断力。干得漂亮!

Key.Original: Sergeant, you may have met your objectives but, quite honestly, I'm not impressed with your performance.
Key.Chinese: 中士，雖然你順利完成了任務，但老實說，我對你的表現並不滿意。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，你也许完成了你的目标，不过说真的，你的表现没有给我留下深刻印象。

Key.Original: Despite the loss of two helicopter gunships, it seems we're making steady gains. The towns of %1Chapoi%2 and %3Cancon%2, as well as the strategic harbor at %4La Riviere%2, are all in our control. More importantly, Malden's capital, %9La Trinité%2, is hanging by a thread. By %8advancing north%2 and striking %6Houdan%2 and %7Dourdan%2, we can isolate the city and prevent critical supplies reaching the frontlines around %10Saint Louis%2. If we play our cards right, this could be over in a matter of hours.
Key.Chinese: 雖然損失了兩架武裝直升機，但看來情勢逐漸對我們有利。%1沙普瓦%2和%3康孔%2城，連同具戰略意義的%4拉·里韋爾%2港，現在都在我們掌握中。重點是，我軍也快拿下馬爾登島的首府%9拉·特立尼特%2了。我們打算藉由%8向北推進%2、攻擊%6胡丹%2和%7杜爾丹%2來孤立城市，並阻止關鍵補給品抵達%10聖路易%2周圍的戰線。要是我軍調度適當，戰事可能幾小時內就會結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管失去了两架武装直升机，看来我们还是稳定地取得进展。%1沙普瓦%2和%3康孔%2镇，以及%4拉·里韦尔%2的战略性港口全都处于我们的控制之下。更重要的是，马尔登岛的首府%9拉·特里尼特%2命悬一线。我们可以%8向北推进%2并攻击%6胡丹%2和%7杜尔丹%2，借此孤立该市，防止重要补给品到达%10圣路易%2附近的前线。如果我们能打好手上的牌，这一切也许会在几小时之内结束。

Key.Original: Seek and destroy potential AT threats ahead of a fullscale offensive.
Key.Chinese: 在全體攻擊之前，務必找出和摧毀潛在反戰車威脅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在全面进攻之前寻找和摧毁潜在的反坦克威胁。

Key.Original: Special Forces
Key.Chinese: 特種部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 特种部队

Key.Original: Join a combined arms assault against the towns of Houdan and Dourdan.
Key.Chinese: 加入聯合軍種攻擊，攻陷胡丹和杜爾丹城。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入对胡丹和杜尔丹镇的诸兵种合同突击。

Key.Original: Infantry
Key.Chinese: 步兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 步兵

Key.Original: Having captured Chapoi and Cancon, NATO push north for a final offensive.
Key.Chinese: 北約已經佔領了沙普瓦和康孔，繼續將北推進，準備發動最後一波攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约已夺取沙普瓦和康孔，正向北推进准备发起最后的进攻。

Key.Original: Disintegration Point
Key.Chinese: 四分五裂
Key.Chinesesimp: 崩溃点

Key.Original: Having captured Chapoi and Cancon, NATO push north for a final offensive.
Key.Chinese: 北約已經佔領了沙普瓦和康孔，繼續將北推進，準備發動最後一波攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约已夺取沙普瓦和康孔，正向北推进准备发起最后的进攻。

Key.Original: Disintegration Point
Key.Chinese: 四分五裂
Key.Chinesesimp: 崩溃点

Key.Original: MISSION FAILED
Key.Chinese: 任務失敗
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务失败

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: %2Guardian%1 - Command.%7%3Pariah%1 - Special forces group.%7%4Alpha%1 - Your team.%7%5Bravo%1 - Infantry element.%7%6Charlie%1 - Armored element.
Key.Chinese: %2守護者%1-指揮部。%7%3賤民%1-特種部隊。%7%4Alpha%1-你的隊伍。%7%5"Bravo"%1-步兵部隊。%7%6"Charlie"%1-裝甲部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2守护者%1-指挥官。%7%3贱民%1-特种部队小组。%7%4阿尔法%1-你的小组。%7%5布拉沃%1-步兵分队。%7%6查理%1-装甲分队。

Key.Original: First, we'll need to seize the town of %2Houdan%1. Once done, your group will move up the coast and secure the %3ammunition dump%1 before joining the main assault on %4Dourdan%1 from the east.
Key.Chinese: 首先，我們必須佔領%2胡丹%1城。完成後，你的隊伍必須前往海岸，肅清%3彈藥庫%1，而後從%4杜爾丹%1東邊加入主要攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 首先，我们必须夺取%2胡丹%1镇。一旦成功，你的小队将前往海岸夺取%3军火库%1，再加入从东面向%4杜尔丹%1发起的主攻。

Key.Original: 1. Move to %2Point Redwood%1, disembark, and capture %3Houdan%1.%11 %11 2. Secure the supply point on the coast at %4Point Carlsbad%1.%11 %11 3. Continue on to %5Point Yellowstone%1, holding our right flank ahead of the attack on %6Dourdan%1.%11 %11 4. Advance through the %7valley%1 and, together with %8Bravo%1 and %9Charlie%1, neutralize all enemy forces in the %10area.%1
Key.Chinese: 1. 前往%2紅木點%1，下車並佔領%3胡丹%1。%11%112. 肅清%4卡爾斯巴德點%1海岸邊的補給點。%11%113. 繼續前往%5黃石點%1，在攻擊%6杜爾丹%1以前堅守右翼防線。%11%114. 穿越%7山谷%1，連同%8"Bravo"%1和%9"Charlie"%1，一塊殲滅%10區域%1內的所有敵軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1. 前往%2红木点%1，下车，夺取%3胡丹%1。%11%112. 夺取海岸上位于%4卡尔斯巴德点%1的补给点。%11%113. 继续前往%5黄石点%1，在进攻%6杜尔丹%1之前守住我们的右翼。%11%114. 穿过%7山谷%1，与%8"布拉沃"%1和%9"查理"%1一道，消灭该%10地区%1的所有敌军。

Key.Original: Not bad work, Sergeant. You succeeded and completed your objectives. But I wonder, could a different approach have been more effective?
Key.Chinese: 表現還不壞，中士。你成功完成了任務目標。但我忍不住會想，說不定還有更有效的作戰方式?
Key.Chinesesimp: 表现不坏，中士。你成功地完成了你的目标。不过我在想，采取另一种方法会不会更有效?

Key.Original: Impressive work, Sergeant! You continue to demonstrate superior leadership skills in the field. Make no mistake, you're a credit to your squad and to your country.
Key.Chinese: 令人印象深刻，中士!你展現了優秀的現場領導能力。無庸置疑，你是自己隊上和國家的光榮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，中士!你在战场上继续表现出卓越的指挥能力。别犯错，你为你的班和你的国家增了光。

Key.Original: Sergeant, you may have met your objectives, but this has been a pyrrhic victory; a lot of good men have died. Quite frankly, I have reservations about your ability to command...
Key.Chinese: 中士，雖然你順利完成了任務，但反倒讓很多弟兄陣亡了，這樣的勝利不光彩。老實說吧，我對你的領導能力持保留態度...
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，你也许完成了你的目标，可是这是一个代价惨痛的胜利。许多好小伙阵亡了。坦白说，我对你的指挥能力有保留看法...

Key.Original: Point Zion
Key.Chinese: 錫安點
Key.Chinesesimp: 锡安点

Container.name: 103_ex_inf_leaving_ao
Container.situation: player is leaving ao.

Key.Original: Mm, must've made a wrong move somewhere - better check the map...
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我一定是哪裡弄錯了-最好看一下地圖...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，肯定在什么地方走错了路-最好查下地图...

Container.name: 102_ex_sf_leaving_ao
Container.situation: player is leaving ao.

Key.Original: Mm, yeah.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，呃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，是啊。

Key.Original: This ain't the right way...
Key.Chinese: 這方向不對...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这条路不对...

Container.name: 101_ex_sf_no_artillery
Container.situation: player runs out of artillery and the tank is still functioning.

Key.Original: You missed your window there, Pariah. Our battery's already recalibrating for St. Louis; you'll have to get creative.
Key.Chinese: 你已經錯失機會了，"賤民"。砲擊部隊已經校正對準聖路易斯了，你必須想其他辦法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你错过了你在那的机会窗口，"贱民"。我们的炮兵已经转调到圣路易方向了，你只能发挥点创意了。

Key.Original: Guardian. I'm not sure how but, uh, our guns were off-target. Over.
Key.Chinese: 守護者。不知為何，炮擊沒打中目標。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"。我不知道是怎么回事，不过，我们的炮弹偏离了目标。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Shit, okay - I'll, uh, I dunno, think outside the box or something. Out.
Key.Chinese: 可惡，好-我、呃，我不知道，我會跳脫思考看看。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，好吧-我会，呃，我不知道，我会想点新招出来。完毕。

Container.name: 100_ex_inf_early_attack
Container.situation: player attacks dourdan without reaching point yellowstone.

Key.Original: Affirmative, Guardian! We're engaging targets in the town.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，"守護者"!我們正在攻擊城內的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，"守护者"!我们正向镇内的目标开火。

Key.Original: Charlie to Guardian - we're hearing gunfire near Dourdan, over.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"呼叫"守護者"-我們聽見杜爾丹附近有槍響，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"呼叫"守护者"-我们听到杜尔丹附近有炮声。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Good copy, Charlie. Alpha team, can you confirm?
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Charlie"。"Alpha"小隊，你們能確認消息嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"查理"。"阿尔法"小组，你能确认吗?

Key.Original: Sweet Jesus, Alpha! It was meant to be a co-ordinated assault! Too late now.
Key.Chinese: 天啊，"Alpha"!這次任務應該是聯合攻擊!現在已經太晚了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪，"阿尔法"!那本该是一次协同攻击!现在太迟了。

Key.Original: Address group: Bravo, Charlie, move in! Out.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫以下團隊:"Bravo"和"Charlie"，進攻!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫小组:"布拉沃"，"查理"，行动!完毕。

Container.name: 099_ex_sf_second_civilian_killed
Container.situation: player kills a second civilian.

Key.Original: Motherfucker...
Key.Chinese: 幹你娘...
Key.Chinesesimp: 妈的...

Key.Original: No way I'm getting out of this one.
Key.Chinese: 我不可能全身而退了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没法摆脱这个罪名了。

Container.name: 098_ex_inf_second_civilian_killed
Container.situation: player kills a second civilian.

Key.Original: Ah, fuck - fuck!
Key.Chinese: 啊，幹-幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，该死，该死!

Key.Original: I'm gonna be doing life in the brig for this...
Key.Chinese: 我這輩子都要吃牢飯了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会因为这个坐一辈子的牢...

Container.name: 097_ex_sf_civilian_killed
Container.situation: player kills a civilian.

Key.Original: Ah, son of a... I dunno if I'll get away with that.
Key.Chinese: 啊，媽的...我看這次絕對推卸不了關係。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，真是活见...我不知道我能不能脱得了身。

Container.name: 096_ex_inf_civilian_killed
Container.situation: player kills a civilian.

Key.Original: Shit... I don't think I'm gonna get away with that.
Key.Chinese: 可惡...我看這次我是推卸不了關係了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...我不知道我能不能脱得了身。

Container.name: 095_ex_inf_execution
Container.situation: player kills an unarmed prisoner in a church.

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Alpha, we've, uh, gotta bit of a situation.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"，我們，呃，碰上一點麻煩。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"阿尔法"，我们，呃，遇到了一点情况。

Key.Original: Those prisoners at the church, one of them, uh, he was, ah -
Key.Chinese: 教堂的戰俘裡，其中一個，呃、他，嗯-
Key.Chinesesimp: 教堂里的那些俘虏，其中的一个，呃，他-

Key.Original: Do not tell me you just shot a prisoner in a house of fucking god, Sergeant Spender!
Key.Chinese: 別告訴我你在神的殿堂開槍打死了戰俘，斯彭德中士!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别告诉我你刚才在该死的教堂打死了一名俘虏，斯彭德中士!

Container.name: 094_ex_sf_execution
Container.situation: player kills an unarmed prisoner in a church.

Key.Original: Do not tell me you just shot a prisoner in a house of fucking god, Sergeant Sturrock!
Key.Chinese: 別告訴我你在神的殿堂開槍打死了戰俘，斯塔羅克中士!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别告诉我你刚才在该死的教堂击中了一名俘虏，斯塔罗克中士!

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Pariah here... those prisoners at the church?
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"...教堂的戰俘...
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"贱民"...教堂里的那些俘虏?

Key.Original: Things escalated kinda quickly here. I had, uh, I had no choice...
Key.Chinese: 狀況一下子就不可收拾了。我，呃，我沒其他選擇...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里的事态升级得挺快。我，呃，我别无选择...

Container.name: 093_ex_sf_uav_winchester_out_b
Container.situation: player's uav is out of ammunition and there is no more fire support. to follow ex_sf_uav_winchester.

Key.Original: Negative, Pariah - not an option...
Key.Chinese: 否定，"賤民"-不可能...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，"贱民"-这不行...

Key.Original: You'll need to improvise. Relinquish control of the drone and find another way to neutralize that armor! Out.
Key.Chinese: 你得臨機應變了。放棄無人機，想其他方法殲滅那臺裝甲!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得随机应变。放弃控制无人机，找别的办法消灭那辆装甲车!完毕。

Container.name: 092_ex_sf_uav_winchester_out_a
Container.situation: player's uav is out of ammunition and they have fire support available. hq denies request to re-arm and suggests player use the uav's laser designator to guide artillery strike. to follow ex_sf_uav_winchester.

Key.Original: Negative, Pariah - use the designator to paint targets for the big guns. Out.
Key.Chinese: 否定，"賤民"-你只能用雷射指標器標記目標，讓重武器解決了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，"贱民"-用激光指示器为大炮指定目标。完毕。

Container.name: 091_ex_sf_uav_winchester
Container.situation: player's uav is out of ammunition.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Pariah.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"贱民"。

Key.Original: Can I land this thing somewhere and rearm?
Key.Chinese: 有地方讓我幫無人機重整武裝嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可以让这东西在什么地方着陆并补充装备吗?

Key.Original: I'm winchester Scalpel.
Key.Chinese: "手術刀"用完了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我用光了"手术刀"导弹。

Container.name: 090_ex_sf_uav_crashed_out
Container.situation: player admits under his breath that he's responsible for crashing the uav. to follow ex_sf_uav_lost_out after ex_sf_uav_crashed.

Key.Original: Yeah, I don't think that'll wash...
Key.Chinese: 嘖，這個藉口絕對經不起考驗...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我想我没法蒙混过关...

Container.name: 089_ex_sf_uav_improvise
Container.situation: hq tells player to find another way to stop the enemy's reinforcements. to follow eve_sf_uav_destroyed or ex_sf_uav_crashed.

Key.Original: Message received, Pariah. Improvise and stop that armor! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到訊息，"賤民"。靈機應變，阻止那臺裝甲!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，"贱民"。随机应变，阻止那辆装甲车!完毕。

Container.name: 088_ex_sf_uav_crashed
Container.situation: player crashes uav and contacts hq.

Key.Original: Mm.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。

Key.Original: Guardian... UAV is down.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"...無人機墜毀了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"...无人机坠落。

Key.Original: Small arms fire, must've been a hundred to one shot - total systems failure.
Key.Chinese: 被小型槍械擊中，萬中選一那種機率-系統完全失效。
Key.Chinesesimp: 轻武器火力，恐怕是中了百分之一的几率-系统完全失灵。

Container.name: 087_sup_no_coordinates
Container.situation: player tries to confirm co-ordinates without selecting any.

Key.Original: Mm... no, I gotta select the target first.
Key.Chinese: 嗯...不行，我得先選好目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...不，我要先选择目标。

Container.name: 086_sup_artillery_support
Container.situation: player calls artillery fire down on the enemy via hq.

Key.Original: Shot.
Key.Chinese: 砲擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击。

Key.Original: Ordnance is inbound, Pariah. Out.
Key.Chinese: 砲彈已發射，"賤民"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已开炮，"贱民"。完毕。

Key.Original: Shot. Over.
Key.Chinese: 砲擊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Standby.
Key.Chinese: 做好準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 待命。

Container.name: 085_sup_sf_artillery_request
Container.situation: player requests artillery strike on desingated co-ordinates.

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah, fire mission.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"，請求火力攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"呼叫，请求火力支援。

Key.Original: Sending you the co-ordinates now...
Key.Chinese: 我把方格坐標傳過去...
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在向你发送坐标...

Container.name: 084_eve_inf_slammer_fires
Container.situation: player is standing close to a tank when it fires its main cannon.

Key.Original: Oah, shit!
Key.Chinese: 呃，可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 噢，该死!

Key.Original: Bring the noise why don't cha!
Key.Chinese: 你乾脆震聾我好了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你干嘛不大声点呢!

Container.name: 083_eve_sf_tank_crew_discovered
Container.situation: the player gets a look at the ethnicity of a dead tank crew.

Key.Original: Are you certain, Pariah?
Key.Chinese: 你確定嗎，"賤民"?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定吗，"贱民"?

Key.Original: Okay, Pariah, we'll pass that on to INSCOM. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好，"贱民"，我們會通知陸軍情報與安全司令部。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，"贱民"，我们会把那转给情报和安全司令部。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian, we're getting played. Some of these CSAT guys are Chinese not African, over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，我們被耍了。這些廣協同盟部隊有部分是中國人，不是非洲人，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我们被耍了。这些广协同盟的家伙里有一些是中国人，不是非洲人。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: I'm as sure as shit-fire, there's a dead tank crew, they're Asian.
Key.Chinese: 我他媽非常確定，那些死掉的戰車隊員是亞洲人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我当然确定，我看到了阵亡的坦克兵，他们是亚洲人。

Container.name: 082_eve_inf_tank_crew_discovered
Container.situation: the player gets a look at the ethnicity of a dead tank crew.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian. Something doesn't quite add up. Gotta dead CSAT tank crew - they're Asian, not African. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"。狀況有點不對勁。死去的廣協同盟戰車隊員-是亞洲人，不是非洲人。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"。有件事不大对劲。看到了阵亡的广协同盟坦克兵-他们是亚洲人，不是非洲人。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: That's good intel, Alpha, we'll get it to INSCOM. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這是個不錯的情報，"Alpha"，我們會通知陸軍情報與安全司令部。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这情报不错，"阿尔法"，我们会转给情报与安全司令部。完毕。

Container.name: 081_eve_inf_tank_fire_out
Container.situation: enemy tank neutralized

Key.Original: He's hit! Whoo, yeah! Boom! We just ganked his ass!
Key.Chinese: 打中它了!好耶!碰碰!打得它屁滾尿流!
Key.Chinesesimp: 它被击中了，耶!轰!我们打了它个狗血喷头!

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Charlie. Enemy armor destroyed. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Charlie"。已摧毀敵方裝甲。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"查理"。敌军装甲车已摧毁。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Good spot, Charlie - carry on, out.
Key.Chinese: 找得好，"Charlie"-繼續努力，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，"查理"-继续，完毕。

Container.name: 080_eve_inf_tank_fire_in
Container.situation: a friendly tank fires at an enemy tank.

Key.Original: Identified! Hostile MBT!
Key.Chinese: 已辨識!是敵方的主戰車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 已识别!敌方主战坦克!

Container.name: 079_eve_sf_uav_destroyed
Container.situation: player loses uav and contacts hq.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: Just lost my feed on the UAV. Over.
Key.Chinese: 無人機視野連線中斷了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我与无人机的通信刚中断。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 078_eve_inf_panther_lost
Container.situation: player alerts hq that their apc is destroyed.

Key.Original: Guardian, some bastard just knocked out our APC!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，有幾個混帳弄爛了我們的裝甲運兵車!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，有个混蛋刚干掉了我们的装甲输送车!

Key.Original: It's not gonna be easy, now, sir, but yeah, affirmative - this shit's getting done. End of. Out.
Key.Chinese: 以現在狀況來說很困難，長官，但好的，確認-我們會搞定這件鳥事。一定會。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那可不容易，长官，可是，嗯，好的-这鬼差事必须得做。完毕。

Key.Original: Christ, we can't sustain these kind of losses, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 老天，我們不能承受這樣的損失，"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪，我们可不能再承受这种损失，"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: Try to unfuck the situation.
Key.Chinese: 試著擺脫這天殺的困境。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设法挽回局势。

Key.Original: Can you take the next objective...?
Key.Chinese: 你們還能接受下一個任務目標嗎...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你能打击下一个目标吗...?

Container.name: 077_eve_sf_weapon_taken_remark
Container.situation: after player takes weapon from a dead enemy, squad member passes comment.

Key.Original: You making friends there, Sarge...?
Key.Chinese: 你在認識新朋友，上士...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你这是交了新朋友吗，中士...?

Key.Original: Yeah... well, I get more sense from him than you.
Key.Chinese: 嗯...嘖，跟他說話比跟你說話有意義多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊...嗯，他比你更讲道理。

Container.name: 076_eve_sf_weapon_taken
Container.situation: player takes weapon from a dead enemy.

Key.Original: Okay...
Key.Chinese: 好吧...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...

Key.Original: I'm just gonna take that.
Key.Chinese: 我必須拿走這個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我把那拿走就好。

Container.name: 075_eve_inf_weapon_taken
Container.situation: player takes weapon from a dead enemy.

Key.Original: Okay...
Key.Chinese: 好吧...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...

Container.name: 074_loc_inf_information
Container.situation: player locates a huge source of information at an enemy hq. laptops, whiteboards, maps, and paperwork.

Key.Original: Holy crap!
Key.Chinese: 老天啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是活见鬼!

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: I think we've found something here!
Key.Chinese: 我們這裡發現東西了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我们在这发现了点东西!

Key.Original: No idea what I'm looking at, but it looks important.
Key.Chinese: 雖然我不知道這是什麼，但是看起來很重要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道这是什么，不过看起来挺重要。

Key.Original: Laptops, maps, charts, paperwork... all kinds of shit.
Key.Chinese: 筆電、地圖、圖表、文件...什麼狗屁都有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 手提电脑、地图、图表、文件...这样的东西。

Key.Original: If you want answers, sir, we may've found them. Over.
Key.Chinese: 如果你們想找答案，長官，這可能就是你要的了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你需要答案，长官，我们也许已经发现了。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Great find, Alpha! We'll get a team in to analyze... out.
Key.Chinese: 找得好，Alpha!我們會派隊伍進駐分析情資...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不错的发现，"阿尔法"!我们会派个小组去分析一下...完毕。

Container.name: 073_loc_sf_information
Container.situation: player locates a huge source of information at an enemy hq. laptops, whiteboards, maps, and paperwork.

Key.Original: That's encouraging, Pariah, outstanding work! We'll have a team go in and analyze, out.
Key.Chinese: 真是個好消息，"賤民"，表現太優秀了!我們會派隊伍進駐分析情資，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那挺鼓舞人，"贱民"，干得漂亮!我们会派个小组去分析一下，完毕。

Key.Original: Hot damn!
Key.Chinese: 帥啦!
Key.Chinesesimp: 真该死!

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: Gotta shit-ton of intel here, you're definitely gonna wanna get a look at this.
Key.Chinese: 這裡的情資多得跟山一樣，你絕對會想看看的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有大量情报，你绝对该来看看。

Key.Original: Must be some sorta HQ. The whole place was rigged to blow - seems we arrived just in time... over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡必定是哪個總部。這裡滿滿是炸藥，隨時能引爆-看來我們來得正是時候...完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 应该是个指挥所什么的。整个地方就要爆炸了-看来我们到的正是时候。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 072_ta_sf_prisoners_secured
Container.situation: player's special forces group secures prisoners.

Key.Original: Solid copy - stand by, we'll assign someone to collect. Out.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚-隨時待命，我們會派人過去接手。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完全明白-待命，我们会派人去领。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"。

Key.Original: Got an eye on those captives. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我看見那些戰俘了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 盯着那些俘虏。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 071_ta_sf_reinforcements_out
Container.situation: player fails to halt reinforcements. hq orders player to join the attack on the town. to follow ta_sf_reinforcements or ta_sf_reinforcements_alone.

Key.Original: Never mind, Pariah. Concentrate your efforts on Houdan.
Key.Chinese: 沒關係，"賤民"。專注攻擊胡丹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没事，"贱民"。专心应付胡丹的事吧。

Key.Original: Capturing the town is our first and foremost objective. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們的首要目標是佔領該城。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取城镇是我们的首要目标。完毕。

Container.name: 070_ta_sf_reinforcements_alone
Container.situation: player's group fails to halt reinforcements. hq orders player to join the attack on the town. to follow ta_sf_reinforcements_in.

Key.Original: I wasn't able to spring that ambush at Point Sequoia. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我沒辦法在紅衫點設下埋伏。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没法在红杉点设置伏击。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 069_ta_sf_reinforcements
Container.situation: player fails to halt reinforcements. hq orders player to join the attack on the town. to follow ta_sf_reinforcements_in.

Key.Original: The enemy were able to get past us at Point Sequoia, over.
Key.Chinese: 紅衫點這裡的敵人突破我們的防線了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们没能在红杉点挡住敌军，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 068_ta_sf_reinforcements_in
Container.situation: player fails to halt reinforcements. hq orders player to join the attack on the town.

Key.Original: Guardian, small setback.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，有個小問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，小挫折。

Container.name: 067_ta_all_reinforcements_neutralized
Container.situation: player's group successfully eliminates reinforcements and is ordered by hq to support infantry in attacking the town.

Key.Original: Copy, well handled, now support the assault on Houdan. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，處理得很好，現在去胡丹支援作戰。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，处理得不错，现在去支援对胡丹的进攻。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian - Pariah here.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"-這是"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"-这里是"贱民"。

Key.Original: Enemy dismounts near Point Everglades are KIA.
Key.Chinese: 大沼澤區點附近的敵人都在行動中陣亡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已消灭在大沼泽区点附近的徒步敌军。

Container.name: 066_eve_sf_nato_ambushed_tank_out
Container.situation: friendly armored units are ambushed by enemy tank, hidden in a forest. hq orders player to retreat.

Key.Original: All teams, withdraw!
Key.Chinese: 所有部隊，撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小队，撤退!

Key.Original: Pariah, goddamn it! You must've missed something in that forest! Abort the operation and retreat immediately! Out.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，天殺的!你一定是沒好好注意森林的動靜!中止行動，立刻撤退!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，真见鬼!你肯定在那个森林里漏掉了什么!中止行动，立即撤退!完毕。

Container.name: 065_eve_sf_nato_at_bravo_in
Container.situation: friendly armored units are ambushed by enemy at launcher, hidden in a forest. hq orders player to retreat. bravo are hit.

Key.Original: Guardian, Bravo - Alpha's taking AT fire from the tree line!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"-"Alpha"受到反戰車攻擊，攻擊者在林線上!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"布拉沃"呼叫-林木线那里有反坦克火力向"阿尔法"射击!

Key.Original: Advise! Over.
Key.Chinese: 請指示!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请指示!完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 064_eve_sf_nato_at_alphaspeaker_in
Container.situation: friendly armored units are ambushed by enemy at launcher, hidden in a forest. hq orders player to retreat. bravo are hit.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian - flash!
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"-緊急訊息!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"-重要情况!

Key.Original: Bravo's hit!
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"中彈了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"中弹!

Key.Original: Must've been a fucking RPG or Titan launcher, I dunno!
Key.Chinese: 應該是天殺的火箭推進榴彈，或"泰坦"發射器之類的，我不知道!
Key.Chinesesimp: 应该是该死的火箭推进榴弹或"泰坦"发射器，我不知道!

Key.Original: It came from the tree line - advise! Over.
Key.Chinese: 從林線上攻來的-請指示!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是从林木线那边来的-请指示!完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 063_eve_sf_nato_ambushed_out
Container.situation: friendly armored units are ambushed by enemy tank, hidden in a forest. hq orders player to retreat.

Key.Original: Do not engage that tank - pop smoke and fall back.
Key.Chinese: 別和那臺戰車交戰-投擲煙霧彈並撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别向那辆坦克开火-发射烟雾弹并撤退。

Key.Original: Pariah, exfil! There's armor in the AO! Abort the operation and retreat immediately! Out.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，撤!任務區有敵方裝甲!中止行動，立刻撤退!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，撤离!行动区域有装甲车!中止行动，立即撤退!完毕。

Key.Original: Ah... shit on it.
Key.Chinese: 呃...真有夠衰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊...该死。

Container.name: 062_eve_sf_nato_ambushed_bravo_tank
Container.situation: friendly armored units are ambushed by enemy tank, hidden in a forest.

Key.Original: Contact! Contact! Guardian, this is Bravo!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!接敵!"守護者"，這是"Bravo"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遇敌!遇敌!"守护者"，这里是"布拉沃"!

Key.Original: Alpha's hit!
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"中彈了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"中弹!

Key.Original: I - I don't know what the hell just happened, wait.
Key.Chinese: 我-我不知道他媽的出了什麼事，等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我-我不知道刚才发生了什么事，等一下。

Key.Original: Fuck me, it's an MBT! Advise! Over.
Key.Chinese: 我的天，是主戰車!請指示!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死的，那是辆主战坦克!请指示!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, Bravo.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Bravo"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"布拉沃"。

Container.name: 061_eve_sf_nato_ambushed_alpha_tank
Container.situation: friendly armored units are ambushed by enemy tank, hidden in a forest.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian - flash!
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"-緊急訊息!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"-紧急情况!

Key.Original: Bravo's hit!
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"中彈了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"中弹!

Key.Original: It's an MBT! Advise! Over.
Key.Chinese: 是主戰車!請指示!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是辆主战坦克!请指示!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"。

Container.name: 060_eve_sf_area_cleared_d
Container.situation: player clears an enemy position. two static at launchers discovered.

Key.Original: Send your message. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請說。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 发送你的消息。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Outstanding. Keep it up.
Key.Chinese: 太漂亮了。繼續保持。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮。继续。

Key.Original: Guardian, come in.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，請回答。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，请回答。

Key.Original: Just bagged a couple of Titan launchers at Point Congaree.
Key.Chinese: 我們在康加里點解決掉幾組"泰坦"發射器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚在康加里点找到了两个"泰坦"发射器。

Key.Original: They would've had someone a real bad day, for sure...
Key.Chinese: 沒處理的話，絕對會讓我們傷亡慘重...
Key.Chinesesimp: 它们本会让某些人日子很惨，那是肯定的...

Key.Original: Acknowledged, we'll see what else's nearby. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，我們繼續找附近還有什麼。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们会看看附近还有什么别的。完毕。

Container.name: 059_eve_sf_area_cleared_c
Container.situation: player clears an enemy position. static at launcher discovered.

Key.Original: Excellent. Carry on, Pariah, out.
Key.Chinese: 太好了。繼續任務，"賤民"，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太好了。继续，"贱民"，完毕。

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: Found one of your launchers here...
Key.Chinese: 我們發現一組你說的發射器...
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这找到了你的一个发射器...

Key.Original: Point Denali.
Key.Chinese: 在德納里點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 德纳里点。

Key.Original: It's taken care of. Over.
Key.Chinese: 已經處理掉了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我搞定它了。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 058_eve_sf_area_cleared_b_out
Container.situation: player clears an enemy position. no at discovered. hq orders player to continue the search. to follow eve_sf_cleared_a_in or eve_sf_area_cleared_b_in.

Key.Original: Good job, Pariah. But don't abandon your search. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好，"賤民"。但別放棄尋找。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，"贱民"。不过别放弃搜索。完毕。

Container.name: 057_eve_sf_area_cleared_b_in
Container.situation: player clears an enemy position. no at discovered.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Pariah.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"贱民"。

Key.Original: Located an observation post at Point Arches.
Key.Chinese: 在拱門點發現敵方觀察站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 位于拱门点的一个观察哨。

Key.Original: Only lightly defended.
Key.Chinese: 防守很薄弱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只有简单的防御设施。

Key.Original: It's clear now, but, uh, there's no AT gear around, over.
Key.Chinese: 現在已經安全了，但是，呃，附近沒有反戰車裝備，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它现在安全，不过，呃，附近没有反坦克装备，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 056_eve_sf_area_cleared_a_in
Container.situation: player clears an enemy position. no at discovered.

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"呼叫。

Key.Original: Ran into a small CSAT group at Point Congaree.
Key.Chinese: 我在康加里點碰見一支廣協同盟小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在康加里点遇到了一小支广协同盟部队。

Key.Original: There's some alpha victors here but nothing too heavy, over.
Key.Chinese: 這附近有些裝甲載具，但沒有重型裝甲，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有些装甲车，不过没什么太重型的武器，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 055_ta_sf_counterattacked_neutralized
Container.situation: player informs hq that all armored targets are destroyed and that the counterattack has been repelled.

Key.Original: Good going, Pariah, we're seeing it across the board, CSAT's frontlines are crumbling!
Key.Chinese: 進行得很順利啊，"賤民"，廣協同盟的防線全面崩潰了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好样的，"贱民"，我们全都看到了，广协同盟的战线正在崩溃!

Key.Original: Guardian, it's over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，反攻結束了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，结束了。

Key.Original: All enemy reinforcements destroyed.
Key.Chinese: 已經殲滅所有敵方增援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已消灭所有敌军增援部队。

Container.name: 054_ta_sf_terminal_connected
Container.situation: player connects uav terminal.

Key.Original: Guardian... I'm in.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"...我連好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"...我接入了。

Container.name: 053_ta_sf_terminal
Container.situation: player collects uav terminal.

Key.Original: Ah, problem solved.
Key.Chinese: 好了，問題解決。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，问题解决了。

Container.name: 052_ta_sf_change_of_plan_d
Container.situation: player responds to hq and informs them that they cannot access uav terminal. hq rebukes player and suggests they retrieve one from vehicle.

Key.Original: Alright, wait one.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，等一下。

Key.Original: Pariah, we've managed to source you a control set for that UAV.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，我們會設法把一臺無人機控制器送到你那去。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，我们设法为你找到了那台无人机的控制器。

Key.Original: Ah, negative - I haven't got one on me.
Key.Chinese: 呃，沒有-身上剛好沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，不行-我没带。

Key.Original: A HEMTT's arriving for those prisoners... terminal's coming with it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 有臺重型機動戰術卡車正要去接戰俘...順便把終端機送過去。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆去接那些俘虏的重型增程机动战术卡车即将到达...终端在车上。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Okay, great, soon as I have it I'll connect.
Key.Chinese: 好，太好了，我一拿到就連線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，太棒了，我一拿到它就连接无人机。

Container.name: 051_ta_sf_change_of_plan_c
Container.situation: player responds to hq and informs them that they can access uav terminal.

Key.Original: Affirmative, I have - wait, while I connect.
Key.Chinese: 確認，我有-等等，我連個線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，我已经-等等，我正在连接。

Container.name: 050_eve_sf_change_of_plan_b_alt
Container.situation: hq warn player's special forces group about a counterattack. a uav is inbound. player is tasked with using it to destroy the enemy's armored assets.

Key.Original: Listen, Sergeant. Delta team have a Falcon drone online.
Key.Chinese: 聽我說，中士。"Delta"小隊有架"獵鷹"無人機正在值勤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，中士。"德尔塔"小组有一架"猎鹰"无人机已连线。

Container.name: 049_eve_sf_change_of_plan_b
Container.situation: hq warn player's special forces group about a counterattack. a uav is inbound. player is tasked with using it to destroy the enemy's armored assets.

Key.Original: There's not much between you and La Trinité...
Key.Chinese: 拉·特立里尼特到你那裡幾乎是暢行無阻...
Key.Chinesesimp: 在你和拉·特里尼特之间没有什么兵力...

Key.Original: It could be legit.
Key.Chinese: 可能是來真的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这也许是来真的。

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah. Look, it might be nothing, but, I overheard some talk about a counterattack.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。聽我說，這消息可能不準確，但我偶然聽見戰俘提到反攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"叫。听着，这也许没什么，不过我听到有人提起反攻的事。

Key.Original: Listen, Sergeant. Delta team have a Greyhawk drone online.
Key.Chinese: 聽我說，中士。"Delta"小隊有架"獵鷹"無人機正在值勤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，中士。"德尔塔"小组有一架"猎鹰"无人机已连线。

Key.Original: If you have a terminal, then you can get command authority.
Key.Chinese: 如果你手邊有終端機，就可以操縱它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你有台终端，你就能得到指挥权。

Key.Original: Fuck.
Key.Chinese: 幹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕。

Container.name: 048_eve_sf_change_of_plan_a
Container.situation: player overhears the prisoners speaking about a counterattack and reinforcements.

Key.Original: Arrêtez - comment?
Key.Chinese: 停下-怎麽樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下-怎么样?

Key.Original: Renforts ?
Key.Chinese: 增强?
Key.Chinesesimp: 增强?

Key.Original: Pas de panique, Caporal. Les Américains ne savent pas dans quoi ils se sont mis.
Key.Chinese: 不要驚慌，下士。美國佬不知道他們在做什麽
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要惊慌，下士。美国佬不知道他们在做什么。

Key.Original: J'ai reçu un appel. Les renforts arrivent de La Trinité.
Key.Chinese: 我接到了一個電話，增援部隊來自拉·特里尼特。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我接到了一个电话，增援部队来自拉·特里尼特

Key.Original: Si on peut les retenir ici aussi longtemps que possible, nos amis en Chine pourront…
Key.Chinese: 如果我們能夠儘可能長時間留在這裡，我們在中國的朋友將能夠...
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们能够尽可能长时间留在这里，我们在中国的朋友将能够...

Key.Original: Rien.
Key.Chinese: 没什么。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没什么。

Key.Original: Euh... oui, vos renforts. Vous comptez nous déployer quelque part?
Key.Chinese: 呃...是的，你的增援。 你打算在某個地方部署嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃...是的，你的增援。 你打算在某个地方部署吗？

Container.name: 047_ta_all_first_town_captured
Container.situation: hq informs player that the first town has been captured. player's special forces group is asked to secure some prisoners.

Key.Original: Charlie to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: Houdan and Point Katmai are secure.
Key.Chinese: 胡丹和卡特邁點安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 胡丹和卡特迈点安全。

Key.Original: Also... yup, we've got a white flag at the church.
Key.Chinese: 還有...嗯，教堂上掛了面白旗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有...我们在教堂看到了一面白旗。

Key.Original: I say again, we've got a white flag at the church. Enemy combatants are surrendering, over.
Key.Chinese: 我重複，教堂上掛了面白旗。敵方戰鬥員投降了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我再说一遍，我们在教堂看到了一面白旗。敌军士兵投降了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy that, Charlie.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Charlie"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"查理"。

Key.Original: Pariah, this is Guardian... are you available for tasking?
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，這是"守護者"...你還能接受命令嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，这里是"守护者"...你可以执行任务吗?

Key.Original: Babysitting detail.
Key.Chinese: 是件小事，看管戰俘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看管俘虏的事情。

Key.Original: Head over there and supervise those prisoners. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你到那裡監管他們。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到那去看管那些战俘。完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative.
Key.Chinese: 肯定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。

Container.name: 046_eve_charlie_rpg
Container.situation: charlie actual comes under fire from an rpg.

Key.Original: RPG! Church, one o'clock! Nail that fucker!
Key.Chinese: 火箭推進榴彈!教堂，一點鐘方向!解決掉那個鬼東西!
Key.Chinesesimp: 火箭推进榴弹!教堂，一点钟位置!搞定它!

Key.Original: Hooyah! Got him!
Key.Chinese: 呀呼!打中了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶!击中它了!

Container.name: 045_ta_sf_tank_destroyed_out
Container.situation: player reports that he's destroyed the tank with artillery. to follow ta_sf_tank_destroyed_in_a or ta_sf_tank_destroyed_in_b.

Key.Original: Copy, top form.
Key.Chinese: 收到，表現太傑出了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得漂亮。

Key.Original: Keep doing what you're doing - out.
Key.Chinese: 繼續保持-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接着做你正在做的事，完毕。

Container.name: 044_ta_sf_tank_destroyed_in_b
Container.situation: player reports that he's destroyed the tank by other means.

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah, we got the better of that armor.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"，我們解決掉那臺裝甲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"，我们摧毁了那辆装甲车。

Container.name: 043_ta_sf_tank_destroyed_in_a
Container.situation: player reports that he's destroyed the tank with artillery.

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah, gotta good hit on that armor.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"，擊中那臺裝甲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"，我们直接击中了那辆装甲车。

Container.name: 042_ta_sf_tank_in_forest
Container.situation: player discovers a concealed enemy tank in a forest and requests cas. hq denies request but offers artillery strike.

Key.Original: Receiving you, Pariah. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"賤民"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"贱民"。完毕。

Key.Original: Great catch! Your eagle eye, Sergeant... I guess all squads will owe you big.
Key.Chinese: 太棒了!眼力不錯啊，中士...看來所有分隊都欠你一份大人情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得不错!你的眼睛真锐利，中士。我想所有小队都欠你一个大人情。

Key.Original: Guardian, do you read?
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，你收到了吗?

Key.Original: Fire support's online - out.
Key.Chinese: 啟動火力支援-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 火力支援在线-完毕。

Key.Original: Spotted an enemy tank.
Key.Chinese: 發現一臺敵方戰車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 发现一辆敌军坦克。

Key.Original: So, er, that ordnance. It'd be real appreciated.
Key.Chinese: 所以，呃，來點砲擊好嗎。非常感謝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，呃，要是能炮击它就太好了。

Container.name: 041_ta_sf_support_infantry_alone_b
Container.situation: player's special forces group notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated. hq recommend player joins attack on town but also mentions a threat from enemy reinforcements. player is given the optional task of setting up an ambush. to follow ta_sf_ambush_order_done_alone.

Key.Original: Damn it!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼!

Key.Original: Alright, Pariah, try and avoid confronting the enemy directly, slow those reinforcements down with Claymores if you got them. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，"賤民"，試著避免直接與敵人對上，你手上有闊劍地雷的話，利用它們拖慢敵方援軍的速度。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，"贱民"，设法避免与敌军正面交战，用阔剑地雷拖住那些增援部队，如果你能有的话。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, Guardian, but it's just me...
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守護者"，但是就剩我了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守护者"，可这儿就剩下我了...

Key.Original: The others, they - they didn't make it.
Key.Chinese: 其他人，他們-他們沒氣了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 其他人，他们-他们没能活下来。

Container.name: 040_ta_sf_support_infantry_alone_a
Container.situation: player notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated and that an enemy reinforcements group has also been neutralized. player is ordered to join infantry attacking on the first town, even though he is alone. to follow ta_sf_ambush_order_done_alone.

Key.Original: Understood, disregard my last.
Key.Chinese: 了解，那就別管我最後的訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，我的上一条指示取消。

Key.Original: Join Alpha and Bravo. Lend whatever support you can and help them seize Houdan. Out.
Key.Chinese: 和"Alpha"與"Bravo"會合。盡你所能支援他們佔領胡丹。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"阿尔法"和"布拉沃"。给予你能给的任何支援，帮助他们夺取胡丹。完毕。

Key.Original: I'm already a step ahead, Guardian.
Key.Chinese: 比你早一步，"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我已经领先一步了，"守护者"。

Key.Original: There's nothing there.
Key.Chinese: 那裡什麼也沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里什么都没有。

Key.Original: But, I'm the last man standing now.
Key.Chinese: 但，我是隊上的最後一人了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，现在只剩下我一个了。

Key.Original: My team, they're gone.
Key.Chinese: 我的隊友，都陣亡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的小组，他们都完了。

Container.name: 039_ta_sf_support_infantry
Container.situation: player's special forces group notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated and that an enemy reinforcements group has also been neutralized. player is ordered to support attack on the first town. to follow ta_sf_ambush_order_done_alone.

Key.Original: Impressive work - then disregard my last.
Key.Chinese: 真是精采-那就別管我最後的訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮-那么我的上一条指令取消。

Key.Original: Join Alpha and Bravo. Support their attack on Houdan. Out.
Key.Chinese: 和"Alpha"與"Bravo"會合。支援他們攻擊胡丹。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"阿尔法"和"布拉沃"。支援他们攻击胡丹。完毕。

Key.Original: One step ahead of you, Guardian. We already cleaned house.
Key.Chinese: 我們比你早一步，"守護者"。我們已經掃蕩過房屋了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 比你抢先了一步，"守护者"。我们已经扫荡了房子。

Key.Original: Point Everglades is outta the equation, over.
Key.Chinese: 大沼澤區點已經無足輕重了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大沼泽区点已经解决了，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 038_ta_sf_ambush_order_done_alone
Container.situation: player is ordered to setup an ambush but his squard are all dead or the task has already been completed. to follow ta_sf_ambush_order.

Key.Original: Move to Point Sequoia then setup an ambush, over.
Key.Chinese: 前往紅衫點，設下埋伏，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往红杉点然后设置一次伏击，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 037_ta_sf_ambush_order_simple
Container.situation: player is ordered to setup an ambush and his squard are present and the task has not already been completed. to follow ta_sf_ambush_order.

Key.Original: Move to Point Sequoia then setup an ambush, out.
Key.Chinese: 前往紅衫點，設下埋伏，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往红杉点设置一次伏击，完毕。

Container.name: 036_ta_sf_ambush_order
Container.situation: player concludes radio transmission to hq, after explaining all at threats have been eliminated. hq orders special forces to setup an ambush for potential enemy reinforcements and infantry to attack. to follow ta_all_ambush_a_in, ta_all_ambush_a_alone_in, ta_all_ambush_b_in, ta_all_ambush_b_alone_in, ta_all_ambush_c_in, ta_all_ambush_d_in, ta_all_ambush_d_alone_in.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, good hunting.
Key.Chinese: 確認，狩獵愉快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得好。

Key.Original: The road to Houdan is open.
Key.Chinese: 往胡丹的路可以通行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通往胡丹的道路畅通。

Container.name: 035_ta_sf_ambush_c_in
Container.situation: player's special forces group notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated. hq orders special forces to setup an ambush for potential enemy reinforcements and infantry to attack. tank and one at site were destroyed.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian, with that armor destroyed and the AT site as well, I reckon we got the lot.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"，我們摧毀了敵方裝甲連同那處反戰車基地，我認為應該是找對地方了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"，既然那辆装甲车和反坦克工事已经被毁，我想我们占领了这地方。

Container.name: 034_ta_sf_ambush_b_in
Container.situation: player's special forces group notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated. hq orders special forces to setup an ambush for potential enemy reinforcements and infantry to attack. tank and both at sites were destroyed.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian, with that armor destroyed and those AT sites too, I reckon we got the lot.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"，我們摧毀了敵方裝甲連同那幾處反戰車基地，我認為應該是找對地方了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"，既然那辆装甲车和那些反坦克工事都已被毁，我想我们占领了这地方。

Container.name: 033_ta_all_ambush_a_alone_in
Container.situation: player's special forces group notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated. hq orders special forces to setup an ambush for potential enemy reinforcements and infantry to attack. only one at site was destroyed. tank may or may not have been eliminated.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: I'm, uh, I'm pretty sure we're done here.
Key.Chinese: 我、呃，我確定這裡就是這樣了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我，呃，我相当确信我们这里已经完事了。

Container.name: 032_ta_all_ambush_a_in
Container.situation: player's special forces group notifies hq and explains all at threats have been eliminated. hq orders special forces to setup an ambush for potential enemy reinforcements and infantry to attack. both at sites were destroyed. tank may or may not have been eliminated.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian, two AT sites... I don't think there's much else out here.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"，兩座反戰車據點...我覺得應該就是這些了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"，两个反坦克工事...我想这里没有什么别的了。

Container.name: 031_am_sf_situation_chatter
Container.situation: squad member asks player about the current situation and conflict with csat.

Key.Original: Hey, Sturrock.
Key.Chinese: 欸，斯塔羅克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，斯塔罗克。

Key.Original: Any idea what the fuck is going on?
Key.Chinese: 你知道狀況究竟是怎樣嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道这到底是怎么回事吗?

Key.Original: I mean - y'know, are we at war with CSAT now or what?
Key.Chinese: 我是說-你懂的，我們現在是在和廣協同盟交戰嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是-你知道，我们现在是和广协同盟交战还是怎么的?

Key.Original: Great. That's, great.
Key.Chinese: 好。真好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太好了。那真是，太好了。

Key.Original: The Colonel must've told you something...?
Key.Chinese: 上校一定和你說了些什麼吧...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上校肯定告诉过你什么吧...?

Key.Original: Yeah and no... maybe.
Key.Chinese: 是也不是...大概吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，也不是...也许吧。

Key.Original: Suck it up, Kulansky.
Key.Chinese: 你撐著點，庫蘭斯基。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真该死，库兰斯基。

Key.Original: All I know is - we don't know shit!
Key.Chinese: 我只知道-我們什麼狗屁也不知道!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我只知道-我们什么都不知道!

Container.name: 030_ta_sf_introduction_b_out
Container.situation: player concludes conversation with hq.

Key.Original: Roger that, we'll be in touch. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們會保持聯絡。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们保持联系。完毕。

Container.name: 029_ta_sf_introduction_c_out
Container.situation: hq contacts player and orders them to begin the mission. player used air support previously.

Key.Original: Just don't screw up, Pariah. We can't risk another airstrike... not after what happened to our gunships at St. Louis.
Key.Chinese: 千萬別搞砸，"賤民"。我們不能冒險引起空中攻擊...在我方武裝直升機折損在聖路易之後，更是不能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别搞砸了，"贱民"。我们不能冒再受一次空袭的风险...特别是在我们的武装直升机在圣路易发生了那种事以后。

Key.Original: This has got to run like clockwork.
Key.Chinese: 這次任務必須分毫不差。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这次行动必须精确无误。

Container.name: 028_ta_sf_introduction_a
Container.situation: hq contacts player and orders them to begin the mission.

Key.Original: Pariah, SITREP.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，狀況回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，状况报告。

Key.Original: Copy, keep moving.
Key.Chinese: 收到，繼續行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，继续移动。

Key.Original: Once you've found those AT threats, destroy them and report back.
Key.Chinese: 找出敵人的反戰車威脅後就動手摧毀，之後向我回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦你发现了那些反坦克威胁，摧毁它们并发回报告。

Key.Original: On task, Guardian, we're about half a klick from our FOB.
Key.Chinese: 正在執行任務，"守護者"，離前進作戰基地大約半公里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在执行任务，"守护者"，我们离前进作战基地约半公里。

Container.name: 027_ta_all_second_support_fail
Container.situation: player contacts hq and notifies them that all friendly armored assets have been destroyed (apcs and tanks). hq orders all callsigns to retreat.

Key.Original: Guardian, we're getting slaughtered here!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，我們要被分屍了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我们这儿遭到屠杀!

Key.Original: Massive casualties! All friendly armor's fucked. There's no way we can capture Dourdan now - no way in hell! Over.
Key.Chinese: 死傷慘重!我方裝甲都完蛋了。我們現在沒可能佔領胡丹的-絕不可能!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伤亡惨重!所有友军装甲车都被毁。我们现在没法夺取胡丹-根本没办法!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, Alpha - disengage and retreat immediately. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"-脫離戰鬥，立刻撤退。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"-停止开火并立即撤退。完毕。

Container.name: 026_eve_all_first_support_fail
Container.situation: player contacts hq and notifies them that all friendly tanks (charlie) have been destroyed (apcs and tanks). hq explains that reinforcements are on the way.

Key.Original: Charlie, this is Alpha, do you read me...? Over.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"，這是"Alpha"，你收到嗎...?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"，这里是"阿尔法"，你收到了吗...?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Charlie, come in!
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"，請回答!
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"，请回复!

Key.Original: Guardian, we've lost comms with all our armored support!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，我們和所有裝甲支援失去聯繫!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我们与所有装甲支援的通信中断!

Key.Original: Understood, Alpha, friendly armor's moving up. ETA 2 mikes. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"守護者"，我軍裝甲已經出動。預計再2分鐘抵達。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"阿尔法"，友军装甲车正在向你们开去，预计2分钟后到达。完毕。

Container.name: 025_eve_inf_uav_inbound_alt
Container.situation: hq tells player that enemy tanks are entering the ao. a friendly uav is inbound.

Key.Original: Tasking a rotary-wing UCAV to cut them off. Guardian - out.
Key.Chinese: 已經派出旋轉翼無人戰鬥空中載具攔截敵人。"守護者"，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 派遣一架旋翼无人战斗机去拦截他们。"守护者"-完毕。

Container.name: 024_eve_inf_uav_inbound
Container.situation: hq tells player that enemy tanks are entering the ao. a friendly uav is inbound.

Key.Original: Alpha, we've got intel on a sizeable enemy counterattack coming from the north.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，情資顯示大批敵方從北邊發動反攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，我们收到情报，敌军将从北面发起相当大规模的反攻。

Key.Original: Tasking a Greyhawk to cut them off. Guardian - out.
Key.Chinese: 已經派出"獵鷹"攔截敵人。"守護者"，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已经派遣"獵鷹"拦截敌人。"守护者"-完毕。

Container.name: 023_eve_inf_enemy_in_houses_cleared
Container.situation: player contacts hq and explains that they've cleared a building containing enemy forces.

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Alpha, we're back on track.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"，我們繼續進行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"阿尔法"，我们回到正轨了。

Key.Original: All hostiles at that problem building have been neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: 已經殲滅該建築中的所有敵方。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已消灭那幢问题建筑里的所有敌军。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Message received, Alpha, proceed to Point Carlsbad. Out.
Key.Chinese: 訊息收到，"Alpha"，前往卡爾斯巴德點。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，"阿尔法"，前往卡尔斯巴德点。完毕。

Container.name: 022_eve_inf_enemy_in_houses
Container.situation: player contacts hq and explains that enemy units have seized civilian houses. hq orders player to clear those houses and warns him about collateral damage.

Key.Original: Guardian - we're taking fire from a building near that ammunition supply point!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"-我們受到攻擊，攻擊者在彈藥補給點附近的建築!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"-弹药补给站附近的一幢建筑里有人向我们开火!

Key.Original: It's a civilian house! Over.
Key.Chinese: 是民用住宅!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是幢平民房屋!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Clear them out, Alpha; use grenades if you have to - but, be careful of collateral damage. Out.
Key.Chinese: 把攻擊者解決掉，"Alpha"，必要時使用手榴彈-但小心，別造成間接損傷。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干掉他们，"阿尔法";在必要时使用手榴弹-不过，要小心附带伤害。完毕。

Container.name: 021_eve_point_yellowstone_out_no_bravo
Container.situation: player arrives at point yellowstone and joins charlie for the attack on dourdan. hq informs player that bravo are all gone.

Key.Original: Bravo have been completely wiped out but Charlie's engaging from the south. Out.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"整隊陣亡，但"Charlie"正從南方接近。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"已经全部阵亡，不过"查理"正从南面接战。完毕。

Container.name: 020_eve_point_yellowstone_out
Container.situation: hq reminds player that both bravo and charlie are attacking from the south.

Key.Original: Bravo and Charlie teams will follow suit from the south... out.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"和"Charlie"隨後會從南方跟上...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"和"查理"小组将从南面也这么做...完毕。

Container.name: 019_eve_point_yellowstone
Container.situation: player arrives at point yellowstone and joins bravo and charlie for the attack on dourdan.

Key.Original: Guardian, Alpha - we made it, we're in position outside Dourdan. Do you copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"-我們到了，現在在胡丹外的定點。你收到沒?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"阿尔法"叫-我们到了，我们已在胡丹镇外就位。收到了吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Guardian copies all.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"完整收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"全部收到。

Key.Original: Commence the attack, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 開始攻擊，"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始攻击，"阿尔法"。

Container.name: 018_eve_bravo_gone
Container.situation: charlie radio bravo, only to discover they're all gone.

Key.Original: Bravo, what's your status?
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"，你那邊狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"，你的情况怎样?

Key.Original: Bravo, it's Charlie. Respond! Over.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"，這是"Charlie"。請回話!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"，这里是"查理"。请回复!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Charlie to Guardian, we can't raise Bravo.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"呼叫"守護者"，我們聯絡不上"Bravo"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"呼叫"守护者"，我们没法联系上"布拉沃"。

Key.Original: Shit... that was a six-man team! Focus on the mission, we'll send in a MEDEVAC. Out.
Key.Chinese: 可惡...那可是六人小隊!你專心執行任務，我們會加派救護支援。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...那是个六个人的小组!专心执行任务，我们将派遣一架救伤直升机。完毕。

Container.name: 017_ta_inf_supply_cleared
Container.situation: hq notifies hq and explains they've seized the supply depot. apc is en route to collect player's group from a nearby crossroads. hq orders player to assume command and move to the next objective.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian, we're at Point Carlsbad - looks like we've hit the jackpot, sir!
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"，我們在卡爾斯巴德點這裡-看來找對地方了，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"，我们在卡尔斯巴德点-看来我们撞大运了，长官!

Key.Original: There's enough weapons and ammo here to start World War fucking Three, over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡的武器和彈藥足夠供應第三次世界大戰了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有足够的武器和弹药来发动第三次世界大战，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy your last, Alpha, we'll send a group to hold it.
Key.Chinese: 收到最新消息，"Alpha"，我們會派人前往駐守。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到你的上一条消息，"阿尔法"，我们会派一个小组去控制它。

Key.Original: RV with that APC at the crossroads, grid 075-062.
Key.Chinese: 你去十字路和裝甲運兵車碰頭，方格坐標075-062。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在交叉路口与那辆装甲输送车会合，坐标075-062。

Key.Original: Assume command, then approach Point Yellowstone, out.
Key.Chinese: 由你帶領作戰，之後前往"黃石"點，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 担任指挥，再前往黄石点，完毕。

Container.name: 016_ta_inf_second_town_captured
Container.situation: player contacts hq and explains that the second town has been captured. the enemy are surrendering across the island. the mission ends successfully.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Alpha.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: All tasks complete - both towns are in our control.
Key.Chinese: 已經完成所有勤務-兩座城鎮都在我們掌握中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有任务都完成了-两个城镇都处于我们的控制之下。

Key.Original: It was a helluva fight, sir, over.
Key.Chinese: 戰況非常激烈，長官，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是场恶战，长官，完毕。

Key.Original: Excellent work, Sergeant! We're getting reports from La Trinité...
Key.Chinese: 表現太優秀了，中士!我們剛收到從拉·特里尼特送來的報告...
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，中士!我们收到了来自拉·特里尼特的报告...

Key.Original: CSAT's Scimitar Regiment just threw in the towel. Expect a full cessation of hostilities within the hour! Out.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟的彎刀軍團剛剛投降了。應該一小時內敵方就會全面停止作戰。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协同盟的"大弯刀"团刚刚宣布投降。预计一小时内敌对态势将全面终止!完毕。

Container.name: 015_ta_inf_alpha_to_supply
Container.situation: hq gives a player new orders. secure supply depot on the coast.

Key.Original: Roger that, Guardian, continuing on mission. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守護者"，繼續任務。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守护者"，继续执行任务。完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, carry on to the ammunition supply point.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，繼續前往彈藥補給點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，继续前往弹药补给站。

Key.Original: Once it's out the way, we'll get an APC to you from Foxtrot.
Key.Chinese: 解決這件事後，我們會從"狐步舞"派一臺裝甲運兵車去你那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦搞定了它，我们就从"狐步舞"派一辆装甲输送车去你那。

Container.name: 014_ta_inf_town_captured
Container.situation: player informs hq that his group has captured the town. some enemy's have surrendered. hq tells player that a truck is on its way and that us special forces group will take care of them.

Key.Original: Alpha to Charlie.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"Charlie"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"查理"。

Key.Original: I think we're on top of this, bring it in.
Key.Chinese: 我覺得這裡差不多了，把車開來吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我们差不多了，把它带过来。

Key.Original: Copy, Alpha, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"，完毕。

Container.name: 013_ta_inf_enter_town
Container.situation: player's group disembarks from apc and begins assault on the town.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Alpha, we're at Point Redwood, advancing on Katmai, over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"，我們在紅木點了，正朝卡特邁前進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"阿尔法"，我们在红木点，往卡特迈进发，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Solid copy - we'll be careful. Out.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚-我們會小心。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完全明白-我们会小心。完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, good luck.
Key.Chinese: 確認，祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，祝你好运。

Key.Original: Be aware of friendly forces converging on the objective.
Key.Chinese: 友軍正朝任務目標集結，務必小心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 留神在目标处集结的友军。

Container.name: 012_eve_disembark
Container.situation: player's group dismounts from the apc.

Key.Original: Go - go! Everybody out - Move!
Key.Chinese: 衝-衝啊!大家下車-行動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 走-走!大家都下去-快走!

Container.name: 011_in_inf_introduction_out
Container.situation: apc commander announces that they are approaching the objective. player tells his group to get ready.

Key.Original: Okay, ready up, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，做好準備，"阿尔法"隊的弟兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，做好准备，"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: Approaching Point Redwood, 20 seconds.
Key.Chinese: 正接近紅木點，預計再20秒抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在接近红木点，20秒。

Container.name: 010_in_inf_introduction_good
Container.situation: conversation branching, based on player's performance in prior mission. the player light or no casualties.

Key.Original: Nope.
Key.Chinese: 不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。

Key.Original: Only that we're kicking some ass...
Key.Chinese: 我只知道我們把敵人打得屁滾尿流...
Key.Chinesesimp: 要不是我们狠狠教训了某些人...

Key.Original: There too, if we can pull this off.
Key.Chinese: 如果我們這樣都能撐過去，下次應該也沒問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里也是，如果我们能做到的话。

Key.Original: Exactly. That was fucking textbook, man.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。我們的表現他媽的可以列入教科書了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正是。简直像教科书一般，伙计。

Key.Original: Yeah, sure, just not in St. Louis, right?
Key.Chinese: 嗯，當然，除了聖路易那次，對不對?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，当然，不象在圣路易的时候，对吧?

Key.Original: Like this morning.
Key.Chinese: 就像今天早上一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就象今天早上。

Container.name: 009_in_inf_introduction_satisfactory
Container.situation: conversation branching, based on player's performance in prior mission. the player suffered light casualties or failed to complete some objectives.

Key.Original: Nope.
Key.Chinese: 不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不。

Key.Original: Just know we need another win, man.
Key.Chinese: 我只知道我們必須再度勝利，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只知道我们需要再取胜一次，伙计。

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。

Key.Original: Figures.
Key.Chinese: 我想也是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 想想。

Key.Original: Only, we need to up the ante on the ass kicking.
Key.Chinese: 不過我們必須更加緊攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只是，要打败他们，我们得加大赌注。

Key.Original: Like this morning?
Key.Chinese: 像今天早上一樣的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 就象今天早上一样?

Container.name: 008_in_inf_introduction_bad
