Container.situation: conversation branching, based on player's performance in prior mission. the player suffered heavy casualties.

Key.Original: Yeah, Owen, we're getting our asses kicked.
Key.Chinese: 知道，歐文，我們被打得屁滾尿流。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，欧文，我们败得很惨。

Key.Original: Two helos near St. Louis... and this morning.
Key.Chinese: 在聖路易附近損失兩架直升機...加上今天早上，
Key.Chinesesimp: 两架圣路易附近的直升机...还有今天早上。

Key.Original: My squad...
Key.Chinese: 我的分隊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的班...

Key.Original: So bad, man, they're sending us guys like you with room temperature IQs.
Key.Chinese: 真的很慘，老兄，現在上頭還派像你這種智商八七的人當我的隊友。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太糟了，伙计，他们给我们派来象你这种低智商的人。

Key.Original: Work it out, dick wad.
Key.Chinese: 你自己想吧，天兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好好想想吧，白痴。

Key.Original: Total clusterfuck.
Key.Chinese: 真他媽慘到家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是一团糟。

Key.Original: That a compliment?
Key.Chinese: 這是在稱讚我嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是表扬吗?

Container.name: 007_in_inf_introduction_in
Container.situation: conversation between player and squad in the rear of an apc.

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinese: 什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么?

Key.Original: I'm just saying.
Key.Chinese: 我只是說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我只是在说。

Key.Original: We wouldn't be in this mess if we'd never left.
Key.Chinese: 要是我們不曾離開，現在根本就不用攪這趟渾水。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们没离开的话，我们就不会陷入这样的困境。

Key.Original: I mean, accidentally blowing up our own research station?
Key.Chinese: 我方研究站突然爆炸?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，意外炸掉我们自己的科研站?

Key.Original: Killing a bunch of local workers...
Key.Chinese: 炸死一堆當地工人...
Key.Chinesesimp: 杀死一堆当地工人...

Key.Original: Hey, Spender!
Key.Chinese: 欸，Spender!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，斯彭德!

Key.Original: You know what's going on out there, yet?
Key.Chinese: 你知道那時候發生了什麼事了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道那儿出了什么事吗?

Container.name: 006_br_sf_briefing_out
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence. cutscene. player has selected the special forces role.

Key.Original: If you stumble on a threat, take it out.
Key.Chinese: 如果你碰上任何威脅，當場解決掉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你碰巧遇到某个威胁，把它解决掉。

Key.Original: Once you're confident you've eliminated any dangers, proceed to Point Sequoia.
Key.Chinese: 確認處理掉所有威脅後，前往紅衫點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦你相信你已消灭了任何危险，就前往红杉点。

Key.Original: Here, signal the attack and prepare an ambush, interdicting any reinforcements moving between Point Everglades and Houdan.
Key.Chinese: 你以信號通知展開攻擊，並準備埋伏，截住在大沼澤區點和胡丹之間的敵方增援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这儿，示意发起攻击并准备一次伏击，拦截在大沼泽区点和胡丹之间移动的任何增援部队。

Key.Original: Finally - continue east, supporting Alpha and Bravo.
Key.Chinese: 最後-繼續往東，支援"Alpha"和"Bravo"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后-继续向东，支援"阿尔法"和"布拉沃"。

Key.Original: Okay, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 好了，各位。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，先生们。

Key.Original: I can see you're anxious to get back out there. Good luck and don't blaze the trail. Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 你們急著想重返戰場了，我知道。祝好運，務必照計畫行動。解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我能看到你们急于回到那去。祝你们好运，别想着用什么新鲜招术。解散。

Container.name: 005_br_sf_briefing_arches
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence. cutscene. player has selected the special forces role. random site location requires branching.

Key.Original: Point Arches is the only area of known activity - but we suspect you may find others.
Key.Chinese: 拱門點是唯一已知有敵方活動的地方-但我想你應該還會有其他發現才是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拱门点是唯一一个确定有敌军活动的地区-不过我们怀疑你们也许会找到其他的。

Container.name: 004_br_sf_briefing_acadia
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence. cutscene. player has selected the special forces role. random site location requires branching.

Key.Original: Point Acadia is the only area of known activity - but we suspect you may find others.
Key.Chinese: 阿卡迪亞點是唯一已知有敵方活動的地方-但我想你應該還會有其他發現才是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿卡迪亚点是唯一一个确定有敌军活动的地区-不过我们怀疑你们也许会找到其他的。

Container.name: 003_br_sf_briefing_in
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence. cutscene. player has selected the special forces role.

Key.Original: Now... Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 現在...中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在...中士。

Key.Original: Alpha, Bravo, and Charlie are hitting the town from Point Redwood here, to the south.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"、"Bravo"和"Charlie"正從南邊的紅木點，攻擊城鎮。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"、"布拉沃"和"查理"从红木点这儿往南攻击城镇。

Key.Original: Our concern is the approach road...
Key.Chinese: 問題在於行軍的路況...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们担心的是进入路线...

Key.Original: You and your team will need to check this forest, checking for AT defences.
Key.Chinese: 你和你的小隊得搜查森林，看是否有反坦克防禦工事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你和你的小队得搜查森林，看是否有反坦克防御工事。

Container.name: 002_br_inf_briefing
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence. cutscene. player has selected the infantry role.

Key.Original: Alpha and Bravo, you will move with Charlie to here, Point Redwood, and strike from the south.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"和"Bravo"，你們和"Charlie"一起移動到這裡，紅木點，從南方發動攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"和"布拉沃"，你们和"查理"一起前往红木点，从南面发起进攻。

Key.Original: Special forces, near Point Everglades, will have already taken care of any possible AT threats.
Key.Chinese: 此時位在大沼澤區點附近的特種部隊，應該已經解決了潛在的反戰車威脅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大沼泽区点附近的特种部队到时应该已经消灭了任何可能的反坦克威胁。

Key.Original: A UAV's in the air, but don't expect much else - the AO's far too hot for it.
Key.Chinese: 我們有架無人機已經在空中待命，但別期待太多-任務區交戰太激烈了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 空中有架无人机，不过别期望太高-行动区域对它来说太危险了。

Key.Original: Does that make sense, gentlemen...?
Key.Chinese: 都聽懂了嗎，各位...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 都明白了吗，先生们?

Key.Original: They'll assist from the west, allowing you to seize Point Katmai.
Key.Chinese: 他們會從西邊支援你們佔領卡特邁點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们将从西面协助你们夺取卡特迈点。

Key.Original: Next, we'll go for the jugular, destroying this ammunition dump at Point Carlsbad.
Key.Chinese: 我們接下來直取要害，摧毀卡爾斯巴德點的彈藥庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来，我们将扼住咽喉，摧毁卡尔斯巴德点的这个军火库。

Key.Original: Alpha, that's on you.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，這任務交給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，那个任务由你完成。

Key.Original: An APC from Echo will RV soon after, near the crossroads, here...
Key.Chinese: "Echo"的裝甲運兵車很快會與你會合，碰面地點在十字路附近，這裡...
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆从"回声"来的装甲输送车不久将在交叉路口附近会合，这儿...

Key.Original: Together, you'll head towards Point Yellowstone, eliminating any resistance you may encounter there.
Key.Chinese: 你們一起前往黃石點，殲滅所有發現的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们将一道向黄石点进发，消灭你们可能在那遇到的任何抵抗力量。

Key.Original: Bravo and Charlie will then prepare for the attack on Dourdan.
Key.Chinese: 而後，"Bravo"和"Charlie"準備攻擊Dourdan。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"和"查理"随后将准备对杜尔丹发起进攻。

Key.Original: Point Zion is our last objective...
Key.Chinese: 最後的任務目標是錫安點...
Key.Chinesesimp: 锡安点是我们最后一个目标...

Key.Original: All three teams will assault the town, with Alpha coming in from the east, here.
Key.Chinese: 三組人馬一齊攻擊城鎮，"Alpha"從東邊切近，位置在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 三个小组全都将进攻城镇，"阿尔法"从东面进攻，这儿。

Key.Original: Alright.
Key.Chinese: 好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。

Key.Original: Bring the rest of your squads up to speed. Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 盡速收編你隊上的弟兄。解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 传达给各班的其他成员。解散。

Container.name: 001_br_briefing
Container.situation: first part of briefing sequence. cutscene.

Key.Original: Are we all accounted for?
Key.Chinese: 大家都到齊了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 人都到齐了吗?

Key.Original: Okay then - welcome back.
Key.Chinese: 那好-歡迎回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那好吧-欢迎回来。

Key.Original: Bad news first. There's been an incident near St. Louis, we lost a pair of Blackfoot helicopters here, and here.
Key.Chinese: 先說壞消息。聖路易附近出了事，我軍損失了兩架"黑足"直升機，這裡和這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先说坏消息。在圣路易附近有事件发生，我们失去了两架"黑足"直升机，在这儿，还有这儿。

Key.Original: Furthermore, the enemy's frontlines are holding.
Key.Chinese: 此外，敵方堅守前線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，敌军守住了前线。

Key.Original: As for good news, we're almost in a position to end this.
Key.Chinese: 好消息是，我軍幾乎勝券在握。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息是，我们差不多可以结束这一切。

Key.Original: CSAT are divided.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟內部意見分歧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协同盟四分五裂。

Key.Original: Member states seem to have no clear consensus on whether or not they're at war with us...
Key.Chinese: 會員國間對於是否要與我們交戰還沒有清楚的共識...
Key.Chinesesimp: 成员国看来对他们是否该和我们交战没法达成一致...

Key.Original: Meaning, hostile forces, here - and on Altis - may have, er, jumped the gun, so to speak.
Key.Chinese: 同時，這裡的敵方-還有在阿爾蒂斯上的敵方-可能會，呃，這麼說吧，過於急躁。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这意味着，敌军-在这儿，还有在阿尔蒂斯的-也许，呃，这么说吧，被队友卖了。

Key.Original: But, we can't know anything for certain.
Key.Chinese: 但一切都還不明朗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，我们什么都不能确定。

Key.Original: We must affect a resolution, quickly - making one final push, up along this MSR, through Houdan, and Dourdan.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須展現決心，而且要快-任務目標是沿著這條主要補給路線推進，路線途經胡丹和多爾丹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须迅速达成决议-沿着这条主要补给线，穿过胡丹和多尔丹，实施最后一击。

Key.Original: Point Sanford
Key.Chinese: 桑福德點
Key.Chinesesimp: 桑福德点

Key.Original: Point Palisade
Key.Chinese: 帕利薩德點
Key.Chinesesimp: 帕利萨德点

Key.Original: Point Mitchell
Key.Chinese: 米切爾點
Key.Chinesesimp: 米切尔点

Key.Original: Point Massive
Key.Chinese: 麥西夫點
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦西夫点

Key.Original: Point Foraker
Key.Chinese: 福拉克點
Key.Chinesesimp: 福拉克点

Key.Original: Point Elbert
Key.Chinese: 艾爾伯特點
Key.Chinesesimp: 艾尔伯特点

Key.Original: Point Crillon
Key.Chinese: 克里倫點
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里伦点

Key.Original: Point Crestone
Key.Chinese: 克列斯通點
Key.Chinesesimp: 克列斯通点

Key.Original: Point Charleston
Key.Chinese: 查理斯頓點
Key.Chinesesimp: 查理斯顿点

Key.Original: Point Borah
Key.Chinese: 波拉赫點
Key.Chinesesimp: 波拉赫点

Key.Original: Point Blackburn
Key.Chinese: 布萊克本點
Key.Chinesesimp: 布莱克本点

Key.Original: Point Alverstone
Key.Chinese: 阿爾弗斯通點
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔弗斯通点

Key.Original: Camp Noe
Key.Chinese: 諾伊營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 诺伊营地

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Retreat north-west towards the %1forest%2.
Key.Chinese: 朝西北%1森林%2撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 往西北面的%1森林%2撤退。

Key.Original: Destroy Second Mortar
Key.Chinese: 摧毀第二處迫擊砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁第二门迫击炮

Key.Original: Seek and destroy the second mortar at this %1location%2.
Key.Chinese: 第二處迫擊砲位在這%1區域%2，找出並摧毀它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这个%1位置%2寻找并摧毁第二门迫击炮。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Retreat north to this %1area%2.
Key.Chinese: 朝北退往這%1區域%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向北撤退到这个%1地区%2。

Key.Original: Secure Medical Camp
Key.Chinese: 佔領醫療營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取医疗营

Key.Original: Regroup with reinforcements and seize the %1Casualty Collection Point%2 near Cancon. %3Delta%2 will move in on your command and strike from the east.
Key.Chinese: 與我方援軍會合整隊，並佔領康孔附近的%1傷患收集點%2。%3"Delta"%2會依照你的指令行動，從東方攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与增援部队会合，夺取康孔附近的%1伤亡人员收集点%2。%3"德尔塔"%2将按你的指挥投入到东面的进攻中。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Retreat towards the %1mountains%2.
Key.Chinese: 往%1山區%2撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 往%1山区%2撤退。

Key.Original: Attack Fuel Depot
Key.Chinese: 攻擊燃料儲藏庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击燃料仓库

Key.Original: Support friendly forces and attack the fuel depot at %1Point Charleston%2.
Key.Chinese: 支援友軍，攻擊%1查爾斯頓據點%2的燃料倉庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援友军，攻击%1查尔斯顿点%2的燃料仓库。

Key.Original: Investigate
Key.Chinese: 調查
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查

Key.Original: Investigate the possible presence of armored units %1north-east%2 of Saint Marie.
Key.Chinese: 聖瑪麗%1東北%2似乎有裝甲部隊存在，進行調查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查圣玛丽%1西北部%2可能存在的装甲部队。

Key.Original: Stop Reinforcements
Key.Chinese: 阻止增援
Key.Chinesesimp: 阻止增援部队

Key.Original: Move to %1Point Blackburn%2 and eliminate any enemy reinforcements there.
Key.Chinese: 前往%1布萊克本點%2，殲滅該處所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%1布莱克本点%2，消灭那里的任何敌军增援部队。

Key.Original: Destroy Mortar
Key.Chinese: 摧毀迫擊砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁迫击炮

Key.Original: Locate enemy artillery in %1this area%2 and eliminate the crew, as well as the mortar itself.
Key.Chinese: 找出並殲滅%1本區域%2的敵方砲擊部隊，連同迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到%1该地区%2的敌军大炮，消灭炮手及迫击炮本身。

Key.Original: Secure Outpost
Key.Chinese: 掃蕩哨站
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取哨所

Key.Original: Clear the static AT launchers near %1Point Crestone%2 so our armored units can advance.
Key.Chinese: 解決%1克列斯通點%2附近的固定式反戰車發射器，讓我方裝甲部隊得以行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁%1克列斯通点%2附近的反坦克固定发射器，让我们的装甲部队能够前进。

Key.Original: %2Guardian%1 - Command.%4%3Pariah%1 - Your team.
Key.Chinese: %2"守護者"%1-指揮部。%4%3"賤民"%1-你的部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"守护者"%1-指挥官。%4%3"贱民"%1-你的小组。

Key.Original: Glad you made it back, Sergeant. Though you did well in neutralizing those mortars, the loss of your entire team has cost us dearly - we simply can't sustain such losses.
Key.Chinese: 很高興你平安回來，中士。雖然你殲滅迫擊砲有功，你隊上的其他人員卻因此陣亡，讓我軍蒙受巨大損失-我們不能再折損任何弟兄了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴你平安归来，中士。尽管你在摧毁那些迫击炮方面干得不错，但失去你的整个小组让我们付出惨痛代价-我们不能承受这样的损失。

Key.Original: Seek and destroy an enemy mortar, firing on our lines. It's definitely in the %2AO%1, we just don't know precisely where, as it's constantly switching positions.
Key.Chinese: 敵方迫擊砲正攻擊我方陣線，你必須找出並摧毀它。迫擊砲絕對是在%2任務區%1內，但我們還不知道確切位置，因為迫擊砲時時在改變位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并摧毁一门向我方阵地开火的敌军迫击炮。它绝对在%2行动区域%1内，我们只是不知道它的确切位置，因为它一直在移动位置。

Key.Original: 1. Locate the mortar and take it out. %3%3 2. Retreat to %2Point Borah.%1
Key.Chinese: 1. 找出迫擊砲在哪，並解決掉它。%3%32. 退回%2波拉赫點%1
Key.Chinesesimp: 1. 找到迫击炮并摧毁它。%3%32. 撤至%2波拉赫点。%1

Key.Original: Good work out there! You did well in neutralizing those mortars. Thankfully, that armored threat was just some old Russian wrecks leftover from the Cold War. A very close call, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 辛苦了!你殲滅迫擊砲有功。幸好，所謂的裝甲威脅只是一些從冷戰時期流傳下來的陳舊俄國製廢鐵。真是千鈞一髮，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮!你在摧毁那些迫击炮方面干得不错。感谢老天，那些装甲威胁只是冷战时期留下来的一些俄国造废品。真是千钧一发，中士。

Key.Original: Incredible work out there, Sergeant! Not only were you able to find and destroy those mortars, you managed to investigate and discount a potential armored threat. Good job!
Key.Chinese: 表現太傑出了，中士!你不只是找出並摧毀了迫擊砲，還設法調查與消除了可能的裝甲威脅。幹得好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 表现出色，中士!你不仅能找到并摧毁那些迫击炮，还设法调查和消灭了一个潜在的装甲威胁。干得漂亮!

Key.Original: Glad you made it back, Sergeant. Although you managed to destroy one mortar, a second wreaked havoc on our forces. In addition, the loss of your entire team has cost us dearly - we simply can't sustain such losses.
Key.Chinese: 很高興你平安回來，中士。雖然你設法摧毀了一處迫擊砲，但第二處迫擊砲讓我軍傷亡慘重害。除此之外，你隊上的其他人員也因此陣亡，讓我軍蒙受巨大損失-我們不能再折損任何弟兄了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴你平安归来，中士。尽管你设法摧毁了一门迫击炮，但第二门迫击炮让我们的部队遭受重创。此外，失去你的整个小组让我们付出惨痛代价-我们不能承受这样的损失。

Key.Original: The situation here on Malden is confused at best. China has attempted to de-escalate the crisis by allowing us to land a temporary holding force to monitor its %4long-range jets%2. However, troops from CSAT's North African member states are against us. They've retreated inland with some armored assets and man-portable AA systems, harassing our troops from afar. To deal with the threat, we're striking their positions from the %1north%2 and %3south%2, with one group pushing down towards La Trinité and another, cutting-off logistics from the direction of the %6harbor%2 and our provisional base at %7Camp Noe%2.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾登島上情勢相當混亂。中國試圖降低危機，因此同意我方暫時駐軍監控它們的%4長程噴射機%2。不過，廣協同盟的北非會員國部隊敵視我們。這批人馬帶著一些裝甲部隊與人員攜帶式防空系統退到內陸，開始從遠處騷擾我軍。要解決這個威脅，我們要從%1北方%2與%3南方%2出擊:一隊往下推進至拉·特里尼特，另一隊負責切斷從%6港口%2至我方%7諾伊營地%2的敵方後勤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔登岛的局势往好了说也是混乱的。中国人允许我们登陆部署一支临时占领部队来监控她的%4远程喷气机%2，试图借此缓和危机。然而，广协同盟的北非成员国派出的军队反对我们。他们已携带一些装甲装备和便携式防空系统撤退至内陆，从远处骚扰我们的军队。为了对付这一威胁，我们从%1北面%2和%3南面%2攻击他们的阵地，一支队伍往拉·特里尼特推进，另一支从%6港口%2和我们设在%诺伊营地%2的临时基地方向截断物资供应。

Key.Original: Operate behind enemy lines and destroy an enemy mortar team.
Key.Chinese: 在敵方戰線後行動，並摧毀敵方的迫擊砲隊伍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在敌军阵线后方行动，消灭一支敌军迫击炮小队。

Key.Original: Special Forces
Key.Chinese: 特種部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 特种部队

Key.Original: Join a combined arms assault against enemy positions around Cancon and Chapoi.
Key.Chinese: 加入聯合軍種攻擊，擊潰康孔和沙普瓦附近的敵軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入诸兵种合同突击，攻击康孔和沙普瓦周边的敌军阵地。

Key.Original: Infantry
Key.Chinese: 步兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 步兵

Key.Original: Delta Go
Key.Chinese: "Delta"行動
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔"行動

Key.Original: NATO forces strike strategic positions south of La Trinité.
Key.Chinese: 北約攻擊拉·特里尼特南方幾個具有戰略意義的地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约军队进攻拉·特里尼特南面的战略性阵地。

Key.Original: Fait Accompli
Key.Chinese: 既成事實
Key.Chinesesimp: 既成事实

Key.Original: NATO forces strike strategic positions south of La Trinité.
Key.Chinese: 北約攻擊拉·特里尼特南方幾個具有戰略意義的地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约军队进攻拉·特里尼特南面的战略性阵地。

Key.Original: Fait Accompli
Key.Chinese: 既成事實
Key.Chinesesimp: 既成事实

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: %2Guardian%1 - Command.%9%3Alpha%1 - Your team.%9%4Bravo%1 - Infantry element.%9%5Charlie%1 - Mechanized infantry element.%9%6Delta%1 - Supporting infantry element.%9%7Echo%1 - Infantry element.%9%8Foxtrot%1 - Reinforcing infantry element.
Key.Chinese: %2"守護者"%1-指揮部。%9%3"Alpha"%1-你的隊伍。%9%4"Bravo"%1-步兵部隊。%9%5"Charlie"%1-機械化步兵部隊。%9%6"Delta"%"1-支援步兵部隊。%9%7"Echo"%1-步兵部隊。%9%8"狐步舞"%1-步兵增援部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"守护者"%1-指挥官。%9%3"阿尔法"%1-你的小组。%9%4"布拉沃"%1-步兵分队。%9%5"查理"%1-机械化步兵分队。%9%6"德尔塔"%1-支援步兵分队。%9%7"回声"%1-步兵分队。%9%8"狐步舞"%1-增援步兵分队。

Key.Original: Having gained a foothold in the south around the harbor at %2Le Port%1, we now need to push westwards, towards %3Chapoi%1 and %4Cancon%1. A %5supply depot%1 and %6causality collection point%1 will be our primary targets.
Key.Chinese: 我軍在南方的%2勒·波特%1附近的港灣站穩了腳步，現在必須向西、朝%3沙普瓦%1與%4康孔%1推進。我們的主要目標是%5補給品儲藏庫%1，以及%6傷患收集點%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在南面的%2勒·波特%1港口附近夺得据点之后，我们现在需要向西推进，向%3沙普瓦%1和%4康孔%1开进。%5补给仓库%1和%6伤亡人员收集点%1将是我们的首要目标。

Key.Original: 1. Secure AT defences around %2Point Crestone%1.%8%8 2. Eliminate any enemy forces garrisoned at %3Point Blackburn%1.%8%8 3. Together with other units, capture the fuel depot at %4Point Charleston%1.%8%8 4. Contact %5Delta%1 team and greenlight the diversionary attack on the harbor at %6Point Massive%1.%8%8 5. Move in and assault the medical camp at %7Point Crillon%1. Remember to check your fire. Obviously, injured combatants are not legitimate targets.
Key.Chinese: 1. 殲滅%2克列斯通點%1附近的反戰車威脅。%8%82. 殲滅派駐在%3布萊克本點%1的所有敵軍。%8%83. 連同其他單位，一齊佔領%4查爾斯頓點%1的燃料儲藏庫。%8%84. 聯絡%5"Delta"%1，牽制攻擊位於%6麥西夫點%1的港口。%8%85. 前往%7克里倫點%1，突襲醫療營地。別忘了確認目標。很顯然，負傷的戰鬥員不是正當目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1. 夺取%2克列斯通点%1附近的反坦克防御工事。%8%82. 消灭守卫%3布莱克本点%1的任何敌军。%8%83. 与其他单位一道夺取%4查尔斯顿点%1的燃料库。%8%84. 联络%5"德尔塔"%1小队，为牵制性攻击%6麦西夫点%1的港口开绿灯。%8%85. 移动并进攻%7克里伦点%1的医疗营。记得小心开火。受伤的战斗人员显然不是合法的目标。

Key.Original: You and your squad did an excellent job out there, Sergeant! If we can continue to sever the enemy's logistics, we'll bring about a rapid conclusion to this conflict.
Key.Chinese: 你和你的隊員表現極為優秀，中士!如果我軍能繼續切斷敵人的後勤，這場衝突很快就能落幕。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你和你的小队表现出色，中士!如果我们继续切断敌军的物资供应，我们将很快结束这场冲突。

Key.Original: Although we accomplished our objectives, Sergeant, we suffered devastating losses. I suppose, at least, by severing the enemy's logistics, we're one step closer to concluding this conflict.
Key.Chinese: 雖然我們完成了任務目標，中士，但也蒙受了毀滅性的損失。至少，我軍切斷了敵方的後勤，離終結這場衝突又近了一步。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们实现了目标，中士，我们蒙受了毁灭性的损失。我认为，切断敌军的物资供应至少让我们离结束这场冲突近了一步。

Key.Original: Glad you made it back, Sergeant. I'd congratulate you on a job well done, but let's face it - if not for our air support, this mission would've been a disaster...
Key.Chinese: 很高興你平安回來，中士。我很想恭喜你成功完成任務，但老實說吧-要不是空中支援及時來到，這次的任務會是個災難...
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴你能回来，中士。祝贺你圆满完成任务，不过我们得面对现实-如果不是空中支援，这次任务会一败涂地...

Container.name: 017_ta_inf_secure_medical_camp_c
Container.situation: hq tells player to proceed to the medical camp at point crillon. to follow both ta_inf_secure_medical_camp_a and ta_inf_secure_medical_camp_b.

Key.Original: Hold your position, we're redirecting forces - out.
Key.Chinese: 堅守岡位，我們在重新指揮部署-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 原地等待，我们正在转移军队-完毕。

Container.name: 076_eve_all_hurry_up_c_out
Container.situation: hq orders special forces to hurry up. infantry are under heavy fire. to follow eve_all_hurry_up_c_in.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Bravo, we got intel on that mortar.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"，我們有迫擊砲的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"布拉沃"，我们收到了关于那门迫击炮的情报。

Key.Original: Local CIVPOP, sir!
Key.Chinese: 是當地平民，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 本地平民，长官!

Key.Original: Just a sec... êtes-vous sûr?
Key.Chinese: 等等...etes-voussur?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等一下...êtes-vouss?r?

Key.Original: Great work, Bravo!
Key.Chinese: 很好，"Bravo"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，"布拉沃"!

Key.Original: No! No, disregard my last!
Key.Chinese: 不對!不對，別管我最後的訊息!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不!不，忽略我的上一条指令!

Key.Original: Grid 051-042, I say again, 051-042!
It's a, uh, small farmhouse - shit! Danger of collateral damage.
Key.Chinese: 這是個，呃，小農舍-可惡!小心間接損傷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是一座，呃，小农舍-该死!有连带伤害危险。

Key.Original: Oui, près Sainte Marie, ici.
Key.Chinese: 是的，這里，靠近聖瑪麗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，这里，靠近圣玛丽。

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。

Key.Original: Pariah, you get all that...?
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，你都聽見了...?
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，你都听明白了吗...?

Key.Original: Affirmative, moving there now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，正在趕去。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，正往那移动。完毕!

Container.name: 086_ex_inf_player_apc_hit
Container.situation: delta's apc destroyed or rendered immobile by the enemy.

Key.Original: Guardian, Alpha, we've just lost an APC!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"，我們剛損失一臺裝甲運兵車!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"阿尔法"，我们刚失去了一辆装甲输送车!

Key.Original: These CSAT guys ain't using bargain basement shit, sir! Over.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟這些傢伙用的可不是一般的破銅爛鐵，長官!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些广协同盟家伙用的不是一般的破铜烂铁，长官!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Alpha... Proceed with caution. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"Alpha"...小心行動。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"...继续行动，保持警惕。完毕。

Container.name: 094_ex_inf_leaving_ao
Container.situation: player is leaving ao.

Key.Original: Mm, must've made a wrong move somewhere - better check the map...
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我一定是哪裡弄錯了-最好看一下地圖...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，肯定在什么地方走错了路-最好查下地图...

Container.name: 078_ex_inf_mortar_remark_b
Container.situation: alpha hear from hq that the mortar which is firing on them has been destroyed. to follow ex_mortar_remark_a if player has at least one team mate in earshot, else, will be played independently if player is alone.

Key.Original: Thank god for Sergeant Hale and his high school French...
Key.Chinese: 感謝哈勒中士和他的高中法文老師...
Key.Chinesesimp: 多亏了哈勒中士和他的高中法语课...

Container.name: 077_ex_inf_mortar_remark_a
Container.situation: alpha hear from hq that the mortar which is firing on them has been destroyed. player is not alone and has at least one team mate in earshot. to follow ta_inf_attack_reinforcements_b.

Key.Original: Fucking-A!
Key.Chinese: 真他媽爽!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死-真他妈爽!

Container.name: 070_loc_inf_cache_discovered
Container.situation: player discovers a large weapon's cache.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian. Come in. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"。請回答。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"。请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: Seeing some pretty high-end shit here.
Key.Chinese: 我們在這裡看見不少高階武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这看到一些相当先进的东西。

Key.Original: Lotta weapon crates, labelled in Mandarin.
Key.Chinese: 很多裝著武器的箱子，上面寫的是中文。
Key.Chinesesimp: 许多武器箱，带有中文标签。

Key.Original: Go ahead, Alpha, we're receiving.
Key.Chinese: 說吧，"Alpha"，我收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲，"阿尔法"，我们正在听。

Key.Original: No way CSAT aren't working from the same playbook, sir. Over.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟絕對沒有按照規矩來，長官。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协同盟不可能没有统一行动，长官。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy that, Alpha, we'll investigate later. Guardian, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"，我們晚點會調查。"守護者"，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"，我们稍后会调查。"守护者"，完毕。

Container.name: 067_eve_inf_player_wounded
Container.situation: player is wounded.

Key.Original: Argh!
Key.Chinese: 呃!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊!

Key.Original: I'm hit!
Key.Chinese: 我中彈了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我被击中了!

Container.name: 066_eve_inf_explosion_player
Container.situation: player creates an explosion at the fuel depot.

Key.Original: Yeah! Fucking boom!
Key.Chinese: 哈!炸死你們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶!轰!

Container.name: 065_eve_inf_explosion_ai
Container.situation: non-playable character creates an explosion at the fuel depot.

Key.Original: Ooh-ee!
Key.Chinese: 喔咿!
Key.Chinesesimp: Ooh-ee!

Container.name: 036_eve_sf_hurry_up_c
Container.situation: alpha report they are taking casualties to hq. hq orders special forces to hurry up and eliminate the mortar.

Key.Original: Guardian, Alpha!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"阿尔法"呼叫!

Key.Original: Taking serious casualties, we - fuck...! We can't take much more of this!
Key.Chinese: 發生嚴重傷亡，我們-幹...!我們撐不住了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遭受严重伤亡，我们-干...!我们快要撑不住了!

Key.Original: Roger, Alpha - keep moving.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"-繼續行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"-继续移动。

Key.Original: Pariah, whatever you're doing, do it faster.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，加緊動作，不管你在做什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，无论你在做什么，都快点儿。

Key.Original: Get to that farmhouse and take care of that mortar team... out.
Key.Chinese: 前往農舍，解決迫擊砲小隊...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到那座农舍去，解决掉那个迫击炮小组。完毕。

Container.name: 028_eve_inf_delta_clear
Container.situation: delta inform player that they have cleared the harbor.

Key.Original: Alpha, this is Delta.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，這是"Delta"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，这里是"德尔塔"。

Key.Original: The harbor's taken, we're moving in on Point Massive - so y'know, check your fire, out.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經佔領港口，正前往麥西夫點-先跟你說一聲，開火小心，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 港口已夺取，我们正前往麦西夫点-所以留神你的火力。完毕。

Container.name: 027_eve_inf_delta_retreating
Container.situation: delta inform player that they've been forced to retreat.

Key.Original: Okay, Delta, don't sweat it, if you gotta move - do so! Out.
Key.Chinese: 好，"Delta"，別擔心-你就撤吧!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，"德尔塔"，别紧张，如果你要撤-就撤吧!完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, this is Delta, we can't hold our position.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，這是"Delta"，我們守不住了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，这里是"德尔塔"，我们守不住了。

Key.Original: Taking too many casualties... we're falling back. Over.
Key.Chinese: 死傷太慘重...我們要撤了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伤亡太多了...我们正在撤退。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 026_eve_inf_delta_attacking
Container.situation: delta inform player that they are attacking the harbor.

Key.Original: Delta to Alpha, contact! We're attacking the harbour now, out.
Key.Chinese: "Delta"呼叫"Alpha"，接敵!我們正在攻擊港口，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔"呼叫"阿尔法"，遇敌!我们正在进攻港口，完毕。

Container.name: 025_eve_inf_delta_on_approach
Container.situation: delta team tell player's group that they are one minute away from attacking the harbor.

Key.Original: Copy - give us a head's up when you engage. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到-攻擊前先通知我們一聲。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到-你开火时告诉我们一声。完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, it's Delta.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，這是"Delta"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，这里是"德尔塔"。

Key.Original: Almost there, one mike, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們快到了，再一分鐘，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快到了，一分钟，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 024_sup_inf_delta_go
Container.situation: alpha orders delta to attack the harbor.

Key.Original: Alpha to Delta.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"Delta"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"德尔塔"。

Key.Original: Begin the assault on Point Massive, over.
Key.Chinese: 開始攻擊麥西夫點，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始进攻麦西夫点，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Roger that, Alpha, we thought you'd never ask. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"，我們還以為你永遠不會開口呢。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"，我们以为你永远不会问呢。完毕。

Container.name: 023_sup_inf_delta_available
Container.situation: delta are available to create diversionary attack outside cancon.

Key.Original: Good to know, Guardian - we'll call it in when ready. Out.
Key.Chinese: 真是個好消息，"守護者"-我們好了就通知你。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那好，"守护者"-我们准备好就召唤它。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian to Alpha. Delta are set to create that diversion.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"Alpha"。"Delta"準備就緒，隨時可以引起騷亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"阿尔法"。"德尔塔"准备发起牵制攻击。

Key.Original: They'll strike the harbor at Cancon on your signal.
Key.Chinese: 他們收到你的信號就開始攻擊康孔港。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们将按你的信号攻击康孔的港口。

Container.name: 021_eve_inf_medical_camp_support_c
Container.situation: hq orders special forces team to assist player, who is alone, in capturing the medical camp. to follow eve_all_medical_camp_support_a.

Key.Original: It's me, shithead. Spender. Can you cut me a fireteam?
Key.Chinese: 你這豬頭，是我啦。斯彭德。可以撥一支小組過來嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是我，该死的。斯彭德。你能给我派个火力组吗?

Key.Original: Fuck. Alpha? Hang tough!
Key.Chinese: 幹。"Alpha"?堅強一點好不好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。"阿尔法"?坚持住!

Key.Original: A casualty collection point.
Key.Chinese: 傷患收集。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个伤亡人员收集点。

Key.Original: Alpha's down to a man and could use some help.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"戰到只剩一人，需要幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"只剩下一个人了，也许需要帮忙。

Key.Original: Sure, and our APC? And the fillings outta my fucking teeth?
Key.Chinese: 好啊，需要我們的裝甲運兵車嗎?老子我牙縫裡的菜渣也摳給你如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，需要我们的装甲输送车?老子牙縫里的菜渣也扣给你如何？?

Container.name: 020_eve_inf_medical_camp_support_b
Container.situation: hq orders echo to assist player's group in capturing the medical camp. to follow eve_all_medical_camp_support_a.

Key.Original: Break-break - Echo - you're fucking assholes. Over.
Key.Chinese: 中斷通訊、中斷通訊-"Echo"你他媽混蛋。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 打断-打断-"回声"-你真是该死的混蛋。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Sure, yeah, we can hold their hands a little.
Key.Chinese: 好，沒問題，我們就去安撫一下他們受創的心靈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，是啊，我们可以握住他们的手一会儿。

Key.Original: A casualty collection point - Alpha could use some help.
Key.Chinese: 傷患收集-"Alpha"需要幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个伤亡人员收集点-"阿尔法"也许需要帮忙。

Container.name: 019_eve_inf_medical_camp_support_a
Container.situation: hq contacts echo team. to follow ta_inf_secure_medical_camp_c.

Key.Original: Loud and clear, Guardian, what have you got for us?
Key.Chinese: 一清二楚，"守護者"，有什麼指令?
Key.Chinesesimp: 听得很清楚，"守护者"，你有什么消息给我们?

Key.Original: Echo, do you copy?
Key.Chinese: "Echo"，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声"，你收到了吗?

Container.name: 018_ta_inf_medical_camp_secured
Container.situation: the medical camp is captured by the player. hq is informed and the mission ends successfully.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: I think we're done here, sir.
Key.Chinese: 這裡搞定了，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我觉得我们这儿搞定了，长官。

Key.Original: Good job, Sergeant. RV with Charlie at Point Palisade and prep for next phase of the operation - out.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好，中士。到帕利薩德點和"Charlie"會合，準備下一階段行動-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，中士。在帕利萨德点与"查理"会合，准备下一阶段行动。完毕。

Container.name: 016_ta_inf_secure_medical_camp_b
Container.situation: player's group reports to hq that the fuel dump has been caputred. however, the rest of the squad is dead.

Key.Original: Guardian. It's Alpha.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"。這是"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: The fuel dump's ours, but, the rest of the squad... shit, sir.
Key.Chinese: 我們搶回燃料儲藏庫了，但其他隊員...可惡，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 燃料仓库是我们的了，不过，小队的其他人...该死，长官。

Key.Original: They're KIA! I'm the only one left. Over.
Key.Chinese: 在行動中陣亡了!現在就剩我。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们阵亡了!只剩下我一个人。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, Alpha. Stay focused.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"。保持注意力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"。保持警惕。

Container.name: 015_ta_inf_secure_medical_camp_a
Container.situation: player's group informs hq the fuel depot has been captured.

Key.Original: This is Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 這是"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: Guardian, the fuel dump's ours. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，我們搶回燃料儲藏庫了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，燃料仓库是我们的了。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Excellent job.
Key.Chinese: 表現非常精彩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮。

Container.name: 014_eve_inf_battle_cry
Container.situation: player calls to his group, having received the next objective.

Key.Original: Alright, let's go!
Key.Chinese: 好，我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，我们走!

Container.name: 013_ta_inf_reinforcements_cleared_a
Container.situation: player's group clears enemy reinforcements. hq orders alpha and charlie groups to secure the area around the fuel depot.

Key.Original: Guardian, Alpha - Point Blackburn's all taken care of. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"-已經拿下布萊克本點了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"阿尔法"叫-布莱克本点全都搞定了。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Keep it up, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 繼續保持，"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续行动，"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: The fuel depot at Point Charlston's next. Lock it down. Out.
Key.Chinese: 下個目標是"Charlie"斯頓點的燃料儲藏庫。封鎖那區。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下一个目标是查理斯顿点的燃料仓库。夺取它。完毕。

Container.name: 012_ta_inf_friendlies_arrived
Container.situation: player greets friendly reinforcements.

Key.Original: Foxtrot, on me.
Key.Chinese: "狐步舞"，聽我口令。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐步舞"，跟着我。

Key.Original: Yeah, uh, some really bad shit went down, man.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，呃，碰到一些慘事，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，有些很糟糕的东西掉下来了，伙计。

Key.Original: Come on!
Key.Chinese: 來吧!
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧!

Key.Original: Hey, what the fuck happened to your squad?
Key.Chinese: 欸，你們分隊他媽的是怎麼了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，你的班到底出了什么事?

Container.name: 011_ta_inf_attack_reinforcements_c
Container.situation: player's group responds to hq's task assignment and explain they are not able to engage without additional support.

Key.Original: Good copy, Guardian, but we are not combat effective.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守護者"，但我們已經不能有效作戰了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"守护者"，可是我们没法有效作战。

Key.Original: Heavy casualties sustained at Point Crestone.
Key.Chinese: 在克列私通點發生嚴重傷亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在克列斯通点遭受了重大伤亡。

Key.Original: Blackburn sounds like a pretty tall order right now, sir. Over.
Key.Chinese: 以現在狀況，拿下布萊克本是個非常艱困的任務，長官。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 布莱克本现在听上去是个难以完成的任务，长官。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Triple One gets shit done, Alpha...
Key.Chinese: 111步兵師辦得到，"Alpha"...
Key.Chinesesimp: "三个一"没有办不到这一说，"阿尔法"...

Key.Original: Dispatching fireteam Foxtrot. RV at grid 065-035 - regroup, and proceed on task. Guardian, out.
Key.Chinese: 已經派出"狐步舞"小組。你們在方格坐標065-035碰頭-重新整隊，然後繼續任務。Guardian，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 派遣"狐步舞"火力组。在坐标065-035会合-重新集结并执行任务。"守护者"，通话完毕。

Container.name: 010_ta_inf_attack_reinforcements_b
Container.situation: player's group responds to hq's task assignment and explain they are able to engage.

Key.Original: Good copy, Guardian, we're en route now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守護者"，我們上路了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"守护者"，我们正在路上。完毕。

Container.name: 008_eve_all_mortars_firing
Container.situation: infantry group come under fire from a mortar.

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕!

Key.Original: Guardian, Alpha! Message, over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"!有消息，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"阿尔法"叫!报告消息，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: We got incoming artillery fire! Can you do anything about it? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們遭到砲擊!你能做點什麼嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们遭到炮击!你能做些什么吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Send your traffic, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 說吧，"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 说吧，"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: Affirmative... wait, out.
Key.Chinese: 肯定...等等，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到...等一下，完毕。

Container.name: 007_ta_all_at_neutralized
Container.situation: player's infantry squad informs hq that the at threat has been neutralized and that the enemy are retreating. tanks may now proceed.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian. Point Crestone's clear.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"。克列斯通點安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"。克列斯通点安全。

Key.Original: CSAT are pulling back... over.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟正在撤退...完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协同盟正在撤退。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Guardian, wilco, advancing on Point Sanford, out.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，遵命，前往桑福德點，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，遵命，前往桑福德点。完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Alpha. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"Alpha"。等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"。等一下。

Key.Original: Charlie, you're good to go. Support Bravo.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"，準許行動。支援"Bravo"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"，你可以动身了。支援"布拉沃"。

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Bravo here.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"布拉沃"。

Key.Original: We're in control of Point Mitchell, out.
Key.Chinese: 我們掌握了米切爾點，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们控制了米切尔点，完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian, Avenger.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"復仇者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"复仇者"呼叫。

Key.Original: Shack! Kills confirmed. Enemy armor neutralized.
Key.Chinese: 正中紅心!確認擊殺。已殲滅敵方裝甲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 打得好!确认消灭。敌军装甲车已摧毁。

Key.Original: Copy, Avenger. Return to loiter point for tasking, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"復仇者"。返回待機點，隨時待命，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"复仇者"。返回盘旋点等待分派任务，完毕。

Container.name: 004_ta_inf_opening
Container.situation: hq orders all callsigns to begin assault.

Key.Original: Alpha, on the move.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，正在行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，行动。

Key.Original: Bravo team, advancing.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"小隊前進中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"小组，正在前进。

Key.Original: Guardian to all callsigns.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫所有呼號。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫全体呼号。

Key.Original: Exempt, Pariah. COMEX. Execute plan Scarlight. Over.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"例外。開始行動。執行"痕光"計畫。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 除了"贱民"以外都有。开始行动。执行"斯卡莱特"计划。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: This is Charlie, starting engines.
Key.Chinese: 這是"Charlie"，開始動作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"查理"，正在启动发动机。

Key.Original: Delta - on mission.
Key.Chinese: "Delta"-執行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔"-执行任务。

Key.Original: Echo here, rolling.
Key.Chinese: 這是"Echo"，行動中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"回声"，正在推进。

Key.Original: Foxtrot, stepping off.
Key.Chinese: "狐步舞"，我們出發了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐步舞"，正在前进。

Key.Original: Be advised, CAS is inbound, out.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，密接空中支援正在趕來，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，近程空中支援正在路上，完毕。

Container.name: 003_br_sf_briefing_c
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence, for special forces role. animated briefing with map and strategic information. visual breakdown of mission objectives.

Key.Original: First though, we'll need to silence a mortar - firing on our lines from this area here, not far from Sainte Marie.
Key.Chinese: 我們首先必須消滅一處迫擊砲-這些人從這地區附近砲擊我們的防線，離聖瑪麗不遠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过我们得先摧毁一门迫击炮-从这个地区向我们的阵线开火，离圣玛丽不远。

Key.Original: It seems to be constantly switching positions.
Key.Chinese: 似乎還時時改變位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来它一直在改变位置。

Key.Original: That's where you and your team come in, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 這就是要找你和你的隊伍來的原因，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是你和你的小组进入的地方，中士。

Key.Original: Before the offensive we need you to find it and take it out.
Key.Chinese: 你必須在攻擊前找出迫擊砲並解決掉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在进攻之前，我们需要你找到并摧毁它。

Key.Original: Ingress here, then make your way to Point Alverstone.
Key.Chinese: 從這裡切入，然後設法前往阿爾弗斯通點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 潜入这里，再前往阿尔弗斯通点。

Key.Original: Be mindful of CSAT patrols and this particular location, here, at Point Sanford.
Key.Chinese: 小心這地區的廣協同盟巡邏隊，他們人在桑福德點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心广协同盟的巡逻队和桑福德点这个位置。

Key.Original: As soon as you've accomplished your mission, retreat to Point Borah and regroup.
Key.Chinese: 只要完成任務，就退回波拉赫點重新整隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你一完成任务，就撤回波拉赫点重新集结。

Key.Original: And that's all... nothing you can't handle. Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 就這樣...相信你能應付得了。解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就是这样...没有什么你们应付不了的。解散。

Container.name: 002_br_inf_briefing_b
Container.situation: second part of briefing sequence, for infantry role. animated briefing with map and strategic information. visual breakdown of mission objectives.

Key.Original: Alpha, you'll strike Point Crestone, here, knocking out AT defences.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，由你攻擊克列斯通點，位置在這，負責擊破反戰車防線。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，你将攻击克列斯通点，这儿，摧毁反坦克防御工事。

Key.Original: From there, you'll attack Point Blackburn, tying up and eliminating this small garrison.
Key.Chinese: 之後前往布萊克本點，殲滅該處的小軍營。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你将从那儿攻击布莱克本点，拖住和消灭这一小支驻防部队。

Key.Original: Meanwhile, Bravo will overrun Point Mitchell and then, together with Charlie, take Point Foraker... just here.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"同時間攻擊布拉克本點，之後與"Charlie"一起攻擊福拉克點...就在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同时，"布拉沃"将占领米切尔点，随后与"查理"一道，夺取福拉克点...就在这儿。

Key.Original: Echo squad, you'll head up to Point Elbert and block any reinforcements from Houdan.
Key.Chinese: "Echo"分隊，你們前往"艾爾伯特"點，封鎖任何從胡丹來襲的敵方援軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声"班，你将前往"艾尔伯特"点，阻挡从胡丹来的任何增援部队。

Key.Original: Foxtrot will reinforce the town and Delta, you'll edge towards Cancon's harbor at Point Massive.
Key.Chinese: "狐步舞"負責防衛城鎮;"Delta"前往麥西夫點，朝康孔港緩緩推進。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐步舞"将增援城镇，而"德尔塔"，你将从侧翼往麦西夫点的康孔港口移动。

Key.Original: Alpha will then continue, accompanied by Bravo and Charlie, hitting a strategic fuel dump, here, at Point Charleston.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"之後將在"Bravo"和"Charlie"的配合下繼續行動，進攻查爾斯頓據點這兒的一個重要燃料庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"之后将在"布拉沃"和"查理"的配合下继续行动，进攻查尔斯顿点这儿的一个重要燃料库。

Key.Original: Once that's ours, they will contact Delta, who will create some sort of diversion.
Key.Chinese: 只要拿下燃料庫就通知"Delta"製造騷亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦夺取了那儿，他们将联系"德尔塔"，"德尔塔"将发起某种牵制性进攻。

Key.Original: This will draw troops from Point Crillon - where we believe a lot of CSAT's wounded are.
Key.Chinese: 用這方式引出克里倫點的部隊-我們認為那裡有不少廣協同盟的傷兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这将引来克里伦点的军队-我们相信那儿有很多广协同盟伤兵。

Key.Original: Alpha can then approach from Chapoi and secure the site.
Key.Chinese: 這樣"Alpha"就能接近沙普瓦，肅清當地。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"随后可以从沙普瓦接近，夺取那个地点。

Key.Original: Okay - you all know what you got to do out there...? Great... let's put it into action. Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 好-你們都清楚該怎麼做了...?很好...那就開始行動吧。解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，你们大家都明白你们要干什么了吧?好...我们行动吧。解散。

Container.name: 001_br_all_briefing_a
Container.situation: first part of briefing sequence. animated briefing with map and strategic information. visual breakdown of mission objectives.

Key.Original: Alright, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 好了，弟兄們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，先生们。

Key.Original: I know at least one of you has just arrived, so... I'll go through this again, from the top.
Key.Chinese: 我知道有幾位才剛到，所以...我從頭再說一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你们中间至少有一个人刚到，所以...我从头再说一遍。

Key.Original: They've withdrawn into the island's interior, taking some tanks and man portable AA systems with them, here and possibly here, as well.
Key.Chinese: 該軍團已經撤到島嶼內陸，還帶著部分戰車和人員攜帶式防空飛彈系統，可能位置在這兩個地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们已经撤退到岛屿内陆，带上了几辆坦克和便捷式防空系统，这里，也许还有这里。

Key.Original: Obviously, this is some kind of... delaying tactic. But for what? It's hard to say.
Key.Chinese: 很明顯的，這是某種...拖延戰術。但究竟原因為何?現在還很難說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然，这是某种...拖延战术。不过是为了什么呢?很难说。

Key.Original: After our exit and the catastrophic handling of Cold War-era stockpiles, Malden has drifted into CSAT's sphere of influence.
Key.Chinese: 自從我們撤出馬爾登、冷戰時期留下的那批儲藏物又處理得一團亂後，馬爾登島就被納入廣協同盟的勢力範圍了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们撤离该地以及冷战时期的武器储备遭受灾难性处置之后，马尔登岛落入广协同盟的势力范围。

Key.Original: Our former base, here, to the north of the main airport, is now a major concern.
Key.Chinese: 我們之前在主機場北邊的基地，這裡，是目前的主要問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们原先的基地，这儿，主机场的北面，现在是我们主要关注的问题。

Key.Original: China's got a squadron of long-range aircraft there. Shikras.
Key.Chinese: 中國在那裡駐紮了一支長程飛行中隊。"赫耳鷹"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中国人在那有一个中队的远程飞机。"褐耳鹰"。

Key.Original: Brass tacks: we need air superiority over the Gibraltar Straits - if we don't have that, we can't invade Altis and Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 重點來了:我們必須掌握直布羅陀海峽的空中優勢-否則我們不可能攻進阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当务之急:我们需要在直布罗陀海峡上空占据空中优势，如果做不到的话，我们就无法入侵阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯。

Key.Original: Thankfully, the Chinese are keen to avoid a wider conflict.
Key.Chinese: 幸好，中國人目前極力避免衝突擴大。
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸运的是，中国人急于避免大范围冲突。

Key.Original: They've agreed to ground their jets and accept a temporary NATO holding force.
Key.Chinese: 中國人同意禁止噴射機升空，並暫時接受北約派兵牽制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们已经同意让喷气式飞机停飞，并同意北约派出一支临时性的驻守部队。

Key.Original: That's here.
Key.Chinese: 在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是这儿。

Key.Original: However, African troops from CSAT's Scimitar Regiment are non-compliant.
Key.Chinese: 但是，廣協同盟中的非洲裔部隊-彎刀軍團-拒絕合作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，来自广协同盟"大弯刀"团的非洲军队不遵守协议。

Key.Original: Our response has been about denying the enemy time.
Key.Chinese: 我們不能給敵人時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的反应是不给敌军时间。

Key.Original: Hence, this bridgehead to the south, down here at the harbor near Le Port.
Key.Chinese: 所以，我們在往南的路上搭起了橋頭堡，就在勒·波特附近的港口。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，勒·波特附近的港口这儿，朝南的这个桥头堡。

Key.Original: If we push west, we can sever logistics and open up another front outside Chapoi and Cancon.
Key.Chinese: 如果我們往西推進，就能切斷敵方後勤，並在沙普瓦和康孔外圍拉起新戰線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们向西推进，我们可以切断物资供应，在沙普瓦和康孔以外开辟另一条前线。

Container.name: 093_ex_sf_leaving_ao
Container.situation: player is leaving ao.

Key.Original: Mm, yeah.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，呃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，是啊。

Key.Original: This ain't the right way...
Key.Chinese: 這方向不對...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这条路不对...

Container.name: 092_ex_sf_mortar_truck_leaving
Container.situation: owing to the player alerting the enemy, the mortar truck retreats to an enemy strongpoint. hq are forced to send cas to intercept. alternative to ta_sf_mortar_fail.

Key.Original: Alright, Pariah, pinpoint where and interdict. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好，"賤民"，找出迫擊砲所在，進行攔截。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，"贱民"，查明方位并拦截。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"。

Key.Original: That mortar's gonna know we're here by now. He'll be trying to get to a safer spot.
Key.Chinese: 那臺迫擊砲現在一定知道我們的存在了。他們會試著前往比較安全的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个迫击炮小组现在应该知道我们在这了。他们会设法到一个安全些的地方去。

Container.name: 091_ex_sf_mortar_truck_detected_loud
Container.situation: player spots the enemy's mobile mortar, mounted on a truck. relays information to hq. enemy has opened fire on the player or the player has 'gone loud'.

Key.Original: Prosecute that target, Pariah. Out.
Key.Chinese: 解決掉目標，"賤民"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭那个目标，"贱民"。完毕。

Container.name: 090_ex_sf_mortar_truck_detected_silent
Container.situation: player spots the enemy's mobile mortar, mounted on a truck. relays information to hq. enemy has not opened fire on the player and the player has not 'gone loud'.

Key.Original: Prosecute that target, Pariah. Feel free to use explosives and create a little chaos...
Key.Chinese: 解決掉目標，"賤民"。你可以使用炸藥引起混亂，隨你高興...
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭那个目标，"贱民"。准许使用炸弹，制造点混乱出来...

Key.Original: Do not answer, out.
Key.Chinese: 不用回答，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别回复，完毕。

Container.name: 089_ex_sf_mortar_truck_detected
Container.situation: player spots the enemy's mobile mortar, mounted on a truck.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: Got eyes on our mortar - it's being fired from a truck. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我看見那臺迫擊砲了-從卡車裡發射的。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到我们的迫击炮了-它从一辆卡车那开火。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 088_ex_sf_camp_alarmed
Container.situation: player raises alarm in enemy camp.

Key.Original: Copy. Remember the mission. Time is running out. Do not get pinned down in a fire-fight. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。別忘了任務。時間不多。別被槍戰拖住。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。记住任务。时间不多了。别被困在交火里。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah. CSAT's raised the alarm. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。廣協同盟開始提高警覺了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"。广协同盟发出了警报。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 087_ex_inf_pow_killed
Container.situation: player executes a wounded enemy soldier.

Key.Original: Shit...
Key.Chinese: 可惡...
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼...

Key.Original: Maybe I shouldn't have done that...
Key.Chinese: 我不該這麼做的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许我不该那么做...

Container.name: 085_ex_sf_cas_not_required_civilians
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective. to follow ex_sf_cas_not_required_b_out or ex_sf_cas_not_required_close_b_out.

Key.Original: Pariah... that was near the fucking knuckle!
Key.Chinese: "賤民"...這次真是太驚險了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"...那可是千钧一发!

Key.Original: But you may've saved some lives.
Key.Chinese: 但你可能救了不少弟兄的命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过你也许救了几条命。

Key.Original: Just stay on task from now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你繼續任務吧。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从现在开始，专心执行任务。完毕。

Container.name: 084_ex_sf_cas_not_required_close_b_out
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective. the jet is seconds away from engaging.

Key.Original: Jesus, Guardian, you got the circus in town or what?
Key.Chinese: 老天爺，"守護者"，你是月經來了還是怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪，"守护者"，你叫了个马戏团到镇里还是怎么的?

Key.Original: I don't want a fucking blue on blue on my conscience.
Key.Chinese: 別害我他媽誤擊友軍，從此良心受到煎熬喔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可不想他媽的误袭友军，让我的良心不安。

Key.Original: That was too damn close - RTB, out.
Key.Chinese: 這次真的太驚險了-返回基地，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那太他妈近了-返回基地。完毕。

Container.name: 083_ex_sf_cas_not_required_b_out
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective.

Key.Original: Copy. Avenger, RTB, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"復仇者"準備返回基地，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"复仇者"，返回基地。完毕。

Container.name: 082_ex_sf_cas_not_required_b
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet a second time and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective.

Key.Original: Avenger, do not fire!
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，別開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，别开火!

Key.Original: There's been a, uh, major breakdown in comms. Break off your attack and return to base.
Key.Chinese: 通訊出了，呃，嚴重問題。中止攻擊，返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通信发生严重故障。中止进攻，返回基地。

Key.Original: Guardian, that mortar's no longer a threat.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，那臺迫擊砲已經不再是威脅了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，那门迫击炮不再是威胁了。

Container.name: 081_ex_sf_cas_not_required_close_a_out
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective. the jet is seconds away from engaging.

Key.Original: Copy!
Key.Chinese: 收到!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到!

Key.Original: Guardian, that was fucking near the mark. Respectfully request you keep your boys on a leash. Out.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這次真他媽驚險。我誠摯要求你管緊你家的大兵。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这次真他妈的太惊险了。拜托你把你的人看好。

Key.Original: Avenger - hold fire - abort! Ground forces have engaged!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"-停火-中止!地面部隊在交戰了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"-别开火-中止任务!地面部队已交战!

Container.name: 080_ex_sf_cas_not_required_a_out
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Guardian. out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"守護者"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守护者"。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian to Avenger - abort! Ground forces have engaged.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"復仇者"-中止!地面部隊在交戰了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"复仇者"-中止任务!地面部队已交战。

Container.name: 079_ex_sf_cas_not_required_a
Container.situation: player asks hq to contact jet and explain the mortar has already been eliminated. hq tells player to stay focused and to follow the given objective.

Key.Original: Damn it! What the hell, Pariah! CAS is already en route!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!你搞屁啊，"贱民"!密接空中支援已經上路了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干！你搞什么飞机，"贱民"!近距离空中支援已经在路上了!

Key.Original: Guardian, update!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，有新消息!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，最新情况!

Key.Original: This is Pariah - we managed to take care of that mortar!
Key.Chinese: 這是"賤民"-我們設法處理掉迫擊砲了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"贱民"-我们设法搞定了那门迫击炮!

Container.name: 075_eve_all_hurry_up_c_in
Container.situation: hq orders special forces to hurry up. infantry are under heavy fire. to follow eve_all_mortars_firing.

Key.Original: Guardian to Pariah, flash! Alpha is in the rain.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"賤民"，緊急訊息!"阿尔法"遭遇猛烈攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"贱民"，紧急情况!"阿尔法"遭到猛烈攻击。

Key.Original: Neutralize that gun, ASAP!
Key.Chinese: 殲滅迫擊砲，立刻!
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁那门炮，尽快!

Key.Original: Solid copy, Guardian, can hear that fucker, he's not far, out.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚，"守護者"，我聽見那混帳的聲音了，一定在不遠處，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完全明白，"守护者"，我可以听到那个混账东西的声音，离得不远，完毕。

Container.name: 074_eve_sf_hurry_up_b
Container.situation: hq orders special forces to hurry up. infantry are under heavy fire.

Key.Original: Pariah, expedite!
Key.Chinese: "贱民"，動作快!
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，快点!

Key.Original: That mortar's wreaking havoc!
Key.Chinese: 迫擊砲在重炮轟炸!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那门迫击炮正在造成灾难!

Key.Original: Copy, Guardian, hang on! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守護者"，撐住!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守护者"，坚持住!完毕。

Container.name: 073_eve_sf_hurry_up_a_remark
Container.situation: hq has ordered special forces to hurry up and destroy the enemy mortar. player speaks to his group. to follow eve_sf_hurry_up_a.

Key.Original: Double time!
Key.Chinese: 加緊前進!
Key.Chinesesimp: 加快速度!

Key.Original: Let's get this done!
Key.Chinese: 大家上啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们把这搞定吧!

Container.name: 072_eve_sf_hurry_up_a
Container.situation: hq orders special forces to hurry up. infantry are under heavy fire.

Key.Original: Pariah, that mortar's still active.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，那臺迫擊砲還在活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，那门迫击炮还在射击。

Key.Original: Message received, moving fast. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到訊息，我們加緊行動。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，正快速前进。完毕。

Container.name: 071_loc_sf_cache_discovered
Container.situation: player discovers a large weapon's cache.

Key.Original: Go ahead, Pariah.
Key.Chinese: 說吧，"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲，"贱民"。

Key.Original: Received, Pariah. That's an ominous development.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"賤民"。這種發展可不妙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"贱民"。那是个不好的预兆。

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"贱民"呼叫。

Key.Original: Relaying to higher - out.
Key.Chinese: 正在轉達消息給上級-結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正向高层传达-完毕。

Key.Original: Got a weapon cache here. Crates are covered in Mandarin.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有個武器庫。箱子上寫得是中文。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这发现一个武器仓库。箱子上写着汉字。

Key.Original: Looks to me like your CSAT boys are being well supplied.
Key.Chinese: 看來那些廣協同盟傢伙的補給充足啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我看来，像是你们广协同盟的人正得到充足的补给。

Container.name: 069_eve_sf_truck_destroyed
Container.situation: player destroys the truck that is transporting the enemy's mortar - vehicle explodes.

Key.Original: Shit...
Key.Chinese: 可惡...
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼...

Container.name: 068_eve_sf_player_wounded
Container.situation: player is wounded.

Key.Original: Argh.
Key.Chinese: 呃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊。

Key.Original: Son of a bitch...
Key.Chinese: 狗娘養的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 混蛋玩意...

Container.name: 064_eve_sf_cas_successful_b
Container.situation: air support eliminates the enemy's mortar.

Key.Original: Guardian - direct hit.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"直接命中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"-直接命中。

Key.Original: Good hunting, Avenger. RTB. Out.
Key.Chinese: 獵殺愉快，"復仇者"。開始返航。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 猎杀愉快，"复仇者"。开始返航。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian to Pariah, Now resume your prior objective and exfil. Out.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"賤民"，繼續執行之前的任務並撤退。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"贱民"，现在重新执行你的前一个目标并撤离。完毕。

Container.name: 063_eve_sf_cas_successful_a
Container.situation: air support eliminates the enemy's mobile mortar.

Key.Original: Guardian, Avenger.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"復仇者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"复仇者"呼叫。

Key.Original: Enemy vehicle destroyed... he's not coming back from that. Out.
Key.Chinese: 已經摧毀敵方載具...他是再起不能了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军车辆已摧毁...它不会从那回去了。完毕。

Container.name: 062_eve_sf_cas_approaches_i
Container.situation: the player ends conversation with hq, after giving a greenlight for close air support, despite being close to the target zone. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_g and eve_sf_cas_approaches_h.

Key.Original: Alpha needs this! Out.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"就靠這個了!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"正需要这个!完毕。

Container.name: 061_eve_sf_cas_approaches_h
Container.situation: air support approaches target for a second time. player informs hq that they are leaving strike zone. player is on their own and all the rest of their squad is dead. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_a.

Key.Original: Negative!
Key.Chinese: 否定!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不!

Key.Original: I'm pretty close! But don't let CAS make another pass.
Key.Chinese: 我還沒走遠!別讓密接空中支援又來一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相当接近!不过别让近距离空中支援再来一次了。

Container.name: 060_eve_sf_cas_approaches_g
Container.situation: air support approaches target for a second time. player informs hq that they are leaving strike zone. some of the player's group are still alive. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_a.

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死!

Key.Original: Negative, Guardian!
Key.Chinese: 否定，"守護者"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，"守护者"!

Key.Original: But we're hauling ass. Keep Avenger on approach.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經在加緊趕路了!讓"復仇者"在附近等待。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过我们正在加快速度。让"复仇者"继续接近。

Container.name: 059_eve_sf_cas_approaches_f
Container.situation: air support approaches target for a second time. player informs hq that they are not near strike zone. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_a.

Key.Original: Affirmative, Guardian, nowhere near it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，"守護者"，我們走遠了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，"守护者"，不在那附近。完毕。

Container.name: 058_eve_sf_cas_approaches_e
Container.situation: air support approaches target for a second time.

Key.Original: Avenger, to Guardian.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"呼叫"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"呼叫"守护者"。

Key.Original: Four klicks from that second target site. Over.
Key.Chinese: 距離第二目標地點還有四公里。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 离第2个目标位置4千米。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Avenger.
Key.Chinese: 確認，Avenger。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"复仇者"。

Key.Original: Pariah, you better be a good distance from that farmhouse.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，你最好和那農舍保持適當距離。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，你最好离那座农舍远点。

Container.name: 057_eve_sf_cas_approaches_out
Container.situation: hq orders air support to engage target.

Key.Original: Avenger, confirmed. You're weapon's free. Out.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，確認。準許開火。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，已确认。你可以开火了。完毕。

Container.name: 056_eve_sf_cas_approaches_d
Container.situation: air support approaches first target. player informs hq that they are leaving strike zone. player is on their own and all the rest of their squad is dead. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_a.

Key.Original: Fuck! I'm getting clear!
Key.Chinese: 操!我快到安全距離了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死!我正在离开!

Key.Original: Don't shitcan that CAS, Guardian - I can make it!
Key.Chinese: 媽的，別取消密接空中支援，"守護者"-我一定會趕到!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别取消近距离空中支援，"守护者"-我能做到!

Container.name: 055_eve_sf_cas_approaches_c
Container.situation: air support approaches first target. player informs hq that they are leaving strike zone. some of the player's group are still alive. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_a.

Key.Original: Fuck, we're still close!
Key.Chinese: 幹，我們還沒走遠!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我们还是很接近!

Key.Original: Don't shitcan that CAS, Guardian, we'll make it!
Key.Chinese: 媽的，別取消密接空中支援，"守護者"-我們一定會趕到!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别取消近距离空中支援，"守护者"-我们能做到!

Container.name: 054_eve_sf_cas_approaches_b
Container.situation: air support approaches first target. player informs hq that they are not near strike zone. to follow eve_sf_cas_approaches_a.

Key.Original: All clear. Greenlight that shit, Guardian. Over.
Key.Chinese: 區域安全。可以發射了，"守護者"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 无危险。可以发射那鬼东西，"守护者"。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 053_eve_sf_cas_approaches_a
Container.situation: air support approaches first target.

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Avenger.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"復仇者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"复仇者"。

Key.Original: Vectoring for attack. Confirm no friendlies in vicinity of target area, over.
Key.Chinese: 在空中盤旋，準備攻擊。確認目標地區四周沒有友軍，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备攻击。确认目标区域附近没有友军，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Stand by, Avenger.
Key.Chinese: 做好準備，"復仇者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 待命，"复仇者"。

Key.Original: Pariah, POSREP, what's your status?
Key.Chinese: Pariah，回報位置，你那邊狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，情况报告，你的状况如何?

Container.name: 052_eve_sf_cas_30_seconds
Container.situation: air support approaches target.

Key.Original: Guardian, Avenger, ETA 30 seconds...
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"復仇者"，預計再30秒抵達...
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，"复仇者"，预计30秒后到达...

Container.name: 051_ta_sf_safe_distance_out
Container.situation: hq ends conversation with the player. mission ends successfully. to follow ta_sf_safe_distance_review_a or ta_sf_safe_distance_review_b or ta_sf_safe_distance_review_c or ta_sf_distance_review_d.

Key.Original: Get on the other side of those mountains and prep for second phase of the operation, out.
Key.Chinese: 你翻過山頭，準備下一階段任務，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到那些山的另一面去，准备进行第二阶段行动，完毕。

Container.name: 050_ta_sf_safe_distance_review_d
Container.situation: hq rebukes player for poor performance. to follow ta_sf_safe_distance_review_c.

Key.Original: I don't how it all got so fucked up out there, but we can't afford more mistakes; we need it by the numbers next time...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道戰況是怎麼變成這副德性的-但我們不能再承受任何失誤了，下次你必須照章行事...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道情况怎么会这么糟糕的，可是我们没法承受更多错误了。我们下次需要按命令行事...

Container.name: 049_ta_sf_safe_distance_review_c
Container.situation: hq acknowledges player's prior transmission. player completes none or a few of the objectives and does badly in the mission. to follow ta_sf_safe_distance_alone or ta_sf_distance_group or ta_sf_distance_group_dead.

Key.Original: Copy that, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 收到，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，中士。

Container.name: 048_ta_sf_safe_distance_review_b
Container.situation: hq acknowledges player's prior transmission. player completes some objectives and does okay in the mission. to follow ta_sf_safe_distance_alone or ta_sf_distance_group.

Key.Original: Copy that, a good effort, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 收到，你盡力了，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得不错，中士。

Container.name: 047_ta_sf_safe_distance_review_a
Container.situation: hq acknowledges player's prior transmission. player completes objectives and generally does well in the mission. to follow ta_sf_safe_distance_alone or ta_sf_distance_group.

Key.Original: Copy that, excellent job out there, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 收到，表現非常優秀，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得漂亮，中士。

Container.name: 046_ta_sf_safe_distance_group_dead
Container.situation: player informs hq he has retreated.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian. Almost at Point Borah. Over.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"。快到波拉赫點了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。快到波拉赫点了。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 045_ta_sf_safe_distance_group
Container.situation: player informs hq that he and his group have retreated.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian, we're almost at Point Borah, over.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"，我們快到波拉赫點了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。我们快到波拉赫点了。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 044_ta_sf_safe_distance_alone
Container.situation: player informs hq he has retreated and his group are not far behind.

Key.Original: Pariah to Guardian. Almost at Point Borah.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"守護者"，快到波拉赫點了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"守护者"。快到波拉赫点了。

Key.Original: My boys aren't far behind, we'll RV shortly, over.
Key.Chinese: 其他兄弟在我身後不遠處，我們很快就要會合，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的伙计们在后面不远的地方，我们将很快集合，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 043_ta_sf_tanks_alone
Container.situation: player investigates potential threat from enemy armor and discovers that they are old, rusted wrecks. he then informs hq and is ordered to retreat.

Key.Original: Roger, Pariah. Hightail it to Point Borah. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"賤民"。盡快撤往波拉赫點。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"贱民"。迅速撤离到波拉赫点。完毕。

Key.Original: You gotta be shitting me...
Key.Chinese: 你他媽是在耍我吧...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是在耍我...

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Pariah.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，这里是"贱民"。

Key.Original: You won't believe this. That armor? It's junk!
Key.Chinese: 你聽了一定不信。那臺裝甲根本是垃圾!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不会相信的。那辆装甲车?它是垃圾!

Key.Original: Just some old Ruski wreckage, leftover from the fucking Cold War!
Key.Chinese: 就是俄製老古董，從他媽的冷戰時期留到現在!
Key.Chinesesimp: 只是个什么俄国制的老旧废品，从该死的冷战时期留下的!

Key.Original: Only danger here is if I cut myself and die of septicemia - over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡唯一的威脅是我不小心弄傷自己，死於敗血癥-完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这儿的唯一危险是假如我割伤了自己，然后死于败血症-完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 042_ta_sf_second_mortar_destroyed
Container.situation: player destroys a second mortar that is bombarding alpha squad and is ordered by hq to retreat.

Key.Original: Just in time! Now resume your prior objective and exfil. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這消息來得正是時候!繼續執行之前的任務並撤退。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正是时候!现在重新执行你的前一个目标并撤离。完毕。

Key.Original: Guardian, second mortar eliminated. Alpha's home free.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，已經殲滅第二處迫擊砲。"Alpha"安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，第二门迫击炮已消灭。"阿尔法"安全啦。

Container.name: 041_ta_sf_second_mortar_fail_out
Container.situation: after player challenges hq over airstrike, hq explains that there are now no other options. to follow either ta_sf_second_mortar_fail or ta_sf_second_mortar_fail_twice.

Key.Original: Going to have to take that risk now, Pariah. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須冒這個險，"賤民"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在不得不冒这个险了，"贱民"。完毕。

Key.Original: We've got no other options, out.
Key.Chinese: 我們別無選擇，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们别无选择，完毕。

Container.name: 040_ta_sf_second_mortar_fail_twice
Container.situation: hq informs special forces they have taken too long and that close air support will destroy the mortar - even though collateral damage may occur. moreover, this is the second time the player has relied on cas to do his job.

Key.Original: Pariah - you're slower than fucking pond water.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"-你他媽在給我繡花啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"-你比他妈的池水反应还慢。

Key.Original: Alpha's getting hit, bad. Avenger's going to have to return and provide close air support.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"被擊中了，很嚴重。"復仇者"必須回來進行密接空中支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"被击中，打得很惨。"复仇者"将不得不返回提供近距离空中支援。

Key.Original: Another airstrike? Christ, we could have civilians down there!
Key.Chinese: 又要空襲?老天，那裡可能有平民啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 又一次空袭?天啊，我们在那儿可能有平民!

Container.name: 039_ta_sf_second_mortar_fail
Container.situation: hq informs special forces they have taken too long and that close air support will destroy the mortar - even though collateral damage may occur.

Key.Original: Guardian to Pariah.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"贱民"。

Key.Original: It's no good, you're taking too long... we're calling in close air support.
Key.Chinese: 沒用的，你太慢了...我們要呼叫密接空中支援了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，你用的时间太长了...我们正在呼叫近距离空中支援。

Key.Original: And if there's civilians?
Key.Chinese: 如果有平民怎麼辦?
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果有平民呢?

Container.name: 038_eve_sf_hurry_up_e
Container.situation: player grumbles to himself, after being ordered by hq to hurry.

Key.Original: This is fucking suicide...
Key.Chinese: 這他媽是在自殺...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是他妈的自杀...

Container.name: 037_eve_sf_hurry_up_d
Container.situation: player orders his team to hurry, after being told to do so by hq. a team member is within earshot.

Key.Original: Move!
Key.Chinese: 走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 前进!

Key.Original: Let's pick up the pace!
Key.Chinese: 我們加快速度!
Key.Chinesesimp: 加快速度!

Container.name: 035_ta_sf_mortar_fail_out_b
Container.situation: player responds to hq and explains that he is retreating, alone.

Key.Original: Damn it. Alright, Guardian. It's me on my own now.
Key.Chinese: 可惡。好吧，"守護者"。現在就剩我了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好的，"守护者"。现在就剩我自己了。

Key.Original: I'm Oscar Mike. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我在路上了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我正在行进。完毕。

Container.name: 034_ta_sf_mortar_fail_out_a
Container.situation: player responds to hq and explains his team are retreating.

Key.Original: Damn it. Alright, Guardian. My team are Oscar Mike. Out.
Key.Chinese: 可惡。好吧，"守護者"。我們小隊在路上了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好的，"守护者"。我的小组正在行进。完毕。

Container.name: 033_ta_sf_first_mortar_fail
Container.situation: hq contacts player and explains that they have taken too long to eliminate the enemy's mortar. hq sends air support to deal with the threat. player is ordered to retreat.

Key.Original: Pariah, we can't wait any longer...
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，不能再等了...
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，我们不能再等了...

Key.Original: Head towards Point Borah - CAS will eliminate your objective.
Key.Chinese: 前往波拉赫點-密接空中支援會殲滅你的任務目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向波拉赫点进发-近距离空中支援将消灭你的目标。

Container.name: 032_ta_sf_mortar_gone_c
Container.situation: special forces respond to hq's request to recon suspected enemy armor but explains they have taken heavy casualties. hq explains that the primary objective is to retreat.

Key.Original: Copy, assess your situation. Egress and get back to Point Borah, or, if you can, investigate.
Key.Chinese: 收到，你評估一下狀況。後撤到波拉赫點，若有餘力，你可以繼續調查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，请评估你的情况。潜出并回到波拉赫点，或者，如果可以的话，进行调查。

Key.Original: Don't take any chances, Pariah. This is a numbers game - and you're figures fucking few! Out.
Key.Chinese: 但別冒險，"賤民"。這是一個數字遊戲-你的數字他媽的少!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要心存侥幸，"贱民"。这是个数量游戏-而你的数量真他妈的少!完毕。

Key.Original: That's a problem, we've taken heavy casualties, Guardian.
Key.Chinese: 有個問題，我們損傷慘重，"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是个问题，我们的伤亡十分惨重，"守护者"。

Container.name: 031_ta_sf_mortar_gone_b
Container.situation: special forces respond to hq's request to recon suspected enemy armor.

Key.Original: No problem, we'll see if we can get a closer look, out.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題，我們會試著靠近點觀察，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题，我们会看看能否再凑近看看，完毕。

Container.name: 030_ta_sf_mortar_gone_a
Container.situation: special forces tell hq that enemy mortar has been destroyed. hq warns them of a possible armored threat and orders them to investigate.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Pariah.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"賤民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"贱民"。

Key.Original: Great work. Listen, we're receiving some new information.
Key.Chinese: 做得好。聽著，我們有新消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮。听着，我们正收到一些新消息。

Key.Original: Guardian - enemy artillery at Point Alverstone's out of commission. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 守護者-阿爾弗斯通點的敵方迫擊砲已經失去作用了。你收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"-阿尔弗斯通点的敌方火炮坏了。收到了吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: CSAT armor. Possible sighting. Grid 057-043... we need to verify before our attack.
Key.Chinese: 可能發現廣協同盟裝甲的位置了。方格坐標057-043...攻擊前必須確認消息真偽。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能发现广协同盟装甲。坐标057-043...我们需要在攻击前核实一下。

Container.name: 029_ta_sf_opening
Container.situation: special forces contact hq.

Key.Original: Copy.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Key.Original: Interrogative. Do you have a visual on your primary?
Key.Chinese: 問題，你發現主要目標了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有个问题。你能看到主要目标吗?

Key.Original: Guardian, Pariah. Making tracks.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"賤民"。我們直奔目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"贱民"。进行跟踪。

Key.Original: Get a bead on it, Pariah. Move fast and hit Point Alverstone... out.
Key.Chinese: 專注一點，"賤民"。快速行動並攻擊阿爾弗斯通點...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞄准它，"贱民"。快速前进并攻击阿尔弗斯通点...完毕。

Key.Original: Negative.
Key.Chinese: 否定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不能。

Key.Original: Audio contact only.
Key.Chinese: 只聽見聲音。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只能听到声音。

Container.name: 022_eve_inf_medical_camp_support_d
Container.situation: hq halts bickering between alpha and echo and gives orders. to follow eve_inf_medical_camp_support_b or eve_inf_medical_camp_support_c.

Key.Original: Minimize!
Key.Chinese: 通信減量!
Key.Chinesesimp: 最小化!

Key.Original: Echo. Hand over your victor for the assist.
Key.Chinese: "Echo"。我要調動你的裝甲載具進行支援任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声"。把装甲车调过来支援。

Key.Original: Synchronize your efforts and secure our last objective. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你必須同步執行原先的任務。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 协调你的各项任务，夺取我们最后一个目标。完毕。

Container.name: 009_eve_all_mortars_destroyed_a
Container.situation: hq informs player's squad that the mortar is destroyed.

Key.Original: Alpha team, enemy mortar destroyed. Continue on objective.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"聽著，敵方迫擊砲已經毀了。你繼續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"小组，敌军迫击炮已被摧毁。继续攻击目标。

Key.Original: Seize Point Blackburn and interdict any CSAT troops located there.
Key.Chinese: 佔領布萊克本點並攔截駐守在那裡的所有廣協同盟部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取布莱克本点并阻断位于那里的任何广协同盟部队。

Key.Original: Do not let them linkup with hostile forces. Over.
Key.Chinese: 別讓敵人合流。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要让他们与敌军会合。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: During the invasion of Altis, NATO forces stage a daring air assault to open a second front.
Key.Chinese: 北約部隊在侵攻阿爾蒂斯期間，安排了一次大膽的空中攻擊，拉開第二戰線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约部队在入侵阿尔蒂斯期间组织了一次大胆的空中突击，企图开辟第二战线。

Key.Original: Steel Pegasus
Key.Chinese: 鋼鐵飛馬
Key.Chinesesimp: 钢铁天马

Container.name: 040_eve_ctrg_rv
Container.situation: player's group meets british special forces who then take them to boats waiting at the beach.

Key.Original: Right, you got one?
Key.Chinese: 嗯，你知道在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错，你有吗?

Key.Original: Morning, lads.
Key.Chinese: 早安，弟兄們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 早上好，伙计们。

Key.Original: Heard you're after an exit...
Key.Chinese: 聽說你們在找出口...
Key.Chinesesimp: 听说你们在寻找出口...

Key.Original: Yeah, boats are at the beach - come on, let's go.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，船在海灘上-快，我們走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，船就在海滩上-来吧，我们走。

Container.name: 039_eve_csat_submarine_destroyed_report
Container.situation: hms proteus destroys enemy submarine and reports event to guardian.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Proteus. Give us a second to process that...
Key.Chinese: 確認，"變形蟲"。給我們一點時間處理...
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"变形虫"。给我们一点儿时间来处理...

Key.Original: Guardian, enemy submarine eliminated.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，已殲滅敵方潛水艇。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，敌军潜艇已被消灭。

Key.Original: Broaching now, I'll send someone to reel your lads in. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們的船正轉往你們那裡，我會派人去接你們。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我要派个人把你的伙计们撤回来。完毕。

Container.name: 038_eve_csat_submarine_destroyed
Container.situation: player sees a massive explosion out at sea.

Key.Original: Whoah...?

Container.name: 037_ta_evacuate_opportunity
Container.situation: guardian orders all forces to retreat. they are given an exit via ctrg's intervention.

Key.Original: All callsigns, Guardian.
Key.Chinese: 各呼號注意，這是"守護者"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号，"守护者"呼叫。

Key.Original: It's a 'negative' on that CAS. Boys, I'm sorry. There's nothing we can do about those tanks...
Key.Chinese: 密接空中支援的請求被'拒絕'。弟兄們，我很抱歉。我們沒辦法對付那些戰車...
Key.Chinesesimp: '无法'提供近距离空中支援。伙计们，对不起。对于这些坦克我们无能为力...

Key.Original: Abort the mission, fall back to the staging area - we must consider our options and the poss -
Key.Chinese: 中止任務，退回轉運區-我們必須重新考慮手邊資源和狀-
Key.Chinesesimp: 中止任务，撤退到集结区-我们必须考虑我们的选择和可能性-

Key.Original: Proteus, Guardian. How the hell did you get this channel?
Key.Chinese: "變形蟲"，這是"守護者"。你是怎麼接到我們頻率的?
Key.Chinesesimp: "变形虫"，我是"守护者"。你到底是怎么找到这个频道的?

Key.Original: Authenticate: Echo Charlie.
Key.Chinese: 對口號:如手如足一心一德，下一句是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 口令:"回声·查理"。

Key.Original: Callsign: Guardian. This is Captain McGinnis of the Her Majesty's Ship, Proteus.
Key.Chinese: 呼號:"守护者"。這是麥克吉尼斯艇长，服役於英國海軍，呼號是"變形蟲"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼号:"守护者"。我是英国皇家海军"变形虫"号的艇长麦克吉尼斯。

Key.Original: Royal Navy.
Key.Chinese: 皇家海軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 皇家海军。

Key.Original: Give us some time, we're working on your extraction.
Key.Chinese: 等一下，我們在設法撤出你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 给我们一些时间，我们正在研究帮助你们撤离。

Key.Original: Copy - verified.
Key.Chinese: 收到-確認。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到-已核实。

Key.Original: Do not approach. A CSAT submarine's active in the area. Do you copy...? Over.
Key.Chinese: 你們別接近。這地區有一臺廣協同盟潛水艇在活動。你收到嗎...?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要靠近。广协同盟潜艇在该地区很活跃。你收到了吗...?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: I authenticate with Zulu Delta.
Key.Chinese: 個個都是英雄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回令:"祖鲁·德尔塔"。

Key.Original: All teams, change of plan. Disengage. RV with the Brits at the designated co-ordinates.
Key.Chinese: 大家注意，計畫有變。脫離戰鬥。前往指定坐標和英國海軍會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小组，计划有变。撤出战斗。在指定坐标与英国人会合。

Key.Original: Proteus copies all.
Key.Chinese: "變形蟲"完整收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: "变形虫"全都收到。

Key.Original: Get your men to grid 213-121. That's 213-121 - we have operatives ashore, not far from their position.
Key.Chinese: 讓你們部隊前往方格坐標213-121。是213-121-我們的人員在那附近的岸上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让你的士兵们前往坐标213-121。213-121-我们有特种部队在岸上，距离他们的阵地不远。

Key.Original: Take it or leave it, Guardian. Out.
Key.Chinese: 接不接受隨你，"守護者"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接不接受由你决定，"守护者"。完毕。

Container.name: 036_eve_airstrike_available
Container.situation: air support was available.

Key.Original: All units, this is Guardian. CAS is on the way.
Key.Chinese: 各單位注意，這是"守護者"。密接空中支援已經出動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单元，我是"守护者"。近距离空中支援正在路上。

Key.Original: Hold on! Time to target, one mike, out.
Key.Chinese: 大家撐住!倒數一分鐘抵達，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚持住!到达目标时间，1分钟，完毕。

Container.name: 035_ta_enemy_reinforcements_inbound_guardian
Container.situation: guardian organizes defense against counterattack.

Key.Original: Guardian to all units.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫所有單位。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫所有单位。

Key.Original: We have the counterattack incoming. Everybody get into cover and don't stick out.
Key.Chinese: 敵方正要向我們反攻。大家都去找掩護，別暴露。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反攻来袭。大家都掩护起来，不要继续对抗。

Key.Original: That applies to you too, Sierra. Don't get picked out by them.
Key.Chinese: 這也包括你，"塞拉"。別被敵人揪住了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你也一样，"塞拉"。别被他们认出来。

Key.Original: I'm getting division command to get us that damn air support. We have to hold on until then.
Key.Chinese: 我正在請求師長下令，加派該死的空中支援過來。但我們必須撐到那個時候。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得到师部命令，将为我们提供该死的空中支援。我们必须坚持到那个时候。

Container.name: 034_ta_enemy_reinforcements_inbound
Container.situation: enemy reinforcements arrive. maverick cannot delay them anymore.

Key.Original: Understood, Maverick. We'll get ready.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"幼畜"。我們會做好準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"幼畜"。我们将做好准备。

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Maverick. Enemy column just got through us.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"幼畜"。敵方縱隊突破我們了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"幼畜"。敌军纵队刚刚到达我们这里。

Key.Original: You can expect 3 APCs full of infantry and one tank, over.
Key.Chinese: 總共是3臺裝甲運兵車，裡頭都是步兵，還有一輛戰車，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你应该会看到3辆装满步兵的装甲输送车和1辆坦克，完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 033_ta_enemy_reinforcements
Container.situation: enemy reinforcements arrive. maverick delays them.

Key.Original: Guardian, flash! AAF armored column is counterattacking from the north.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，緊急訊息!阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的裝甲縱隊從北方反攻過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，紧急消息!阿尔蒂斯武装力量装甲纵队正在从北方发动反攻。

Key.Original: We can delay them, but not for long.
Key.Chinese: 我們會設法拖住他們，但不會很久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们可以拖延他们，但拖延不了太久。

Container.name: 032_ta_chalkeia_captured
Container.situation: the town is secured.

Key.Original: Guardian to all forces, we have control of the town.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫全體部隊，我們打下城鎮了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫所有部队，我们控制了这个城镇。

Key.Original: More importantly, higher's just sent word: the AAF are retreating from the airport and withdrawing to Pyrgos, the capital.
Key.Chinese: 重點是，我們剛收到上級的消息:阿爾蒂斯武裝力量正退出機場，退到首都皮爾戈斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 更重要的是，指挥部刚刚通知说:阿尔蒂斯武装力量正在从机场撤退，并撤退到首都皮尔戈斯。

Key.Original: Boys, you did it...
Key.Chinese: 弟兄們，你們成功了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 伙计们，你们成功了...

Key.Original: Establish a defensive line and wait for reinforcements, out.
Key.Chinese: 拉起防線，等待援軍，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 建立防线，等待增援，完毕。

Container.name: 031_ta_tigris_destroyed
Container.situation: the enemy aa vehicle is destroyed.

Key.Original: Get some!
Key.Chinese: 吃我一記!
Key.Chinesesimp: 击中了!

Container.name: 030_eve_tigris_attacking
Container.situation: the enemy aa vehicle is attacking alpha.

Key.Original: Copy your traffic, Lieutenant, I've got this. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到消息，少尉，我會搞定。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，中尉，我知道了。完毕。

Key.Original: Sierra, Alpha!
Key.Chinese: 塞拉，這是"Alpha"!
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，我是"阿尔法"!

Key.Original: That AA gun, you have to get an angle on it!
Key.Chinese: 那臺防空武器，你得想個辦法解決它!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个防空炮，你得在上面找好角度!

Container.name: 029_eve_tigris_attacking
Container.situation: the enemy aa vehicle is attacking charlie.

Key.Original: On it, Charlie. That son of a bitch is mine.
Key.Chinese: 立刻照辦，"Charlie"。我要親手解決那個渾球。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这就去，"查理"。那个狗娘养的归我了。

Key.Original: Sierra! Come in! This is Charlie! That SPAAG's tearing us to pieces - take it out, hurry!
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"!請回答!這是"Charlie"!那臺自走防空武器要把我們分屍了-快點解決它!
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"!接收!我是"查理"!那个自行高射炮要把我们撕碎了-摧毁它，快点!

Container.name: 028_ta_tigris_advice_lt_alive
Container.situation: collins informs the player of the enemy vehicle's weakspot. to follow ta_tigris_spotted_sierra or ta_tigris_spotted_charlie.

Key.Original: Attempt a firepower kill, Corporal! Aim for the turret.
Key.Chinese: 下士，試著毀掉它的發射器!瞄準砲塔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尝试火力击杀，下士!瞄准炮塔。

Container.name: 027_ta_tigris_spotted_charlie
Container.situation: a hostile aa vehicle is spotted by charlie.

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 操!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操!

Key.Original: Charlie to all callsigns - we gotta goddamn Tigris here!
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"呼叫所有呼號-這裡有臺"底格里斯"，天殺的!
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"呼叫全体呼号-我们在这儿发现了辆见鬼的"底格里斯"!

Key.Original: Advise! Over.
Key.Chinese: 請指示!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请指示!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Sierra, engage him!
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，上前攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，攻击他!

Container.name: 026_ta_tigris_spotted_guardian
Container.situation: a hostile aa vehicle is spotted by guardian.

Key.Original: Guardian to all callsigns, be advised, we got hostile armor inside the town.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫所有呼號，請注意，城裡有敵方裝甲。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫全体呼号，请注意，我们在城里发现了敌军装甲。

Key.Original: A Tigris self-propelled anti-aircraft gun.
Key.Chinese: 是一臺"底格里斯"自走防空武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: "底格里斯"自行高炮。

Key.Original: Sierra, seek and destroy, switch to AP rounds and engage, out.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，由你負責找出來摧毀，交戰前要切換到穿甲彈，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，寻找并摧毁，交战前切换到穿甲弹并攻击，完毕。

Container.name: 025_eve_position_captured_h
Container.situation: point houston is captured.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Charlie, we just got Houston. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Charlie"，我們剛拿下休斯頓點。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"查理"，我们刚刚夺取了休斯顿点。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, you're on a roll, good going! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，你們打得很順手啊，繼續保持!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，你运气不错，进展神速!完毕。

Container.name: 024_eve_position_captured_g
Container.situation: point atlanta is captured.

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Alpha. Message. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"。有消息。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"阿尔法"。有消息。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Atlanta's secure, I say again, Point Atlanta is secure, over.
Key.Chinese: "亞特蘭大"安全了，我再說一次，亞特蘭大點安全了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "亚特兰大"安全了，我再说一次，亚特兰大点安全了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Go ahead.
Key.Chinese: 請說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲。

Key.Original: Looking good, Alpha - almost there, out.
Key.Chinese: 不錯不錯，"Alpha"-離勝利就差一點了，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看上去不错，"阿尔法"-差不多了，完毕。

Container.name: 023_eve_position_captured_f
Container.situation: point dallas is captured.

Key.Original: Charlie to Guardian, we're at Point Dallas. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"呼叫"守護者"，我們到了達拉斯點了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"呼叫"守护者"，我们在达拉斯点。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Solid copy, Charlie, follow through and hit Point Houston. Out.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚，"Charlie"，繼續作戰，攻擊休斯頓點。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"查理"，再接再厉，攻打休斯顿点。完毕。

Container.name: 022_eve_position_captured_e
