Container.situation: point boston is captured.

Key.Original: Guardian, Bravo here, we've arrived at Point Boston.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"，我們到了波士頓點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"布拉沃"，我们已到达波士顿点。

Key.Original: Excellent, keep up this momentum. Out.
Key.Chinese: 很好，一鼓作氣吧。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了，保持这个势头。完毕。

Container.name: 021_eve_position_captured_d
Container.situation: point miami is captured.

Key.Original: Guardian, Bravo, Miami's ours, over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"，我們攻下邁阿密點了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"布拉沃"，迈阿密点是我们的了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, well done, Bravo - proceed to Point Boston. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，做得很好，"Bravo"-繼續前往波士頓點。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得好，"布拉沃"-向波士顿点进发。完毕。

Container.name: 020_eve_position_captured_c
Container.situation: point san jose is captured.

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Alpha. The church at San José's clear, over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"。聖荷西的教堂安全了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"阿尔法"。圣荷西的教堂安全了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Roger, Alpha, we're gaining ground. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"，我們開始佔上風了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"，我们在不断推进。完毕。

Container.name: 019_eve_position_captured_b
Container.situation: point st.louis is captured.

Key.Original: Affirmative, sir - moving in on San José. Out.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，長官-繼續前往"聖荷西"。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，长官-正在向"圣荷西"逼近。完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, we can see you've taken St. Louis, outstanding!
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，我們知道你已經佔領了聖路易點，表現太優秀了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，我们看到你已经占领了圣路易点，漂亮!

Container.name: 018_eve_position_captured_a
Container.situation: point phoenix is captured.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian, we just captured Point Phoenix, over.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"，我們剛佔領鳳凰城點，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"，我们刚刚夺取了凤凰城点，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Nice work, Alpha, St. Louis is next, out.
Key.Chinese: 做得好，"Alpha"，下一個地方是聖路易點，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，"阿尔法"，下一个目标是圣路易点，完毕。

Container.name: 017_eve_lost_chalkeia_bravo
Container.situation: bravo are rendered combat ineffective.

Key.Original: Bravo - SITREP, over.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"-情況回報，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"-情况报告，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Bravo, respond, over.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"，請回答，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"，回复，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Bravo...?
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"...?

Key.Original: Guardian to all teams, we can't reach Bravo. Bravo is non-responsive... out.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫各部隊，我們聯絡不上"Bravo"。"Bravo"失聯...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫所有小组，我们联系不上"布拉沃"了。"布拉沃"没有回应...完毕。

Container.name: 016_eve_lost_chalkeia_alpha
Container.situation: alpha are rendered combat ineffective.

Key.Original: Guardian, Alpha, my whole squad are gone! I - I can't - everyone's dead or dying!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Alpha"，我們整隊都沒了!我-我不-大家要不是死了，就是剩一口氣而已!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"阿尔法"，我的班全完了!我-我不能-所有人不是死了就是快死了!

Key.Original: Copy, Alpha, focus!
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Alpha"，你別想那些!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿尔法"，集中精神!

Key.Original: Go firm, throw smoke and get behind some cover. CASREP in five. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你堅強點，丟煙霧彈然後找掩護躲好。五分鐘內進行傷亡報告。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沉住气，投掷烟雾弹，掩护自己。五分钟内发送伤亡报告。完毕。

Container.name: 015_eve_lost_chalkeia_charlie
Container.situation: charlie are rendered combat ineffective.

Key.Original: Guardian to Charlie - report in. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"Charlie"-回報，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"查理"-报告情况。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Charlie squad...?
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"分隊...?

Key.Original: Nothing heard.
Key.Chinese: 沒有回音。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有回应。

Key.Original: All troops in combat... seems we've lost comms with Charlie. Out.
Key.Chinese: 各部隊注意...我們和"Charlie"失去聯繫。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有战斗部队...我们与"查理"的通信似乎中断了。完毕。

Container.name: 014_eve_casualties_chalkeia_bravo
Container.situation: bravo report they are taking casualties.

Key.Original: Guardian, Bravo, we can't take much more of this!
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"，我們撐不住了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"布拉沃"，我们无法继续攻占了!

Key.Original: Copy, hang tough - don't give these SOBs an inch.
Key.Chinese: 收到，撐住-別讓這些狗娘養的得寸進尺。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，坚持到底-不要对这些狗娘养的让步。

Key.Original: Sierra, if you're free for tasking, divert and lend a hand, out.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，如果你還行有餘力，請轉向支援，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，如果你还有余力，请转向提供援助，完毕。

Container.name: 013_eve_casualties_chalkeia_alpha
Container.situation: november report they are taking casualties.

Key.Original: Sierra, it's Alpha, we're taking major casualties.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，這是"Alpha"，我們死傷慘重。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，我是"阿尔法"，我们现在伤亡十分惨重。

Container.name: 012_eve_casualties_chalkeia_charlie
Container.situation: charlie report they are taking casualties.

Key.Original: Charlie to Guardian, we're getting jacked up, like, real fucking good here.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"呼叫"守護者"，我們快不行了，受到嚴重傷害。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"呼叫"守护者"，我们已经筋疲力尽，嗯，这里可真他妈的好。

Key.Original: My team need support, right quick! Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們隊伍需要支援，而且要快!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的小组需要支援，快!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Roger that. How's your situation Sierra, can you help out?
Key.Chinese: 收到。"塞拉"，你那邊情況如何，你能支援嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。你的情况怎么样，"塞拉"，你能帮忙吗?

Container.name: 011_eve_contact_chalkeia_bravo
Container.situation: bravo make contact with the enemy.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's Bravo, these fuckers have got us pinned.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Bravo"，我們被這些混球困住了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"布拉沃"，这些混蛋把我们困住了。

Key.Original: If anyone can assist - well... we'd be mighty grateful, over.
Key.Chinese: 要是有人能支援-嗯...我們會相當感激，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果有人能提供援助-嗯...我们将不胜感激，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy that. Any Callsign, are you able to assist?
Key.Chinese: 收到。有呼號能支援的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。任何呼号，你们能提供援助吗?

Container.name: 010_eve_contact_chalkeia_alpha
Container.situation: november make contact with the enemy.

Key.Original: Alpha to Guardian, we're engaging!
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"呼叫"守護者"，開始交戰!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"呼叫"守护者"，我们正在攻击!

Container.name: 009_eve_contact_chalkeia_charlie
Container.situation: charlie make contact with the enemy.

Key.Original: Guardian, this is Charlie, we're copping some fire.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"Charlie"，我們受到攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"查理"，我们遭到射击。

Key.Original: Could definitely do with some help. Over.
Key.Chinese: 如果能有支援就好了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肯定需要一些援助。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Acknowledged.
Key.Chinese: 確認。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Key.Original: Guardian to Sierra, if you're able, provide assistance. Out.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"塞拉"，可以的話請進行支援。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"塞拉"，如果可以，请提供援助。完毕。

Container.name: 008_ta_intro_start
Container.situation: player is ordered to support infantry groups.

Key.Original: Good luck to you too, sir.
Key.Chinese: 也祝你好運，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也祝你好运，长官。

Key.Original: Sierra. Alpha - good luck.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"。這是"Alpha"-祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"。"阿尔法"-祝你好运。

Container.name: 007_br_briefing_c
Container.situation: third part of the animated briefing, cutscene.

Key.Original: Alright, then.
Key.Chinese: 那好吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那好吧。

Key.Original: To the north, here, on the main supply route, our special forces will counter and delay enemy reinforcements from Pyrgos.
Key.Chinese: 我軍特種部隊會在北邊這裡，埋伏在主要補給路線上，拖延從皮爾戈斯來襲的敵方援軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在北方，这里，在主要补给线上，我们的特种部队将反击和迟滞来自皮尔戈斯的敌军增援部队。

Key.Original: But let me be clear: It's only matter of time before they arrive.
Key.Chinese: 但我要先講清楚。敵方援軍遲早會來的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过让我说清楚些:他们到达只是时间问题。

Key.Original: Until then, we'll hopefully have our Close Air Support ready to assist us.
Key.Chinese: 但我們希望在那時候，密接空中支援剛好來到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到那时，我们有希望准备好近距离空中支援来帮助我们。

Key.Original: That should stop any armored thrust in its tracks.
Key.Chinese: 應該就能毀掉一路上所有敵方裝甲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那应该可以立即阻拦住任何装甲攻击。

Key.Original: Remember... we've only got one shot at this.
Key.Chinese: 但請記住...我們只有一次機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住...我们只能一次搞定。

Key.Original: And there's nowhere to fall back to if this goes south.
Key.Chinese: 如果敵人突破到南方，我們就退無可退了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果失败，就无路可退了。

Container.name: 006_br_briefing_numbers_badly
Container.situation: animated briefing, player has done badly with saving lives.

Key.Original: Bad, sir, there's not many of us...
Key.Chinese: 不夠，長官，沒剩多少弟兄了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不好，长官，我们没有多少人了...

Key.Original: But, I guess we got still some iron in the soul.
Key.Chinese: 但，我們還是很有鬥志的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但我想我们仍然具有坚韧不拔的精神。

Container.name: 005_br_briefing_numbers_satisfactory
Container.situation: animated briefing, player's hasn't done badly with saving lives.

Key.Original: Not great, sir, but, y'know - we've got this far.
Key.Chinese: 不大夠，長官，可是，你也知道-我們也撐到現在了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不太好，长官，但你知道-我们做的已经够多了。

Container.name: 004_br_briefing_numbers_good
Container.situation: animated briefing, player's done well with saving lives.

Key.Original: All things considered, pretty good, sir.
Key.Chinese: 照之前狀況看來，算是很不錯，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通盘考虑起来，相当不错，长官。

Container.name: 003_br_briefing_b
Container.situation: second part of the animated briefing, cutscene.

Key.Original: Now, after we've regained the initiative, Bravo will secure Miami and continue to Boston, and Charlie will climb to Houston and then head to Dallas.
Key.Chinese: 在首波攻擊後，"Bravo"必須掃蕩邁阿密點，並繼續前往波士頓點;"Charlie"朝向波士頓點，然後前往達拉斯點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，在我们重新获得主动权之后，"布拉沃"将夺取迈阿密点，继续前往波士顿点，"查理"会爬到休斯顿点，然后前往达拉斯点。

Key.Original: Lieutenant. Alpha will go from Point Phoenix to St. Louis, on to San José, and then finally to here, Atlanta.
Key.Chinese: 少尉。"Alpha"必須從鳳凰城點前往聖路易点，然後到聖荷西，最後到這裡，亞特蘭大点。
Key.Chinesesimp: 少尉。"阿尔法"将从"凤凰城点到圣路易斯点，再到圣荷西，最后到这里，亚特兰大点。

Key.Original: How are your numbers...?
Key.Chinese: 你們人數還夠吧...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的兵力是什么情况...?

Container.name: 002_br_briefing_mortar_saved
Container.situation: animated briefing, cutscene. player rescued the mortar in mission one.

Key.Original: That sound?
Key.Chinese: 那個聲音...
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个声音?

Key.Original: That's your mortar... levelling the position.
Key.Chinese: 是你們的迫擊砲...在平衡情勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是你的迫击炮...将阵地夷为了平地。

Key.Original: Fingers crossed, you should have an easy time of it.
Key.Chinese: 放心吧，你們接下來應該會順利多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祈求好运，有了它，你的日子应该好过了。

Container.name: 001_br_briefing_a
Container.situation: first part of the animated briefing, cutscene.

Key.Original: Um... Yes, sir.
Key.Chinese: 呃...是，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...是，长官。

Key.Original: Sir.
Key.Chinese: 是，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官。

Key.Original: Gentlemen, it's good to see you in person.
Key.Chinese: 各位，很高興與你們面對面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先生们，很高兴亲眼见到你们。

Key.Original: Our situation is not ideal, but far from desperate.
Key.Chinese: 我們的狀況雖然不大理想，但還不到絕望的地步。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的情况不太理想，但远没到绝望的程度。

Key.Original: Our initial attack was stopped before we reached the town itself. Bravo and Charlie are hunkered down here, and here, and cannot move forward.
Key.Chinese: 我們的首波攻擊還沒到城鎮就結束了。"Bravo"和"Charlie"躲在這裡、還有這裡，無法繼續前進。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们最初的攻击在到达城镇之前就被阻止了。"布拉沃"和"查理"被困在这里，还有这里，无法前进了。

Key.Original: We need to get things moving again.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須改變這個狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须推动事态继续发展。

Key.Original: So, Lieutenant Collins, I'm merging your forces together. You will re-establish group Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 所以，柯林斯少尉，我要整合你的部隊。重組成"Alpha"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因此，柯林斯少尉，我正在把你的部队合并在一起。你将重新组建"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: And Corporal Barlem, you'll resume command of your APC and retain your current callsign, Sierra.
Key.Chinese: 還有巴勒姆下士，你照樣指揮那臺裝甲運兵車，而且繼續維持目前的呼號，"塞拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴勒姆下士，你将继续控制装甲输送车，并保留当前的呼号"塞拉"。

Key.Original: Alpha will retake point Phoenix for us, and with Sierra, suppress enemy defenses.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"負責奪回鳳凰城點，並連同"塞拉"一塊削弱敵方防線。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"将为我们夺回凤凰城点，并与"塞拉"一起压制敌军的防御。

Container.name: 020_ex_apc_destroyed
Container.situation: player's apc is destroyed.

Key.Original: Fuck it!
Key.Chinese: 媽的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 去他妈的!

Key.Original: November, Corporal Barklem here, we gotta a, uh... a...
Key.Chinese: "十一月"，這是巴克勒姆下士，我們...呃...有狀況...
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，我是巴克勒姆下士，我们的，嗯...

Key.Original: Our Marshall's wrecked. Over.
Key.Chinese: "警長"被毀了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的"警长"毁掉了。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy your traffic, Sierra.
Key.Chinese: 收到消息，"塞拉"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"塞拉"。

Key.Original: That APC? It was the only chance we had...
Key.Chinese: 那臺裝甲運兵車是我們唯一的希望啊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 那辆装甲输送车?这是我们唯一的机会...

Container.name: 019_ex_ao_boundary
Container.situation: player moves to far from the mission objectives.

Key.Original: Mm, no...
Key.Chinese: 嗯，不對...

Key.Original: Must've got spun around... I oughta go back.
Key.Chinese: 我一定是找錯方向了...我得回去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一定是走反了...我应该回去。

Container.name: 018_ta_retreat_complete
Container.situation: player reaches a safe distance from the enemy and is near the rest of their group.

Key.Original: Sierra to November Actual.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"呼叫"十一月"隊長。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"呼叫"十一月"领队。

Key.Original: Approaching your position, don't light us up.
Key.Chinese: 接近你們的位置了，別攻擊我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在靠近你的阵地，不要攻击我们。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Corporal - we all owe you one.
Key.Chinese: 確認，下士-我們都欠你一份情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，下士-我们都欠你一个人情。

Key.Original: Guardian, you copy?
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，你收到了吗?

Key.Original: Forces consolidating at LZ Blazer... we're almost ready to hit Chalkeia. Over.
Key.Chinese: 部隊開始返回"布雷澤"降落區...我們準備攻擊哈爾基亞。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 部队在"布雷泽"着陆区集结...我们差不多准备好去攻打哈尔基亚了。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Lima Charlie, send your traffic.
Key.Chinese: 聽得很清楚，說吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: "利马·查理"，请发送消息。

Key.Original: An impressive turnaround, Lieutenant - prepare your teams and assemble at the staging area, out.
Key.Chinese: 你們扭轉了戰局，幹得很漂亮，少尉-讓你的隊伍到轉運區集結，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大反转啊，少尉-装备你的小组，并在集结区集合，完毕。

Container.name: 017_eve_retreat_oscar_alive
Container.situation: player orders oscar to get in the apc.

Key.Original: Oscar, we are leaving!
Key.Chinese: "奧斯卡"，我們要離開了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥斯卡"，我们要走了!

Key.Original: Let's fast-track this shit!
Key.Chinese: 我們加緊擺脫這鬼狀況!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们他妈的快点吧!

Key.Original: Copy, Sierra, tell us when to mount up your ride.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"塞拉"，你到了就通知我們上車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"塞拉"，告诉我们什么时候上你的车。

Container.name: 016_ta_retreat_in
Container.situation: november gives player' group permission to retreat.

Key.Original: Solid copy, sir, we're bugging out!
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚，長官，我們馬上退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，长官，我们正在撤退!

Key.Original: November to Sierra, we're home-free, fall back!
Key.Chinese: "十一月"呼叫"塞拉"，可以回去了，撤!
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"呼叫"塞拉"，我们大功告成，撤退!

Container.name: 015_am_no_mans_land_not_cleared
Container.situation: november are pinned down by enemy fire while heading to the landing zone. collins orders special forces to intervene and flank the enemy.

Key.Original: Contact! Right!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!右邊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 交火!好!

Key.Original: Pariah, try and get around them and split their fire.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"，試著繞過去，分散敵人火力。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"，试着跟他们周旋，分散他们的火力。

Key.Original: On it - keep them busy, we'll flank and drop the hammer. Out.
Key.Chinese: 在辦了-你們設法先引住敵人注意力，我們從旁邊夾擊。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这就去-别让他们歇着，我们将从侧翼攻击并一举拿下。完毕。

Container.name: 014_ta_defending_point_superior
Container.situation: player's group and oscar conduct a rearguard action at point superior.

Key.Original: We hear you, Oscar - just slow them down.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Oscar"-設法拖延敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们听到了，"奥斯卡"-拖住他们。

Key.Original: Hustle up a defensive perimeter and carry through, out.
Key.Chinese: 拉起防線，繼續行動，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速建立防线并坚守到底，完毕。

Key.Original: Oscar to November, sighting.
Key.Chinese: "奧斯卡"呼叫"十一月"，發現敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥斯卡"呼叫"十一月"，看到了。

Key.Original: Got intel on APC, two armored cars, and an indeterminate number of foot mobiles.
Key.Chinese: 發現裝甲運兵車，兩臺裝甲、步兵數量未知。
Key.Chinesesimp: 得到关于装甲输送车的情报，两辆装甲车，还有数量不明的步兵。

Key.Original: They're coming at us from the south and south-west... and from Chalkeia itself. Over.
Key.Chinese: 敵人從南方和西南方...還有Chalkeia朝我們而來。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们从南部和西南部...还有哈尔基亚向我们开进。完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 013_am_oscar_to_point_superior
Container.situation: oscar informs november that they will relieve their position.

Key.Original: Affirmative, but, y'know, where and for how long? Over.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，可是，嗯，在哪裡?斷多久?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可以，但你知道在哪儿和多久吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: November to Sierra - can you manage a rearguard action?
Key.Chinese: "十一月"呼叫"塞拉"-你可以斷後嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"呼叫"塞拉"-你能组织一次后卫行动吗?

Key.Original: Here, at, uh, Superior, for as long as it takes.
Key.Chinese: 在，嗯，蘇必利爾點這裡，需要多久就要多久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这里，在，呃，苏必利尔点，需要多久就坚持多久。

Key.Original: All teams, we need another squad...
Key.Chinese: 大家注意，我們還需要一支部隊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小组都有，我们需要另一个班...

Key.Original: Good copy, we don't need any heroics - only some more time, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，英雄到齊了-我們就缺點時間了，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们不需要任何豪言壮语-只需要更多的时间，完毕。

Key.Original: November, it's Oscar, we're already behind, count us in.
Key.Chinese: "十一月"，這是"奧斯卡"，我們跟上來了，算我們一份。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，我是"奥斯卡"，我们已经落后了，算上我们吧。

Container.name: 012_ta_lz_blazer
Container.situation: player unloads the wounded at the landing zone and is told to return to point superior.

Key.Original: This is it, I guess.
Key.Chinese: 就是這裡了吧，我想。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我猜是这儿了。

Key.Original: Okay, everybody out!
Key.Chinese: 好，大家下車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，全体下车!

Key.Original: Sierra to Oscar - we made it, over.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"呼叫"奧斯卡"-我們到了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"呼叫"奥斯卡"-我们成功了，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Break, break!
Key.Chinese: 中斷通訊、中斷通訊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 打断一下，打断一下!

Key.Original: November to all units, we're taking fire at Point Superior!
Key.Chinese: "十一月"呼叫所有單位，我們在蘇必利爾點受到攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"呼叫所有单位，我们在苏必利尔点遭到射击!

Key.Original: That's fan-fucking-tastic, we'll be -
Key.Chinese: 真他媽太爽了，我們-
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了，我们将-

Key.Original: Sierra, return with the Marshall...
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，你把"警長"開回來...
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，把"警长"开回来...

Key.Original: If you're here, we might be able to hold them awhile. Out.
Key.Chinese: 有你回來，我們或許還能撐得久一些。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你在这里，我们或许能拖延他们一会儿。完毕。

Container.name: 011_ta_scouting_friendlies
Container.situation: player discovers some friendlies being engaged by the enemy and contacts november.

Key.Original: November, Sierra - we've spotted some friendlies.
Key.Chinese: "十一月"，這是"塞拉"-我們發現了友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，我是"塞拉"-我们发现了一些友军。

Key.Original: They're pinned down, we're gonna try and assist, over.
Key.Chinese: 他們被牽制住了，我們要試著進行支援，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们被困住了，我们将试着提供援助，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, strike fast and prioritize your targets! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，迅速出擊，照優先順序擊倒敵人!結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，快速打击，优先打击你的目标!完毕。

Container.name: 010_ta_scouting_logistics
Container.situation: player discovers a supply point and contacts november.

Key.Original: November, Sierra, there's some kinda supply point ahead.
Key.Chinese: "十一月"，這是"塞拉"，前面好像有個補給點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，我是"塞拉"，前面有个补给点。

Key.Original: Looks like our artillery's given it a bit of a pounding, over.
Key.Chinese: 看來被我們砲擊過了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好像我们对这里实施过猛烈炮击，完毕。

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。

Key.Original: Be on your guard, Sierra, and remember to check to see if there's anything we can use... out.
Key.Chinese: 一定要小心，"塞拉"，還要注意有沒有可以利用的東西...結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心，"塞拉"，记得看看有没有我们可以用的东西...完毕。

Container.name: 009_ta_scouting
Container.situation: the player pushes north, to secure safe passage to the second landing zone.

Key.Original: November to Sierra, message, over.
Key.Chinese: "十一月"呼叫"塞拉"，有消息，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"呼叫"塞拉"，有消息，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Conduct your route recon, prosecute any hostiles, and continue on to LZ Blazer.
Key.Chinese: 你必須偵查路況、解決任何敵人，並前往"布雷澤"降落區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦查路线，解决所有敌人，继续前往"布雷泽"着陆区。

Key.Original: One MG, in a good position, on this open ground? It could, uh, it could end bad for us. Out.
Key.Chinese: 像這樣空曠的地區，只要找好位置，再加上一把機關槍，我們、我們就玩完了。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一挺机枪，处于有利位置，在这片开阔地上?它可能，嗯，它可能会对我们不利。完毕。

Container.name: 008_ta_return_to_erv_contact
Container.situation: the injured combatants board the player's apc and the player is told to travel to the second landing zone.

Key.Original: Sierra, okay! They're all in! Punch it! Go, get to LZ Blazer.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，好了!傷兵都上車了!發動吧!去"布雷澤"降落區。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，好的!他们都进来了!加速!前进，去"布雷泽"着陆区。

Key.Original: Don't stop for nothing! Oscar, out.
Key.Chinese: 不管怎樣也別停下來!"奧斯卡"，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要无故停下来!"奥斯卡"，通话完毕。

Container.name: 007_eve_return_to_erv_contact
Container.situation: nato forces at the emergency rendezvous point are engaged by aaf soldiers.

Key.Original: Fuck! Contact!
Key.Chinese: 操!接敵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的!交火!

Container.name: 006_ta_return_to_erv
Container.situation: player returns to the emergency rendezvous point to escort injured combatants to the objective.

Key.Original: Sure, no sweat.
Key.Chinese: 當然了，小事一樁。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，没问题。

Key.Original: Better bust a gut though - we can't dick around here.
Key.Chinese: 但最好加快腳步-我們不能在這裡發呆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但最好是加把劲-我们不能在这儿消磨时间。

Key.Original: Sierra, this is Oscar, hell, are we glad to see you.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，這是"奧斯卡"，老天，真高興見到你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，我是"奥斯卡"，见鬼，见到你们真高兴。

Key.Original: We'll get you loaded, the rest of us can follow on foot, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們馬上安排弟兄上車，剩下的人步行跟著，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会搭上你们，其他人可以跟着走，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Yeah, I got a cat-A, he's not gonna make a ride cross-country.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，這個弟兄傷得很重，雖然不適合長途跋涉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，我们有个A级重伤员，他不能坐车越野了。

Key.Original: Need to do what we can for him. Out.
Key.Chinese: 但我們必須盡可能照顧他。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 需要尽力为他做点什么。完毕。

Container.name: 005_ta_wounded_comrades
Container.situation: the player is ordered to collect wounded at the emergency rendezvous point. the special forces group advise november to push north. an argument ensues and the player is given two tasks.

Key.Original: Pariah, this is November.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，這是"十一月"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我是"十一月"。

Key.Original: The village is secure, set up a perimeter - we'll start checking these houses.
Key.Chinese: 村莊安全了，也拉起了防線-我們馬上開始檢查屋內狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 村庄安全了，设置防线-我们会着手检查这些房屋。

Key.Original: And, uh, Oscar. Interrogative, will you be able to MEDEVAC your wounded in a few mikes? Over.
Key.Chinese: 還有，呃，"奧斯卡"。問題，你能在幾分鐘內救護負傷的弟兄嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，嗯，"奥斯卡"。有个问题，你能在几分钟内用救伤直升机运送伤员吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: You've got about half that time, we can't wait a mo -
Key.Chinese: 你有五分鐘，我們不能-
Key.Chinesesimp: 你大概有那一半的时间，我们一刻也不能-

Key.Original: I - we, we need to reassess...
Key.Chinese: 我-我們、我們必須重新評估狀況...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我-我们，我们必须重新评估...

Key.Original: Maybe in ten, sir, but I can't make any promises.
Key.Chinese: 可能要十分鐘才行，長官，但我不敢保證。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许在十分钟内，长官，但我不能保证。

Key.Original: Sierra, uh, evaluate and - and make a decision.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，呃，由你評估狀況和-和下決定。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，嗯，衡量一下-并做出决定。

Key.Original: Are you outta your fucking mind? There's no time, period.
Key.Chinese: 你他媽是不是瘋了?沒時間，不用再說了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈的疯了吗?没有时间了，就是这样。

Key.Original: Our window's closing fast.
Key.Chinese: 我們的機會稍縱即逝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的机会马上就要没了。

Key.Original: Leave the casualties, push forwards or we're dead.
Key.Chinese: 留下傷亡的弟兄繼續前進，否則只有死路一條。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丢下伤亡人员，继续推进，要不我们就死了。

Key.Original: Only you know what you can and what you can't achieve, out.
Key.Chinese: 只有你知道自己有多少能耐做多少事，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只有你知道自己能做到什么和做不到什么，完毕。

Key.Original: Put your damn head where your heart is, Oscar.
Key.Chinese: 你他媽別感情用事，Oscar。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈的专心点，"奥斯卡"。

Key.Original: Negative - we're not leaving anyone behind!
Key.Chinese: 否定-我們不會拋下任何弟兄!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不-我们不会丢下任何人!

Key.Original: No. Neither am I!
Key.Chinese: 我也不會!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不。我也不会!

Key.Original: Lieutenant - are you gonna give the order or am I...?
Key.Chinese: 少尉-你到底要不要下令，不然我...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 少尉-是你下命令还是我...?

Key.Original: I am not going to stand for anymore of this shit, Sergeant!
Key.Chinese: 我可不會忍受你滿口胡說八道，中士!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不会再忍受这些狗屁事了，中士!

Key.Original: Sierra, clear a path.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"，你去清出路線來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"，开辟道路。

Key.Original: Trust me, our 90 day wonder here's not gonna be calling the shots for long.
Key.Chinese: 相信我，這位能發號施令的日子也不多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 相信我，我们在这儿的90天奇迹不会折腾太久。

Key.Original: Do not execute that order!
Key.Chinese: 你別照他的做!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要执行那个命令!

Key.Original: Return to the ERV - you - you gotta get us outta here!
Key.Chinese: 回去緊急會合點-你-你必須送我們離開這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 回到紧急会合点-你-你必须带我们离开这里!

Container.name: 004_ta_superior_captured
Container.situation: the player captures a defended enemy position and effectively opens up an avenue for escape.

Key.Original: Guardian, we've staged a successful breakout.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，我們成功殺出重圍了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我们已经突围成功。

Key.Original: Relocating to LZ Blazer for assault on Chalkeia. Over.
Key.Chinese: 正轉往"布雷澤"降落區以便攻擊哈爾基亞。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 迁移到"布雷泽"着陆区，以突击哈尔基亚。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: That's a stunning development, Lieutenant, keep it up. Report back as soon as you've regrouped. Out.
Key.Chinese: 進展很不錯，少尉，繼續保持。整隊完成後立刻向我回報。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进展神速，少尉，继续好好干。重新集结后立即汇报。完毕。

Container.name: 003_ta_apc_found
Container.situation: player discovers the apc at the crash site he was ordered to investigate.

Key.Original: Pariah, this is Barklem.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，這是巴克勒姆。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我是巴克勒姆。

Key.Original: I'm at that crash site, and we just lucked out!
Key.Chinese: 我到墜機點了，我們運氣太好了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在坠毁现场，我们真是走运!

Key.Original: There's a fucking Marshall here!
Key.Chinese: 這裡有臺"警長"裝甲運兵車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有辆该死的"警长"!

Key.Original: I mean, she's a little beat-up, but yeah, we can fix her.
Key.Chinese: 我是說，車子雖然受了撞擊，但可以修好的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，她有点撞坏了，但我们可以修好她。

Key.Original: Solid copy, sir - gonna get me some payback. Out.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚，長官-我們會給敵人好看。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，长官-我会给敌人一些好看的。完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Barker. Allocating you your old callsign: Sierra.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，巴克爾。你之前的呼號是"塞拉"，我現在指派給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，巴克尔。把你原来的呼号分配给你:"塞拉"。

Key.Original: Okay, that oughta level the playing field.
Key.Chinese: 好，這樣敵我就勢均力敵了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，那应该将战场夷为了平地。

Key.Original: November, you hear that?
Key.Chinese: "十一月"，你聽見了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "十一月"，你听到了吗?

Key.Original: A couple of guys are heading to you now; once you're all up and running move in on Point Superior.
Key.Chinese: 我還派了幾個人過去你那邊，你們都上車，前往蘇必利爾點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在有几个家伙正往你那儿去;在你们全部恢复正常之后，向苏必利尔点逼近。

Container.name: 002_ta_apc_nearby
Container.situation: player is informed of an aircraft crash site nearby and is ordered to investigate.

Key.Original: Am I gonna get shot at?
Key.Chinese: 我會不會中彈?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我去试试?

Key.Original: No and, uh, my name's not -
Key.Chinese: 我不是，呃，還有我的名字不叫-
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，嗯，我不叫-

Key.Original: Pariah, November. I think I can see a Blackfish wreck.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，這是"十一月"。我看見一架墜毀的"黑魚"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我是"十一月"。我想我能看到"黑鱼"的残骸。

Key.Original: Just beyond the tree line... bearing zero three five. About, six hundred meters.
Key.Chinese: 就在林線上...方位洞三五。大概六百公尺外。
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚刚超过林木线...方位035。约六百米。

Key.Original: Copy that, I'll get someone to take a look at it.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我找個人過去看看。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我会找个人去看看。

Key.Original: Corporal Barkley. Congratulations, you just got voluntold, reckon you can do a pass?
Key.Chinese: 巴克利下士。恭喜你中獎，我想小任務對你來說不成問題吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克利下士。恭喜，你被自愿了，你认为自己可以试试吗?

Key.Original: Depends - you gonna be a smart ass?
Key.Chinese: 看狀況-看你夠不夠天兵?
Key.Chinesesimp: 看情况吧-你能机灵着点吗?

Key.Original: Reconnoitre the site and let us know if you find anything. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你去偵查那裡，發現東西就通知我們。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 勘察现场，如果有什么发现的话，告诉我们。完毕。

Container.name: 001_br_briefing
Container.situation: first part of briefing sequence. cutscene.

Key.Original: Alright, okay, Oscar's here. So. Let's go through this.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，好，"奧斯卡"到了。那麼。我們順一遍計畫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，好，我是"奥斯卡"。所以。我们来渡过这个难关吧。

Key.Original: The situation isn't good; we've got next to no supplies and our armor's missing.
Key.Chinese: 現在情勢不佳，補給品趨近於無，裝甲還失蹤了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 情况不太好;我们几乎没有补给了，装甲车辆也不见了。

Key.Original: Classic hammer and anvil.
Key.Chinese: 經典兩面包夾戰術。
Key.Chinesesimp: 经典的锤砧战术。

Key.Original: I'm fine with it. My one concern is all our injured, how do you propose we -
Key.Chinese: 我沒意見。我唯一的問題是，受傷的那些弟兄，你覺得-
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没有问题。我唯一关心的是我们所有的伤员，你怎么建议我们-

Key.Original: Casualties are high and many of our VTOLs never landed.
Key.Chinese: 死傷慘重，而且垂直升降飛行器大多被擊落了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伤亡惨重，而且我们的许多垂直起降飞机都没能着陆。

Key.Original: To make matters worse, we're almost completely surrounded.
Key.Chinese: 更糟的是，我們幾乎被團團包圍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 更糟的是，我们几乎完全被包围了。

Key.Original: In fact, the AAF are tightening the noose, even as I speak - we need to act, now.
Key.Chinese: 老實說，就在這個當下，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量也在加緊收網-我們必須行動，就是現在。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实上，阿尔蒂斯武装力量正在收紧绞索，即使在我说话的时候-我们必须采取行动，马上。

Key.Original: Fortunately, LZ Blazer, here, faired better than ourselves.
Key.Chinese: 幸好，布雷澤降落點，狀況比我們這裡好一些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸运的是，"布雷泽"着陆区，这里，比我们这里阻力更小。

Key.Original: I don't know, but I, uh - I believe Chalkeia's still on the table.
Key.Chinese: 雖然我不確定，但是，我、呃-我相信哈爾基亞的狀況仍然未定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不太清楚，但我，嗯-我认为哈尔基亚仍在考虑中。

Key.Original: Maybe we can, sort of, punch a hole through the enemy's defences and, er, establish contact with the rest of our combat team.
Key.Chinese: 或許我們可以衝破敵人的防線還有，嗯，和我軍其他隊伍取得聯繫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许我们可以，可以说，在敌人的防御线上打开一个缺口，然后，嗯，和我们作战小组的其他成员建立联系。

Key.Original: Sergeant Sturrock...
Key.Chinese: 斯塔羅克中士...
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔罗克中士...

Key.Original: As you're familiar with the terrain, would you clarify the plan of attack?
Key.Chinese: 你熟悉這裡的地形，由你說明攻擊計畫行嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为你熟悉地形，你能阐述一下攻击计划吗?

Key.Original: Yeah, here's the deal.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，大家聽好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 能，是这样的。

Key.Original: The village, here, at Point Superior, it's gotta go. Government forces will be looking to reinforce it, quickly.
Key.Chinese: 這邊有座村莊，位置在蘇必利爾點，我們必須拿下它。政府軍正在試圖增援這村莊，速度還很快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 位于苏必利尔点的村庄，这里，它必须采取行动了。政府部队将迅速为它提供增援。

Key.Original: This whole thing's already a crapshoot, but, if they consolidate on this position, we're fucked.
Key.Chinese: 我們就是在賭一把，但如果讓敵人在那地方會合，我們就死定了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这整件事就是一场赌博，但，如果他们巩固了这个阵地，我们就完蛋了。

Key.Original: My suggestion is as follows - November will edge towards these buildings and engage the enemy with suppressive fire.
Key.Chinese: 我的建議如下-"十一月"朝建築緩緩推進，依賴後方火力壓制直接交戰敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的建议是这样的-"十一月"向这些建筑缓缓逼近，并以压制火力攻击敌军。

Key.Original: Meanwhile, Oscar will stay with the wounded while my squad and everyone else advances through these ancient ruins.
Key.Chinese: 同時，"奧斯卡"留下保護受傷的弟兄，我的隊伍連同其他人一起穿過這處古跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同时，"奥斯卡"将和伤员呆在一起，而我的班和其他所有人都穿过这些古老的废墟向前推进。

Key.Original: On the other side, we'll flank left and strike west.
Key.Chinese: 另一方面，我們將從左翼包抄，向西部進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 另一方面，我们将从左翼包抄，向西部进攻。

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 狗屁!

Key.Original: Exactly.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错。

Key.Original: Okay, we'll co-ordinate on the hop.
Key.Chinese: 好，我們臨機應變吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们会不断地调整坐标。

Key.Original: Ugh, I hoped it'd take them a little longer to get a fix on us...
Key.Chinese: 唉，我是希望敵人不會那麼快就摸清楚我們的底細...
Key.Chinesesimp: 呸，我本希望这样会让他们花更多的时间来确定我们的方位...

Key.Original: Agreed, let's make it happen. Pariah, come on, on me - let's move it!
Key.Chinese: 同意，就這麼幹吧。"賤民"隊的，來，聽我口令-我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 同意，我们来做吧。"贱民"，来吧，跟着我-我们开始行动!

Key.Original: Help Bravo and Charlie
Key.Chinese: 幫助"Bravo"和"Charlie"
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助"布拉沃"和"查理"

Key.Original: Eliminate all enemy forces near Bravo and Charlie's positions.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅位在"Bravo"和"Charlie"附近的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭"布拉沃"和"查理"的阵地附近的所有敌军。

Key.Original: Escape
Key.Chinese: 逃離
Key.Chinesesimp: 逃跑

Key.Original: Retreat from Chalkeia and RV with the British extraction team.
Key.Chinese: 從哈爾基亞撤退，與英國撤出小隊會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从哈尔基亚撤退并与英国撤离小组回合。

Key.Original: Defend Chalkeia
Key.Chinese: 守護哈爾基亞
Key.Chinesesimp: 守卫哈尔基亚

Key.Original: Hold the town and wait for close air support.
Key.Chinese: 堅守城鎮，等待密接空中支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守城镇，等待近距离空中支援。

Key.Original: Support the Attack
Key.Chinese: 支援作戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援进攻部队

Key.Original: Provide covering fire for infantry groups assaulting Chalkeia.
Key.Chinese: 火力掩護正在攻擊哈爾基亞的步兵部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为攻击哈尔基亚的步兵部队提供火力掩护。

Key.Original: Destroy Tigris
Key.Chinese: 摧毀Tigris
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁"底格里斯"

Key.Original: Seek and destroy CSAT's AA vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 搜查並摧毀廣協同盟的防空載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并摧毁广协同盟的自行高炮。

Key.Original:
Our initial attack began before your group arrived, but it's come to a halt %2outside the town%1 - we need to overrun the AAF's %3defensive positions%1, now!

Enemy armor from %4Pyrgos%1 may arrive at any moment, so it's vital we get things moving. They can't catch our forces on open ground.

In terms of air support, it's a no-go, at least until we know for sure there's no active AA threats in the area.
Key.Chinese:
在你的隊伍到達戰場前，首波攻擊便已展開，但卻在%2城外%1停滯住了-我們必須擊潰阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的%3防線%1，立刻!

敵方在%4皮爾戈斯%1的裝甲部隊隨時可能來襲，所以我們務必盡快行動。這一路上地形開闊，我們絕不能被裝甲部隊追上。

目前暫時無法呼叫空中支援，至少得先確認地區內沒有敵方防空威脅活動才行。
Key.Chinesesimp:
我们的首次进攻在你的团队到达之前开始，但进攻在%2城外%1停止了-我们得占领阿尔蒂斯武装力量的%3防御阵地%1，立即行动!

敌军在%4皮尔戈斯%1的装甲部队随时可能抵达，因此当务之急是继续前进。他们不能在开阔的地面上赶上我们的部队。

因为有空中支援，这根本行不通，至少在我们确定此区域内没有有效防空火力时是这样的。

Key.Original:
%2Alpha%1 - Group led by Lt. Collins.

%3Bravo%1 - Infantry element.

%4Charlie%1 - Infantry element.

%5Sierra%1 - Your team.

%6Guardian%1 - Command.

%7Maverick%1 - Special forces group.
Key.Chinese:
%2"Alpha"%1-柯林斯少尉率領的隊伍。

%3"Bravo"%1-步兵部隊。

%4"Charlie"%1-步兵部隊。

%5"塞拉"%1-你的隊伍。

%6"守護者"%1-指揮部。

%7"幼畜"%1-特種部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2"阿尔法"%1-柯林斯少尉带领的团队。

%3"布拉沃"%1-步兵分队。

%4"查理"%1-步兵分队。

%5"塞拉"%1-你的小组。

%6"守护者"%1-指挥部。

%7"幼畜"%1-特种部队小队。

Key.Original: Against the odds, NATO soldiers attempt to capture Chalkeia.
Key.Chinese: 北約在寡不擊眾的狀態下，仍然試著佔領哈爾基亞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约士兵们孤注一掷，试图夺取哈尔基亚。

Key.Original: Cpl. Barklem was later transferred to Charlie Company of the 1st Mechanized Battalion and witnessed the formal surrender of Altis Armed Forces, one day later...
Key.Chinese: 巴克勒姆隨後被調往第一機械營"Charlie"連，一天後便目睹了阿爾蒂斯武裝力量正式投降...
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克勒姆下士转调到第1机械化营的"查理"连，一天后目睹了阿尔蒂斯武装力量的正式投降...

Key.Original: Only a single wounded soldier collected from the emergency rendezvous point survived the conflict.
Key.Chinese: 緊急集合點的負傷弟兄中，只有一位倖免於難，成功生還。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只有一位从紧急会合点接出的伤兵在冲突中幸存。

Key.Original: %1 wounded soldiers collected from the emergency rendezvous point survived the conflict.
Key.Chinese: 緊急集合點的負傷弟兄中，有%1位倖免於難，成功生還。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1位从紧急会合点接出的伤兵在冲突中幸存。

Key.Original: Of the %1 wounded soldiers, captured by the AAF at the emergency rendezvous point, only %2 survived.
Key.Chinese: 緊急集合點被阿爾蒂斯武裝力量占領後，該處的%1位負傷弟兄只有%2位倖免於難，成功生還。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在紧急会合点被阿尔蒂斯武装力量俘虏的%1位伤兵中，只有%2位幸存。

Key.Original: As for Sgt. Sturrock, he received a Bronze Star for heroic achievement, posthumously.
Key.Chinese: 至於斯塔羅克中士，他被追封銅星勳章，以紀念他英雄般的表現。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于斯塔罗克中士，他因自己的英勇表现而被追授铜星勋章。

Key.Original: As for Sgt. Sturrock, he was later awarded a Bronze Star for heroic achievement.
Key.Chinese: 至於斯塔羅克中士，他獲頒銅星勳章，以紀念他英雄般的表現。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于斯塔罗克中士，后来他因自己的英勇表现而被授予铜星勋章。

Key.Original: Having survived the engagement, Lt. Collins was promoted to 1st Lieutenant.
Key.Chinese: 柯林斯少尉成功生還，被提拔為中尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在交火中幸存下来后，柯林斯少尉被晋升为中尉。

Key.Original: Lt. Collins was posthumously promoted to 1st Lieutenant.
Key.Chinese: 柯林斯少尉被追封提拔為中尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 柯林斯少尉阵亡后被追晋为中尉。

Key.Original: The main airport was captured and Pyrgos fell that very night.
Key.Chinese: 主機場被佔領後，阿爾蒂斯的首都皮爾戈斯當晚就被攻陷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在那天晚上，主机场被夺，皮尔戈斯沦陷。

Key.Original: However, operation Steel Pegasus was a success.
Key.Chinese: 不過，"鋼鐵飛馬"行動相當成功。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，"钢铁天马"行动是成功的。

Key.Original: During the battle, all sides suffered heavy losses. The AAF reported %1 casualties, while NATO counted %2.
Key.Chinese: 在行動中，各派系都傷亡慘重。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量折損%1名士兵，而北約折損%2名士兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在战斗中，各方均遭受重大损失。阿尔蒂斯武装力量报告%1人伤亡，而北约的伤亡统计是%2。

Key.Original: At %1, after %2 of fighting, the 21st Combat Group retreated from Chalkeia.
Key.Chinese: 在%1，戰鬥%2後，第21作戰團隊從哈爾基亞撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1，战斗%2后，第21战斗群从哈尔基亚撤离。

Key.Original: At %1, after %2 of fighting, Chalkeia fell to the 21st Combat Group.
Key.Chinese: 在%1，戰鬥%2後，哈爾基亞落到第21作戰團隊手裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1，战斗%2后，哈尔基亚落如第21战斗群手中。

Key.Original: %1 hour(s) and %2 minutes
Key.Chinese: %1小時%2分鐘
Key.Chinesesimp: %1小时%2分钟

Key.Original: Final Strike
Key.Chinese: 最後攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后一击

Key.Original: Against the odds, NATO soldiers attempt to capture Chalkeia.
Key.Chinese: 北約在寡不擊眾的狀態下，仍然試著佔領哈爾基亞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约士兵们孤注一掷，试图夺取哈尔基亚。

Key.Original: Washington
Key.Chinese: 華盛頓
Key.Chinesesimp: 华盛顿

Key.Original: Toledo
Key.Chinese: 托雷多
Key.Chinesesimp: 托雷多

Key.Original: St. Louis
Key.Chinese: 聖路易
Key.Chinesesimp: 圣路易

Key.Original: Seattle
Key.Chinese: 西雅圖
Key.Chinesesimp: 西雅图

Key.Original: San Jose
Key.Chinese: 聖荷西
Key.Chinesesimp: 圣荷西

Key.Original: Phoenix
Key.Chinese: 鳳凰城
Key.Chinesesimp: 凤凰城

Key.Original: Nashville
Key.Chinese: 納什維爾
Key.Chinesesimp: 纳什维尔

Key.Original: Miami
Key.Chinese: 邁阿密
Key.Chinesesimp: 迈阿密

Key.Original: Houston
Key.Chinese: 休斯頓
Key.Chinesesimp: 休斯顿

Key.Original: Dallas
Key.Chinese: 達拉斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 达拉斯

Key.Original: Cleveland
Key.Chinese: 克利夫蘭
Key.Chinesesimp: 克利夫兰

Key.Original: Boston
Key.Chinese: 波士頓
Key.Chinesesimp: 波士顿

Key.Original: Atlanta
Key.Chinese: 亞特蘭大
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚特兰大

Key.Original: Final Strike
Key.Chinese: 最後攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后一击

Key.Original: %2Chalkeia's%1 on a knife-edge! We must push forwards and assist Bravo and Charlie before %3enemy reinforcements%1 arrive and drive us into the sea.
Key.Chinese: %2哈爾基亞%1的情勢相當危急!我們必須向前推進，在%3敵方援軍%1把我們逼進海裡以前支援"Bravo"和"Charlie"。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2哈尔基亚%1的前景未卜!我们在%3敌军增援%1抵达并将我们赶入大海之前，必须继续推进并援助"布拉沃"和"查理"。

Key.Original:
1. Support %2Bravo%1 and %3Charlie%1 and help them continue the assault.
2. Provide covering fire for infantry units advancing on the %4town%1.
3. Capture %4Chalkeia%1.
4. Wait for CAS to destroy any enemy %5counterattack%1.
Key.Chinese:
1. 支援%2"Bravo"%1和%3"Charlie"%1，幫助他們繼續攻擊。
2. 火力掩護正在攻擊%4城鎮%1的步兵單位。
3. 佔領%4哈爾基亞%1。
4. 等待密接空中支援，破壞敵方%5反攻%1。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 支援%2布拉沃%1和%3查理%1并帮助他们继续攻击。
2. 为向%4城镇%1进发的步兵单位提供掩护火力。
3. 夺取%4哈尔基亚%1。4. 等待近距离空中支援粉碎任何敌军%5反攻%1。

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Although we could not secure Chalkeia, your efforts helped friendly forces capture the main airport. Now it's only a matter of time before the government in Pyrgos sues for peace!
Key.Chinese: 雖然我們無法保證哈爾基亞安全，但多虧了你的努力，友軍佔領了主機場。現在距離皮爾戈斯政府投降只是時間問題罷了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们不能夺取哈尔基亚，但你的努力帮助友军占领了主机场。现在，皮尔戈斯政府乞和只是时间问题!

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Thanks to your efforts, Corporal, we secured Chalkeia and helped friendly forces capture the main airport. Now it's only a matter of time before the government in Pyrgos sues for peace!
Key.Chinese: 多虧了你的努力，下士，我們肅清了哈爾基亞，還幫助友軍佔領了主機場。現在距離皮爾戈斯政府投降只是時間問題罷了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 多亏了你的努力，下士，我们夺取了哈尔基亚并帮助友军占领了主机场。现在，皮尔戈斯政府乞和只是时间问题!

Key.Original: Clear a Path
Key.Chinese: 清出路線
Key.Chinesesimp: 开辟道路

Key.Original: Eliminate any enemy threats between Point Superior and LZ Blazer.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅在蘇必利爾點到布雷泽降落區之間的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭苏必利尔点和"布雷泽"着陆区之间的任何敌军。

Key.Original: Breakout
Key.Chinese: 殺出重圍
Key.Chinesesimp: 突围

Key.Original: Push through the ancient ruins at Aktinarki, neutralizing all enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 穿過阿克蒂納爾基的古老遺跡，殲滅所有敵方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿过阿克蒂纳尔基的古老废墟，压制所有敌军。

Key.Original: Delay the Enemy
Key.Chinese: 拖延敵人
Key.Chinesesimp: 迟滞敌军

Key.Original: Hold Point Superior and delay the enemy.
Key.Chinese: 據守蘇必利爾點，拖住敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守苏必利尔点，并迟滞敌军。

Key.Original: Transport Casualties
Key.Chinese: 輸送傷者
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输伤亡人员

Key.Original: Transfer all our wounded from the ERV to LZ Blazer.
Key.Chinese: 將我方所有傷者從緊急會合點送往"布雷澤"降落區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将所有伤员从紧急会合点运到"布雷泽"着陆区。

Key.Original: Move to LZ Blazer
Key.Chinese: 前往"布雷澤"降落區
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往"布雷泽"着陆区

Key.Original: Move to LZ Blazer with any defenders from Point Superior.
Key.Chinese: 與蘇必利爾點的守軍一同前往"布雷澤"降落區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带着苏必利尔点的所有防卫兵前往"布雷泽"着陆区。

Key.Original: Delay the Enemy
Key.Chinese: 拖延敵人
Key.Chinesesimp: 迟滞敌军

Key.Original: Hold Point Superior and delay the enemy.
Key.Chinese: 據守蘇必利爾點，拖住敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守苏必利尔点，并迟滞敌军。

Key.Original: Support the Assault
Key.Chinese: 支援作戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援进攻部队

Key.Original: Assist friendly forces attacking Point Superior.
Key.Chinese: 支援攻擊蘇必利爾點的友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 援助攻击苏必利尔点的友军。

Key.Original: Investigate
Key.Chinese: 調查
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查

Key.Original: Search the VTOL crash site and see if there's anything that we can use.
Key.Chinese: 搜查垂直升降飛行器墜落的地點，看是否有可用的物品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索垂直起降飞机坠毁现场，看看有没有我们可以用的东西。

Key.Original: So far, we've managed to reform at the %2emergency rendezvous point%1. Oscar has just arrived too, adding to our numbers. However, we're completely surrounded and hamstrung by our many wounded. Relocating to a safer position isn't going to be easy.
Key.Chinese: 目前我軍設法在%2緊急會合點%1整隊。"奧斯卡"剛剛也到了這裡，人多就是力量。但是，我們被完全包圍了，還有很多人負傷，我們能做的有限。要轉往更安全的地點不是件容易事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到目前为止，我们已经在%2紧急会合点%1完成重组。"奥斯卡"也刚刚抵达，增加了我们的人数。然而，我们被完全包围了，还有许多伤员拖我们的后腿。

Key.Original:
%2November%1 - Group led by Lt. Collins.
%3Pariah%1 - Special forces.
%4Oscar%1 - Infantry element.
%5Guardian%1 - Command.
Key.Chinese:
%2"十一月"%1-柯林斯少尉率領的隊伍。
%3"賤民"%1-特種部隊。
%4"奧斯卡"%1-步兵部隊。
%5"守護者"%1-指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2十一月%1-柯林斯少尉带领的小队。
%3贱民%1-特种部队。
%4奥斯卡%1-步兵分队。
%5守护者%1-指挥部。

Key.Original: Survivors from LZ Mustang attempt to reach friendly forces.
Key.Chinese: "野馬"降落區的生還者試著聯繫友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 着陆区"野马"的幸存者试图联系友军。

Key.Original: Breaking Through
Key.Chinese: 突破重圍
Key.Chinesesimp: 突破

Key.Original: Survivors from LZ Mustang attempt to reach friendly forces.
Key.Chinese: "野馬"降落區的生還者試著聯繫友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 着陆区"野马"的幸存者试图联系友军。

Key.Original: Superior
Key.Chinese: 蘇必利爾
Key.Chinesesimp: 苏必利尔

Key.Original: Ontario
Key.Chinese: 奧蘭多
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥兰多

Key.Original: LZ Mustang
Key.Chinese: "野馬"降落區
Key.Chinesesimp: "野马"着陆区

Key.Original: Michigan
Key.Chinese: 密歇根
Key.Chinesesimp: 密歇根

Key.Original: Emergency Rendezvous
Key.Chinese: 緊急會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧急会合

Key.Original: Erie
Key.Chinese: 伊利
Key.Chinesesimp: 伊利

Key.Original: LZ Blazer
Key.Chinese: "布雷澤"降落區
Key.Chinesesimp: "布雷泽"着陆区

Key.Original: Breaking Through
Key.Chinese: 突破重圍
Key.Chinesesimp: 突破

Key.Original: We need to break out of this encirclement and push %2north%1, joining the rest of our forces at %3LZ Blazer%1. If possible, with all %4our injured%1.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須突破敵人的包圍，並往%2北%1推進到%3"布雷澤"降落區%1，加入其他友軍。可能的話，帶上所有%4負傷的弟兄%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要打破这个包围并%2向北%1推进，在%3"布雷泽"着陆区%1加入我们剩余的部队。如果可能，带上所有%4伤员%1。

Key.Original:
1. Advance through the ruins north of the Surf Club.
2. Assault %2Point Superior%1 from the %3east%1.
3. Move troops from the %4ERV%1 to %2Point Superior%1.
4. Relocate to %5LZ Blazer%1 while a smaller force performs a rearguard action and delays the enemy.
Key.Chinese:
1. 穿過衝浪俱樂部北方的遺跡。
2. 從%3東方%1突擊%2蘇必利爾點%1。
3. 將部隊從%4緊急會合點%1遷往%2蘇必利爾點%1。
4. 在我軍小隊執行斷後任務拖延敵人時，轉往%5"布雷澤"降落區%1。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 穿过冲浪俱乐部北部的废墟向前推进。
2. 从%3东部%1攻击%2苏必利尔点%1。
3. 将部队从%4紧急会合点%1移至%2苏必利尔点%1。
4. 在小股部队执行后卫战斗和拖延敌军时迁移至%5"布雷泽"着陆区%1。

Key.Original: MISSION FAILED
Key.Chinese: 任務失敗
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务失败

Key.Original: You lost your APC.
Key.Chinese: 你失去了裝甲運兵車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的装甲输送车被摧毁。

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Great work, Corporal! Thanks to you, we were able to smash through enemy lines and reach LZ Blazer, with our wounded!
Key.Chinese: 幹得好啊，下士!多虧你的努力，我們擊潰了敵方防線，順利帶著負傷的弟兄抵達"布雷澤"降落區!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，下士，多亏了你，我们才能够突破敌军防线，与我们的伤员一起到达"布雷泽"着陆区!

Key.Original: MISSION COMPLETE
Key.Chinese: 任務達成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Great work, Corporal! Thanks to you, we were able to smash through enemy lines and reach LZ Blazer.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好啊，下士!多虧你的努力，我們擊潰了敵方防線，順利抵達"布雷澤"降落區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，下士，多亏了你，我们才能够突破敌军防线，到达"布雷泽"着陆区!

Key.Original: Return Mortar
Key.Chinese: 帶回迫擊砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 归还迫击炮

Key.Original: Bring the mortar to the emergency rendezvous point.
Key.Chinese: 把迫擊砲帶回緊急會合點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将迫击炮带到紧急会合点。

Key.Original: Retrieve Mortar (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 找回迫擊炮(可選)
Key.Chinesesimp: 找回迫击炮(可选)

Key.Original: Find the missing mortar for Lieutenant Collins.
Key.Chinese: 幫柯林斯少尉找到失蹤的迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为柯林斯少尉找到丢失的迫击炮。

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 整隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新集结

Key.Original: Reach the chapel near the emergency rendezvous.
Key.Chinese: 前往緊急會合點附近的教堂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到达紧急会合点附近的小教堂。

Key.Original: Help Recon Group (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 幫助偵察團隊(可選)
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助侦察团队(可选)

Key.Original: Assist the special forces team and help them hold their position.
Key.Chinese: 支援特種部隊，幫忙堅守陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 援助特种部队小组并帮助他们坚守阵地。

Key.Original: Help Pilot
Key.Chinese: 幫助飛行員
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助飞行员

Key.Original: Find the downed pilot and see if you can help.
Key.Chinese: 找到墜落的飛行員，看是否能幫上忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到被击落的飞行员，看看能不能帮上忙。

Key.Original: Help Medic
Key.Chinese: 幫助醫護兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助医疗兵

Key.Original: Assist the medic in treating the injured soldier.
Key.Chinese: 支援醫護兵治療負傷的士兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助医疗兵治疗受伤的士兵。

Key.Original: Defend Regroup Point
Key.Chinese: 守護整隊點
Key.Chinesesimp: 守卫重新集结点

Key.Original: Support friendly forces and defend the emergency rendezvous point.
Key.Chinese: 支援友軍，守護緊急會合點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援友军并守卫紧急会合点。

Key.Original:
As soon as the attack on the main airport failed, an air invasion from the east was ordered, to put pressure on the capital city, %2Pyrgos%1. It was hoped that such a bold maneuver would compel the enemy to divide their forces.

The first part of the operation involved securing %3Chalkeia%1, a town on the main supply route connecting %2Pyrgos%1 with the south-eastern part of the island.

However, now, the situation's taken a turn for the worst...
Key.Chinese:
一旦對主機場作戰失敗，便立刻從東方發起空中攻擊，壓制首都%2皮爾戈斯%1。期望透過大膽行動迫使敵方分散部隊。

行動的第一部分是守護%3哈爾基亞%1，該城坐落在從%2皮爾戈斯%1到島嶼東南地區的主要補給路線上。

不過，如今的戰況急轉直下...
Key.Chinesesimp:
对主机场的攻击失败后，决定在东部实施空中突击，以对首都%2皮尔戈斯%1施加压力。希望这样大胆的策略能迫使敌军分散兵力。

首轮作战涉及夺取%3哈尔基亚%1镇，它位于连接%2皮尔戈斯%1和岛屿东南部的主要补给线上。

而现在事态却发展到了最坏的地步...

Key.Original: As NATO's invasion of Altis falters, a high-risk plan is put into action.
Key.Chinese: 侵攻阿爾蒂斯成敗岌岌可危，北約同時執行了另一個高度危險的計畫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着北约对阿尔蒂斯入侵的逐渐削弱，一个高风险计划被付诸实施。

Key.Original: LZ Nowhere
Key.Chinese: 無枝可棲
Key.Chinesesimp: 无处着陆

Key.Original: As NATO's invasion of Altis falters, a high-risk plan is put into action.
Key.Chinese: 侵攻阿爾蒂斯成敗岌岌可危，北約同時執行了另一個高度危險的計畫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着北约对阿尔蒂斯入侵的逐渐削弱，一个高风险计划被付诸实施。

Key.Original: Supply Cache
Key.Chinese: 補給箱
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给库

Key.Original: Reinforcements from Pyrgos
Key.Chinese: 來自皮爾戈斯的敵方援軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 来自皮尔戈斯的增援

Key.Original: Operation group Bravo
Key.Chinese: 作戰團隊"Bravo"
Key.Chinesesimp: 战役集群"布拉沃"

Key.Original: Operation group Alpha
Key.Chinese: 作戰團隊"Alpha"
Key.Chinesesimp: 战役集群"阿尔法"

Key.Original: LZ Nowhere
Key.Chinese: 無枝可棲
Key.Chinesesimp: 无处着陆

Key.Original: Move north and try to make contact with a commanding element - if there is one.
Key.Chinese: 往北推進，試著聯繫指揮部-前提是指揮部還存在。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向北移动并尝试与指挥分队联系-如果有。

Key.Original: Stay alive. Regroup with friendly forces from %2LZ Mustang%1 and retrieve all the weapons and equipment you can.
Key.Chinese: 好好活著。與%2"野馬"降落區%1的友軍重新整隊，把找到的武器與裝備都盡可能帶上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 活下来。与%2着陆区"野马"%1的友军重新集结，并尽力找回所有武器和装备。

Key.Original: Check Pilot
Key.Chinese: 檢查飛行員
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查飞行员

Container.name: 001_br_briefing
Container.situation: player is in transit to the dropzone. there's sound effects in the background, pilot announcements, and the thrum of the vtol's engines. the crew of an apc are holding a last minute briefing in the rear of the aircraft. animated briefing. the player's nco goes through the details. there is rock music playing.

Key.Original: ****TO TRANSLATE****
****TO TRANSLATE****
Key.Chinese: 這是敵方領土，我們絕對不能迷路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是敌军领土，我们绝不想最后在这里送命。

Key.Original: Okay, listen up.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，聽著。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了，听我说。

Key.Original: Barklem.
Key.Chinese: 巴克勒姆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克勒姆。

Key.Original: Barklem! Earphones...
Key.Chinese: 巴克勒姆!你的耳機...
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克勒姆!耳机...

Key.Original: Let's make sure we're as clear as a fucking bell on this.
Key.Chinese: 我們得把計畫搞清楚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们要确保在这个上能听得他妈的一清二楚。

Key.Original: Now, our combat team's coming in here, and here.
Key.Chinese: 目前我軍作戰小隊正前往這裡、和這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们的战斗队到了，在这里，还有这里。

Key.Original: I know you were expecting an amphibious assault.
Key.Chinese: 我知道你們以為是兩棲作戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你期待一场两栖攻击。

Key.Original: But, with last-minute reports of a CSAT sub lurking somewhere off the coast, higher shit-canned the plan and left us with this.
Key.Chinese: 但是，最新收到的消息指出有艘廣協同盟潛水艇在海岸某處出沒，上級臨時喊停作戰計畫，把爛攤子留給我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，最后的报告说广协同盟的潜艇潜伏在海岸附近的某个地方，指挥部他妈的放弃了计划，留给了我们这个。

Key.Original: So.
Key.Chinese: 那麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以。

Key.Original: Take a good look at that terrain... can't do what we did on Malden, driving off in the wrong direction.
Key.Chinese: 你好好看清楚地形...不能再像馬爾登島那次跑錯方向。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好好看看那个地形...不能像在马尔登岛那样搞错了进攻方向。

Key.Original: Sarge...?
This is enemy territory and we definitely don't want to end up lost.
Key.Chinese: 這是敵方領土，我們絕對不能迷路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是敌军领土，我们绝不想最后在这里送命。

Key.Original: Our LZ is this one, Mustang. Captain Drabble's over on Blazer...
Key.Chinese: 我們的降落區是這裡，"野馬"點。德拉布上尉他們是在布雷澤點...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的着陆区是这一个，"野马"点。德拉布上尉在那边，在布雷泽...

Key.Original: Together, we'll converge on Chalkeia, which must fall within an hour of our landing.
Key.Chinese: 兩隊要在哈爾基亞會合，必須在降落後一小時內完成。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将共同在哈尔基亚集合，这必须在着陆后一小时内完成。

Key.Original: That's not a lot of time.
Key.Chinese: 時間不多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有太多时间。

Key.Original: The idea is to move fast and gain a foothold.
Key.Chinese: 重點是快速行動，設法站穩腳步。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的想法是快速移动并站稳脚跟。

Key.Original: A second front here, close to Pyrgos, will leave the AAF no choice.
Key.Chinese: 在皮爾戈斯附近拉起第二陣線，不留給阿爾蒂斯武裝力量任何餘地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在皮尔戈斯附近的第二战场，将让阿尔蒂斯武装力量别无选择。

Key.Original: They will have to weaken their grip on the main airport.
Key.Chinese: 這樣他們勢必調走主機場的部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们将不得不减弱对主机场的控制。

Key.Original: Before that though, we'll be facing armor from the capital itself - and by we, I mean -
Key.Chinese: 但在那之前，我們會碰上從首都來襲的裝甲部隊-這裡的"我們"，我是指-
Key.Chinesesimp: 但在那之前，我们将面对来自首都的装甲力量-而且依靠我们，我是说-

Key.Original: Copy that, be ready in one.
Key.Chinese: 收到，再一分鐘就好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，将在一分钟内做好准备。

Key.Original: No - by we, I mean our boys already on the ground.
Key.Chinese: 不-這裡的"我們"，我指的是我們的特種部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不-依靠我们，我是说我们已经在现场的伙计们。

Key.Original: Clear ramp.
Key.Chinese: 放下跳板。
Key.Chinesesimp: 卸下坡道上的货物。

Key.Original: Touching down in two mikes, time to mount up back there.
Key.Chinese: 兩分鐘內降落，你們該去準備了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在两分钟内降落，该上来回去了。

Key.Original: Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! This is Condor Four One - we're hit! Engine one is out, going down.
Key.Chinese: 塔臺!塔臺!塔臺!這是"禿鷹"4-1-我們被擊中了!一號引擎失靈，即將墜毀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 求救!求救!求救!我是"秃鹫4-1"-我们被击中了!一号发动机发生故障，要坠毁了。

Key.Original: Special forces, blocking approaches here and -
Key.Chinese: 他們已經在戰場上阻擋敵方接近，這裡還有-
Key.Chinesesimp: 阻止逼近这里的特种部队-

Key.Original: The fuck?
Key.Chinese: 搞屁啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么飞机?

Container.name: 037_ex_player_wounded
Container.situation: the player is wounded.

Key.Original: Argh! Fuck, fuck.
Key.Chinese: 呃!幹幹幹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊!妈的，妈的。

Container.name: 036_ex_wounded_soldier_killed
Container.situation: the player returns to the medic, with or without the medkit. the wounded soldier is dead.

Key.Original: What? I thought he was out cold...?
Key.Chinese: 什麼?我以為他是失去意識...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么?我还以为他昏迷了...?

Key.Original: Shit. But you're right, we gotta be out of here.
Key.Chinese: 可惡。但你是對的，我們必須離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕。但你说的对，我们必须离开这里。

Key.Original: Come on, nothing we can do.
Key.Chinese: 走吧，沒什麼能做的了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 得了吧，我们无能为力了。

Key.Original: He was - only now he's not.
Key.Chinese: 他之前是沒意識-但現在是沒氣了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的-只是现在不是了。

Container.name: 035_am_aaf_sniper_team_out
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets. to follow am_aaf_sniper_team_target_a or am_aaf_sniper_team_target_b or am_aaf_sniper_team_target_c.

Key.Original: Send it.
Key.Chinese: 開槍吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 发射。

Key.Original: Ready.
Key.Chinese: 準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备就绪。

Container.name: 034_am_aaf_sniper_team_target_c
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets. to follow am_aaf_sniper_team_contact.

Key.Original: That's your target.
Key.Chinese: 他在你的攻擊範圍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是你的目标。

Key.Original: Five hundred and thirty metres.
Key.Chinese: 五三洞公尺外。

Key.Original: Officer. Static - going prone. He's firing.
Key.Chinese: 軍官。靜止-他現在臥倒了。正在開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 军官。静止不动-卧姿。他在开火。

Key.Original: One quarter value.
Key.Chinese: 四分之一。
Key.Chinesesimp: 四分之一值。

Key.Original: Range it.
Key.Chinese: 告訴我距離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞄准。

Key.Original: Check level, holdover - three point nine.
Key.Chinese: 確認水平，彈道補償-三點九。
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查水平高度，保持-三点九。

Key.Original: One point one six.
Key.Chinese: 么點么六。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一点一六。

Container.name: 033_am_aaf_sniper_team_target_b
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets. to follow am_aaf_sniper_team_contact.

Key.Original: Got him...
Key.Chinese: 看見了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到他了...

Key.Original: Still one quarter value.
Key.Chinese: 一樣，四分之一。
Key.Chinesesimp: 仍为四分之一值。

Key.Original: AT soldier. Static - by the rock...
Key.Chinese: 反坦克士兵。靜止-在石頭旁邊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 反坦克手。站着不动-靠着岩石...

Key.Original: Holdover - seven point eight.
Key.Chinese: 彈道補償-七點八。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持-七点八。

Key.Original: One point four one.
Key.Chinese: 么點四么。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一点四一。

Container.name: 032_am_aaf_sniper_team_target_a
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets. to follow am_aaf_sniper_team_contact.

Key.Original: Observed.
Key.Chinese: 看見了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到了。

Key.Original: Holdover, five point five.
Key.Chinese: 彈道補償，五點五。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持，五点五。

Key.Original: Rifleman, he's crouching...
Key.Chinese: 步槍兵，他蹲著...
Key.Chinesesimp: 步枪手，他在蹲着...

Key.Original: One point seven nine.
Key.Chinese: 么點七九。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一点七九。

Container.name: 031_am_aaf_sniper_team_contact
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets. to follow either am_aaf_sniper_team_in_a, am_aaf_sniper_team_in_b, or am_aaf_sniper_team_b.

Key.Original: Target.
Key.Chinese: 目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标。

Container.name: 030_am_aaf_sniper_team_in_c
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets.

Key.Original: Again, sector Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 一樣，"Alpha"分區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 又是防区"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: One o'clock, eleven mils.
Key.Chinese: 1點鐘方位，11密位。

Container.name: 029_am_aaf_sniper_team_in_b
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets.

Key.Original: Sector Alpha.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"分區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 防区"阿尔法"。

Key.Original: Go to the twelve o'clock, ten mils.
Key.Chinese: 12點方位，10密位。
Key.Chinesesimp: 定位到12点，10密位。

Container.name: 028_am_aaf_sniper_team_in_a
Container.situation: an aaf sniper team speak together and call out targets.

Key.Original: Okay, sector Delta.
Key.Chinese: 好，"Delta"分區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，防区"德尔塔"。

Key.Original: Three o'clock, four mils.
Key.Chinese: 3點鐘方向，4密位。
Key.Chinesesimp: 3点，4密位。

Container.name: 027_ta_regroup_defended_fail
Container.situation: the regoup point is overrun by the enemy. mission ends, unsuccessfully.

Key.Original: Guardian, it's November Actual.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"，這是"十一月"隊長。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"，我是"十一月"领队。

Key.Original: I don't know how much longer we can hold here!
Key.Chinese: 我們撐不久了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道我们还能在这里坚持多久!

Key.Original: Are you saying we should surrender, sir? Over.
Key.Chinese: 你是說，讓我們投降嗎，長官?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是说我们应该投降吗，长官?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Message received, Lieutenant. You've got nowhere to retreat to...
Key.Chinese: 收到訊息，少尉。你們已經退無可退了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，中尉。你无路可退了...

Key.Original: Affirmative. It's all you can do...
Key.Chinese: 肯定。也只能這樣了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。这是你唯一能做的事情...

Container.name: 026_ta_regroup_defended
Container.situation: the regoup point is successfully defended and the enemy retreats. mission ends.

Key.Original: Great job... that's bought us a bit of time.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好...好歹爭取了一點時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮...这为我们赢得了一点时间。

Key.Original: Once Oscar and Pariah arrive, we'll assess our options. Perhaps, we can still turn this around. Out.
Key.Chinese: 等"奧斯卡"和"賤民"也到了，我們就評估狀況。或許還有機會扭轉戰局。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在"奥斯卡"和"贱民"到达之后，我们将对我们的选择进行评估。也许，我们仍然可以扭转这个局面。完毕。

Container.name: 025_ta_regroup_point_out_mortar
Container.situation: player is assigned defence task at the regroup point and has salvaged the mortar. to follow ta_regroup_point_out if applicable.

Key.Original: Oh, and, uh, I got you that mortar.
Key.Chinese: 哦，對了，嗯，我把迫擊砲帶來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，呃，我给你带来了那个迫击炮。

Key.Original: Thank god for small mercies, right?
Key.Chinese: 感謝老天大發慈悲，你說對吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢上帝的仁慈，对吧?

Container.name: 024_ta_regroup_point_out
Container.situation: player is assigned defence task at the regroup point.

Key.Original: You see the chapel?
Key.Chinese: 你看見教堂了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你看到小教堂了吗?

Key.Original: That's our last line of defence, we can't let the AAF take it.
Key.Chinese: 教堂是我們的最後防線，絕對不能落入阿爾蒂斯武裝力量手裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是我们的最后一道防线，不能让阿尔蒂斯武装力量攻破。

Key.Original: There's some ammo boxes up there...
Key.Chinese: 那裡有一些彈藥箱...
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里有些弹药箱...

Container.name: 023_ta_regroup_point_group
Container.situation: player and his group are assigned the defence task at the regroup point.

Key.Original: Barklem, sir, yeah - where you want us.
Key.Chinese: 我叫巴克勒姆，長官，是-遵命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是巴克勒姆，长官，是的-你想让我们去哪儿。

Key.Original: Okay, well, with Romeo, on the hill behind me.
Key.Chinese: 好，呃，你跟著Romeo，在我身後的山丘上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，嗯，和"罗密欧"一起，在我身后的山上。

Container.name: 022_ta_regroup_point
Container.situation: player is assigned defence task at the regroup point.

Key.Original: Barklem, sir, yeah.
Key.Chinese: 我叫巴克勒姆，長官，是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是巴克勒姆，长官，是的。

Key.Original: Okay, well, you're not injured, you can join the rest of November. They're on the hill behind me.
Key.Chinese: 好，嗯，你沒受傷，你去加入"十一月"。他們在我身後的山丘上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，嗯，你没受伤，你可以加入"十一月"的余部。他们在我身后的山上。

Container.name: 021_ta_regroup_point_in
Container.situation: player is assigned defence task at the regroup point.

Key.Original: Corporal Barker...?
Key.Chinese: 你是巴克爾下士...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克尔下士...?

Container.name: 020_am_oscar_late
Container.situation: oscar squad report in to hq and explain they are on their way to the erv.

Key.Original: Copy, Oscar, you have an ETA?
Key.Chinese: 收到，"奧斯卡"，你預計多久能到?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"奥斯卡"，你有预计到达时间吗?

Key.Original: Oscar...? Words twice!
Key.Chinese: "奧斯卡"...?再說一次!
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥斯卡"...?再说一遍!

Key.Original: Oscar to November Actual, we're coming to you... we're about half a klick from Point Superior. Over.
Key.Chinese: "奧斯卡"呼叫"十一月"隊長，我們正往你那邊過去...目前距離蘇必利爾點大概半公里。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "奥斯卡"呼叫"十一月"领队，我们正往你这边来...我们距离苏必利尔点约零点五千米。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Ten mikes, give or take... we gotta lotta wounded here, it's slowing us down, we can't...
Key.Chinese: 10分鐘，大概吧...有不少弟兄身上有傷，走得不快，我們不能...
Key.Chinesesimp: 10分钟左右...我们这里有大量的伤员拖后腿，我们不能...

Key.Original: Rest assured, we'll be there, don't move on without us. Out.
Key.Chinese: 放心，我們會過去的，別丟下我們離開。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放心，我们会到那里的，我们没到不要继续前进。完毕。

Container.name: 019_am_regroup_point_under_fire_a
Container.situation: the emergency rendezvous point comes under fire.

Key.Original: All units, this is November Actual.
Key.Chinese: 各單位注意，這是"十一月"隊長。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单元，我是"十一月"领队。

Key.Original: Repair to the Surf Club, immediately.
Key.Chinese: 撤回衝浪俱樂部，立刻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退到冲浪俱乐部，马上。

Key.Original: The AAF are attacking our position!
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量正在攻擊這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯武装力量正在攻击我们的阵地!

Container.name: 018_eve_mortar_secured_in
Container.situation: player acquires the mortar.

Key.Original: Sierra One-Four to November, Lieutenant Collins... I've got that mortar.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉1-4"呼叫"十一月"，柯林斯少尉...我找到迫擊砲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉1-4"呼叫"十一月"，柯林斯少尉...我拿到那门迫击炮了。

Key.Original: Thing weighs a ton. Over.
Key.Chinese: 重得要命。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 东西很重。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Copy, nice work! Hump it back here. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，幹得好!把它扛過來。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得漂亮!把它运回这里。完毕。

Container.name: 017_ta_mortar_needed
Container.situation: player learns about a mortar being needed.

Key.Original: Sierra Actual, report! Where's that mortar? Over.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"隊長，回報!迫擊砲在哪?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"队长，请报告!那个迫击炮在哪里?完毕。

Key.Original: Sierra Actual this is November Actual, what's your status...?
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"隊長，這是"十一月"隊長，你那邊狀況如何...?
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"队长，我是"十一月"领队，你现在什么状态...?

Key.Original: Sergeant Ramírez, key the radio if you can't talk, over.
Key.Chinese: 拉米瑞茲中士，如果不能回答，請按通話鈕，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拉米瑞兹中士，如果你说不了话，请按通话键，完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: All troops in combat, if anyone can get to grid, uh... wait.
Key.Chinese: 所有部隊注意，如果有人能前往方格坐標，呃...等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有战斗部队，如果有人能去坐标，嗯...等一下。

Key.Original: Grid 212-102, see if you can locate our mortar, we need it here, at the ERV. Out.
Key.Chinese: 方格坐標212-102，請試著找回我們的迫擊砲，把它帶到緊急集合點。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坐标212-102，看看能不能找到我们的迫击炮，我们这里需要它，在紧急会合点。

Container.name: 016_ta_recon_position
Container.situation: player reaches the recon group.

Key.Original: No, sir!
Key.Chinese: 不是，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，长官!

Key.Original: Hey! You it?
Key.Chinese: 喂!就剩你嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，就你一个人?

Key.Original: Shit - I guess November didn't send you then...?
Key.Chinese: 可惡-你不是"十一月"派來的吧...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 狗屁-我想"十一月"并没派你...?

Key.Original: Motherfucker!
Key.Chinese: 幹你老母!
Key.Chinesesimp: 混账东西!

Key.Original: Go, get behind some cover, we gotta make a stand.
Key.Chinese: 快，快去找好掩護，我們必須抵抗到底。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去，掩护起来，我们必须停下来抵抗。

Container.name: 015_eve_equipment_needed
Container.situation: player is told they need to gather up any equipment they can find and bring it to the emergency rv.

Key.Original: Sierra One-Four to November, do you read me?
Key.Chinese: "塞拉1-4"呼叫"十一月"，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉1-4"呼叫"十一月"，你收到了吗?

Key.Original: It's Corporal Louis Barklem.
Key.Chinese: 我是路易斯·巴克勒姆下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是路易斯·巴克勒姆下士。

Key.Original: No such luck, sir. It's FUBAR - our Blackfish went down, hard. No other survivors...
Key.Chinese: 沒這麼好運，長官。那臺車已經壞到沒法修-我們的"黑魚"墜毀了，受損很嚴重。沒有其他生還者了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 没那么走运，长官。它已经面目全非-我们的"黑鱼"坠毁了，硬着陆。没有其他幸存者...

Key.Original: Roger, we're receiving! Tell me you have your APC!
Key.Chinese: 收到，我在聽!告訴我你們的裝甲運兵車還在!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们正在接收!告诉我你的装甲输送车还在!

Key.Original: Copy - linkup with us.
Key.Chinese: 收到-你和我們會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到-与我们会合。

Key.Original: If you come across weapons or gear, bring them with you, out.
Key.Chinese: 如果碰上任何武器或裝備，就一起帶過來，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果发现武器或装备，带上它们，完毕。

Container.name: 014_am_pariah_argument
Container.situation: special forces team report in, then argue with the commanding lieutenant.

Key.Original: Negative, Pariah - fall back to the emergency rendezvous point.
Key.Chinese: 否定，"賤民"-你退回緊急集合點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，"贱民"-撤退到紧急会合点。

Key.Original: That's grid 213-2 -
Pariah to November Actual, we're at Point Erie. It's, uh, getting kinda lively here.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"呼叫"十一月"隊長，我們在伊利點。這裡的狀況，嗯，相當激烈。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"呼叫"十一月"领队，我们在伊利点。这里，嗯，战斗相当激烈。

Key.Original: Could do with some support. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請求支援。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 需要一些支援。完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Point Erie and not where I'm asking you to be... over.
Key.Chinese: 伊利點不是我下達的地點...完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伊利点，不在我要你们去的地方...完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Goddamn it, Pariah! I am giving you a direct order.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，"賤民"!這是直接命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，"贱民"!我给你下一道直接命令。

Key.Original: I know where the ERV is, Lieutenant! The question is, do you know where we are?
Key.Chinese: 我知道緊急集合點在哪，少尉!問題是，你知道我們在哪嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道紧急会合点在哪儿，少尉!问题是，你知道我们在哪里吗?

Key.Original: Negative! Retreat to the designated co-ordinates. I am not going to ask you again.
Key.Chinese: 否定!退到指定坐標。我不會再說第二次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退到指定的坐标。我不会再问你了。

Key.Original: If we go, your left flank goes too.
Key.Chinese: 我們要是離開這裡，左翼也沒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们走了，你的左翼也没了。

Key.Original: And who the hell's gonna block this MSR, if we're - fuck - if we're not here?
Key.Chinese: 要是我們-幹-要是我們離開這裡，誰要來守著主要補給路線?
Key.Chinesesimp: 究竟谁来封锁这条主要补给线，如果我们-他妈的-如果我们不在这里?

Key.Original: Respond. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請回話。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请回复。完毕。

Key.Original: Okay, wilco with that! Just send us some guys first.
Key.Chinese: 好啦，遵命!先派一些人給我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，遵命!先给我们派几个人。

Key.Original: Sergeant Sturrock...?
Key.Chinese: 斯塔羅克中士...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔罗克中士...?

Key.Original: Pariah - how copy...? Over.
Key.Chinese: "賤民"-你收到沒...?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "贱民"-收到了吗...?完毕，请回复。

Container.name: 013_ta_contact_reestablished
Container.situation: all callsigns are contacted by the senior officer in the field.

Key.Original: Affirmative, two by three, sir, the signal's weak, but, uh, we can hear you.
Key.Chinese: 肯定，聲音不太清晰，長官，訊號不夠強，但是，呃，我們聽得見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，2乘3，长官，信号很弱，但是，嗯，我们能听见。

Key.Original: We're at the emergency rendezvous point at grid 213-104 - the Surf Club.
Key.Chinese: 我們目前在坐標213-104的緊急撤出點-衝浪俱樂部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在紧急会合点，坐标213-104-冲浪俱乐部。

Key.Original: Guardian to November Actual, do you copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "守護者"呼叫"十一月"隊長，你收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"呼叫"十一月"领队，你收到了吗?完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Quebec never landed, and Sierra are scattered... I - I don't know about Oscar and Papa. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我軍並未降落在"魁北克"點，"塞拉"剩下幾位弟兄而已...我-我不清楚"奧斯卡"和"帕帕"的狀況。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "魁北克"从未着陆，"塞拉"被击溃了...我-我不知道"奥斯卡"和"帕帕"的情况。完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, we'll, uh, reassemble and... reassess, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們會，呃，重新整隊並...重新評估狀況，結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们会，嗯，重新集合并...重新评估，完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns, November. Lieutenant Collins.
Key.Chinese: 各呼號注意，這是"十一月"。我是柯林斯少尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 全体呼号，我是"十一月"。柯林斯少尉。

Key.Original: Copy, Papa's VTOL didn't make it so don't expect much company.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"帕帕"的垂直升降飛行器沒撐過攻擊，別期待太高。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"帕帕"的垂直起降飞机没有及时到达，所以你不要期待会有很多人陪你。

Key.Original: You may be a Third Lieutenant, but you're in charge now.
Key.Chinese: 雖然你只是個少尉，但現在由你帶隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可能连个少尉都算不上，但现在你是负责人。

Key.Original: Everyone, move towards the ERV.
Key.Chinese: 各位，開始往緊急會合點移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人，向紧急会合点进发。

Key.Original: So, again, that's at, uh, grid, uh, grid reference 213-104. Out.
Key.Chinese: 再說一次，位置是在，呃，方格，嗯，方格坐標213-104。結束通話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一遍，位于，嗯，坐标，嗯，坐标参照213-104。完毕。

Container.name: 012_ta_wounded_soldier_revived
Container.situation: player gives the medical kit to the medic.

Key.Original: This what you're after?
Key.Chinese: 你就是在找這個?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是你要的东西吗?

Key.Original: Holy shit!
Key.Chinese: 我操!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊!

Key.Original: He's a regular lazarus man!
Key.Chinese: 他只是個會用槍的普通人啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他简直是能起死回生啊!

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。

Key.Original: Okay...
Key.Chinese: 好吧...

Key.Original: Come on, we gotta be outta here.
Key.Chinese: 走吧，我們必須離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快点，我们得离开这里了。

Key.Original: Easy...
Key.Chinese: 小心點...
Key.Chinesesimp: 放松...

Key.Original: Spades, you good...?
Key.Chinese: 黑鬼，你還好嗎...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 黑鬼，你没事吧...?

Container.name: 011_eve_medic_interrupted
Container.situation: medic is interrupted by the enemy while speaking.

Key.Original: Contact! Get down!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!趴下!
Key.Chinesesimp: 交火!趴下!

Container.name: 010_ta_medic_found
Container.situation: player finds a fellow survivor and is asked to fetch a medical kit.

Key.Original: Hey!
Key.Chinese: 喂!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿!

Key.Original: Shit, what happened?
Key.Chinese: 可惡，發生什麼事了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，怎么了?

Key.Original: He shot?
Key.Chinese: 他中彈了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他被枪打中了?

Key.Original: Sure, gimme a sec, doc.
Key.Chinese: 好，給我一秒鐘，醫生。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题，等我一下，医生。

Key.Original: I need a needle and adrenaline, get me a medkit, now.
Key.Chinese: 我需要針筒和腎上腺素，把急救箱給我，立刻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我需要针和肾上腺素，给我拿个医药包，马上。

Key.Original: He's unconscious.
Key.Chinese: 他失去意識了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他昏迷了。

Container.name: 009_eve_pilot_interrupted
Container.situation: pilot is interrupted by the enemy while speaking.

Key.Original: Shit! Get to cover!
Key.Chinese: 可惡!找掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死!掩蔽!

Container.name: 008_ta_pilot_checked_out
Container.situation: player / player's group and pilot leave the scene.

Key.Original: North somewhere. I dunno, there's a problem with my radio.
Key.Chinese: 在北邊某處吧。我不知道，我的無線電出了問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北部的某个地方。我不知道，我的无线电出问题了。

Key.Original: Fuck.
Key.Chinese: 幹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的。

Key.Original: Alright, uh, where's the regroup point?
Key.Chinese: 好吧，呃，會合點在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，嗯，重新集结点在哪儿?

Key.Original: Yeah, same here. Must be electromagnetic interference caused by those turbines over there.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我也一樣。一定是被那些風力機的電磁干擾了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一是的，我也一样。一定是那边的涡轮机引起的电磁干扰。

Key.Original: Totally screwed my radar on the way in, too.
Key.Chinese: 我來的時候雷達也完全失去作用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的雷达接收也完全崩溃了。

Container.name: 007_ta_pilot_checked_medic
Container.situation: player finishes checking the pilot's wounded comrade and medic is present.

Key.Original: I am and he's right.
Key.Chinese: 我是醫生，但他說得沒錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是，他没事。

Container.name: 006_ta_pilot_checked_alone
Container.situation: player finishes checking the pilot's wounded comrade.

Key.Original: No, I'm not.
Key.Chinese: 不，我不是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，我不是。

Key.Original: And that's straight up, I'm sorry.
Key.Chinese: 但這是事實，抱歉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但那是真的，我很抱歉。

Container.name: 005_ta_pilot_checked
Container.situation: player checks the pilot's wounded comrade.

Key.Original: It's bad - like, real bad. He's not gonna make it.
Key.Chinese: 看來不妙-非常嚴重。他撐不住的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 伤的很重-嗯，真的很严重。他撑不住的。

Key.Original: Hey! You a doctor, asshole?
Key.Chinese: 喂!你是醫生嗎，混球?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你是医生吗，混蛋?

Container.name: 004_ta_pilot_found
Container.situation: player finds a fellow survivor.

Key.Original: You the guy on the radio?
Key.Chinese: 你就是無線電裡那個人嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是无线电里的那个人吗?

Key.Original: Is he...?
Key.Chinese: 他是不是...?

Key.Original: Hey, over here!
Key.Chinese: 欸，我們在這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，在这边!

Key.Original: Jesus...
Key.Chinese: 天啊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊...

Key.Original: They're not taking any prisoners...
Key.Chinese: 敵人連點活口也不留...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们不接纳任何战俘...

Key.Original: Okay, let me take a look.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，我來看看。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，让我看看。

Key.Original: One of them, maybe.
Key.Chinese: 我可能是其中一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 其中之一，也许。

Key.Original: No. I, uh, I got a pulse, but...
Key.Chinese: 他沒死，我、呃，我有摸到脈搏，但是...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不。我，嗯，我摸到脉搏了，但是...

Container.name: 003_am_pilot_chatter
Container.situation: ambient conversation between pilot and player. to follow soon after int_crash_site.

Key.Original: Firebrand?
Key.Chinese: "火把"?
Key.Chinesesimp: "火把"?

Key.Original: Firebrand!
Key.Chinese: "火把"!
Key.Chinesesimp: "火把"!

Key.Original: Sierra One-Four... relay to address group: Guardian.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫"塞拉1-4"...消息轉述給團隊:"Guardian"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉1-4"...接力给呼号:"守护者"。

Key.Original: Firebrand's moving north to the ERV at -
Key.Chinese: "火把"正往北移動，前往緊急集合點，位置在-
Key.Chinesesimp: "火把"正向北朝着紧急会合点进发-

Container.name: 002_int_crash_site
Container.situation: player regains consciousness at the crash site of their aircraft.

Key.Original: Argh...
Fuck...
Key.Chinesesimp: 妈的...

Key.Original: Fuck...
Key.Chinesesimp: 妈的...

Key.Original: Bowker...?
Key.Chinese: 鮑克爾...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 鲍克尔...?

Key.Original: Hawkes...?
Key.Chinese: 哈克斯...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈克斯...?

Key.Original: Okay...
Key.Chinese: 好吧...

Key.Original: Sierra One-Four to unknown station, say again your last.
Key.Chinese: "塞拉1-4"呼叫未知頻道，請重複最新訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉1-4"呼叫未知电台，最后一句话再说一遍。

Key.Original: Any callsign... helo's down... Over.
Key.Chinese: 任何呼號，...直升機被擊落...完畢，請回復。
Key.Chinesesimp: 任何呼号，...直升机被击落...完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Sierra One-Four to unknown station, come in!
Key.Chinese: "塞拉1"-4呼叫未知頻道，請重複最新訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉1"-4呼叫未知电台，接入!

Key.Original: Nothing heard! Over.
Key.Chinese: 什麼也沒聽見!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么都听不到!完毕，请回复。

Key.Original: Sierra Actual, it's Barklem, do you copy?
Key.Chinese: "塞拉"隊長，這是巴克勒姆，你收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "塞拉"队长，我是巴克勒姆，你收到了吗?

Key.Original: After Action Report unlocked.
Key.Chinese: 已解開"行動後報告"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 行动后报告已解锁。

Key.Original: Mini-campaign completed, After Action Report unlocked.
Key.Chinese: 已完成小型劇情戰役;已解開"行動後報告"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 迷你战役已完成，行动后报告已解锁。

Key.Original: Complete the mini-campaign to unlock the After Action Report.
Key.Chinese: 想解開"行動後報告"，請先完成小型劇情戰役。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完成迷你战役来解锁行动后报告。

Key.Original: Watch After Action Report
Key.Chinese: 查看"行動後報告"
Key.Chinesesimp: 看行动后报告

Key.Original: Cpl. Barklem was transferred into Charlie Company of 1st mechanized battalion and witnessed surrender of Altis Armed forces the next day.
Key.Chinese: 下士巴克勒姆被調往第一機械營"Charlie"連的第二天，他便目睹了阿爾蒂斯武裝力量投降。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克勒姆下士转入第1机械化营的查理连，次日目睹了阿尔蒂斯武装力量的投降。

Key.Original: %1 injured soldiers gathered at the emergency rendezvous point were evacuated and survived the war.
Key.Chinese: 緊急集合點共有%1名負傷士兵被撤出，撐過這次戰鬥。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1名在紧急会合点聚集的受伤士兵已撤离，并在战争中存活下来。

Key.Original: From %1 injured soldiers gathered at the emergency rendezvous captured by AAF, only %2 survived.
Key.Chinese: 緊急集合點被阿爾蒂斯武裝力量佔領後，該處的%1名負傷士兵，只存活了%2名。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在阿尔蒂斯武装力量夺取的紧急会合点聚集的%1名受伤士兵中，只有%2名存活下来。

Key.Original: Lt. Collins was promoted to 1st Lieutenant (in memoriam). Sgt. Sturrock was (posthumously) awarded Bronze Star for heroic achievements in the operation.
Key.Chinese: 柯林斯少尉被提拔為中尉(追封)。死去的斯塔羅克中士獲頒銅星勳章，以紀念他在行動中的英勇表現。
Key.Chinesesimp: 柯林斯少尉被追晋为中尉。斯塔罗克中士因在该行动计划中的英雄业绩被(追)授青铜星章。

Key.Original: But the operation fulfilled its goal. Deadlock at the airfield was broken. Altis capital, Pyrgos fell that night.
Key.Chinese: 但行動目標達到了。飛行場的局面不再僵持不下。那天晚上，阿爾蒂斯的首都皮爾戈斯就被攻陷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但该行动计划实现了它的目标。机场的僵局已被打破。阿尔蒂斯的首都皮尔戈斯当晚沦陷。

Key.Original: Both sides suffered heavy losses. During the operation, AAF lost %1 men. NATO suffered %2 casualties.
Key.Chinese: 雙方都傷亡慘重。在本次行動中，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量折損%1名士兵。北約折損%2名士兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 双方都损失惨重。在作战期间，阿尔蒂斯武装力量损失了%1名士兵。北约有%2人伤亡。

Key.Original: At %1:%2, after %3 hours of fighting, 21th combat group evacuated from Chalkeia.
Key.Chinese: 作戰%3小時後，第21支戰團在%1:%2時撤出哈爾基亞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在战斗%3小时后，第21战斗群于%1:%2从哈尔基亚撤离。

Key.Original: Chalkeia fell in %1:%2, after %3 hours of fighting into hands of 21th combat group.
Key.Chinese: 作戰%3小時後，哈爾基亞於%1:%2為第21支戰團攻陷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在战斗%3小时后，哈尔基亚于%1:%2落入第21战斗群手中。

Key.Original: Operation Steel Pegasus has just begun...
Key.Chinese: "鋼鐵飛馬"行動才剛開始...
Key.Chinesesimp: "钢铁天马"行动刚刚开始...

Key.Original: FRONT
Key.Chinese: 前方
Key.Chinesesimp: 战场

Key.Original: SECOND
Key.Chinese: 秒
Key.Chinesesimp: 第二

Key.Original: Heading to the east coast of Altis, to open a second front.
Key.Chinese: 前往阿爾蒂斯東方海岸，拉開第二戰線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往阿尔蒂斯的东海岸，开辟第二战场。

Key.Original: ASSAULT
Key.Chinese: 突擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击

Key.Original: AIR
Key.Chinese: 空中
Key.Chinesesimp: 空中

Key.Original: An air assault group is leaving the USS Freedom.
Key.Chinese: 空襲團隊正要從"自由號"出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 空中突击群正在离开美国海军"自由"号。

Key.Original: BACK
Key.Chinese: 後
Key.Chinesesimp: 击

Key.Original: STRIKE
Key.Chinese: 襲擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 反

Key.Original: Now, NATO reinforcements are preparing to strike back.
Key.Chinese: 北約的增援正準備回擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，北约增援部队正准备反击。

Key.Original: ATTACKED
Key.Chinese: 已攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 遭到攻击

Key.Original: PEACEKEEPERS
Key.Chinese: 維和部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 维和部队

Key.Original: Government forces have attacked peacekeepers on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 政府軍已經攻擊了斯特拉蒂斯上的維和部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 政府军攻击了斯特拉蒂斯岛上的维和部队。

Key.Original: Terry Simpson
Key.Chinese: 特里·辛普森
Key.Chinesesimp: 特里·辛普森

Key.Original: Sturrock
Key.Chinese: 斯塔羅克
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯塔罗克

Key.Original: John Sturrock
Key.Chinese: 約翰·斯塔羅克
Key.Chinesesimp: 约翰·斯塔罗克

Key.Original: Adam Grant
Key.Chinese: 亞當·格蘭特
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当·格兰特

Key.Original: Jeremy Collins
Key.Chinese: 傑里米·柯林斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 杰里米·柯林斯

Key.Original: Barklem
Key.Chinese: 巴克勒姆
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴克勒姆

Key.Original: Louis Barklem
Key.Chinese: 路易斯·巴克勒姆
Key.Chinesesimp: 路易斯·巴克勒姆

Key.Original: Proteus
Key.Chinese: 變形蟲
Key.Chinesesimp: 变形虫

Key.Original: Pariah
Key.Chinese: 賤民
Key.Chinesesimp: 贱民

Key.Original: Maverick
Key.Chinese: 幼畜
Key.Chinesesimp: 幼畜

Key.Original: Guardian
Key.Chinese: 守護者
Key.Chinesesimp: 守护者

Key.Original: Firebrand
Key.Chinese: 火把
Key.Chinesesimp: 火把

Key.Original: Haven't played as special forces yet.
Key.Chinese: 尚未扮演過特種部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尚未担任过特种部队。

Key.Original: Played as special forces.
Key.Chinese: 已扮演過特種部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已担任特种部队。

Key.Original: Haven't played as infantry yet.
Key.Chinese: 尚未扮演過步兵部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尚未担任过步兵。

Key.Original: Played as infantry.
Key.Chinese: 已扮演過步兵部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已担任步兵。

Key.Original: Soon after, Altis and Stratis were successfully invaded...
Key.Chinese: 不久之後，對阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯的侵攻便成功了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不久之后，成功入侵阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯...

Key.Original: Despite losing precious time, the US 6th Fleet entered the Mediterranean.
Key.Chinese: 雖然錯失了寶貴時機，但美軍第六艦隊進駐了地中海。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管失去了宝贵的时间，美国第六舰队还是进入了地中海。

Key.Original: But evidence suggested otherwise.
Key.Chinese: 但證據不是這麼回事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但证据却表明是另外的情况。

Key.Original: China denied any direct involvement in hostilities.
Key.Chinese: 中國否認與敵對行動有任何關連。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中国拒绝直接卷入争端。

Key.Original: NATO forces quickly secured the island.
Key.Chinese: 北約部隊快速肅清了全島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约部队迅速夺取了该岛屿。

Key.Original: Having severed logistics, their hold on Malden crumbled.
Key.Chinese: 由於後勤受阻，敵軍失去了對馬爾登島的影響力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在切断后勤补给后，他们对马尔登岛的坚守就崩溃了。

Key.Original: Once Houdan and Dourdan fell, CSAT's Scimitar Regiment surrendered.
Key.Chinese: 我軍拿下胡丹和杜爾丹後，廣協同盟的彎刀軍團便投降了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 胡丹和杜尔丹沦陷后，广协同盟的大弯刀团投降了。

Key.Original: The invasion simply cannot fail.
Key.Chinese: 這次的入侵絕對不能失敗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 入侵不能失败。

Key.Original: SUPERIORITY
Key.Chinese: 優勢
Key.Chinesesimp: 优势

Key.Original: AIR
Key.Chinese: 空中
Key.Chinesesimp: 空中

Key.Original: Air superiority over the Gibraltar Straits must be secured.
Key.Chinese: 但我軍必須掌握對直布羅陀海峽的空中優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 必须取得对直布罗陀海峡的空中优势。

Key.Original: There are no good options.
Key.Chinese: 怎麼盤算都沒有輕鬆拿下的可能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有什么好的选择。

Key.Original: INTERCEDE
Key.Chinese: 調解
Key.Chinesesimp: 干预

Key.Original: NATO
Key.Chinese: 北約
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约

Key.Original: NATO reinforcements, responding to a surprise attack on Stratis, must intercede.
Key.Chinese: 北約援軍為了突襲斯特拉蒂斯，必須出戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对斯特拉蒂斯遭受突袭的事件作出响应的北约增援部队必须出手干预。

Key.Original: CONTROL
Key.Chinese: 控制權
Key.Chinesesimp: 控制

Key.Original: TAKEN
Key.Chinese: 取得
Key.Chinesesimp: 夺取

Key.Original: CSAT have taken control.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟已經取得控制權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协同盟已控制局面。

Key.Original: ISLAND
Key.Chinese: 小島
Key.Chinesesimp: 岛屿

Key.Original: STRATEGIC
Key.Chinese: 戰略性
Key.Chinesesimp: 战略

Key.Original: The strategic island of Malden once again prepares for war.
Key.Chinese: 戰略性小島馬爾登島又再度燃起戰火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战略岛屿马尔登岛再次面临战火。

Key.Original: Stephen Kulansky
Key.Chinese: 史蒂芬·庫蘭斯基
Key.Chinesesimp: 史蒂芬·库兰斯基

Key.Original: Carl Owen
Key.Chinese: 卡爾·歐文
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡尔·欧文

Key.Original: Jared Spender
Key.Chinese: 加列德·斯彭德
Key.Chinesesimp: 加列德·斯彭德

Key.Original: Civilian
Key.Chinese: 平民
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民

Key.Original: Avenger
Key.Chinese: 復仇者
Key.Chinesesimp: 复仇者

Key.Original: YOU COMMITTED A WAR CRIME!
Key.Chinese: 你犯下戰爭罪!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你犯了战争罪!

Key.Original: Haven't played as sniper yet.
Key.Chinese: 尚未扮演過狙擊手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尚未担任过狙击手。

Key.Original: Played as sniper.
Key.Chinese: 已扮演過狙擊手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已担任狙击手。

Key.Original: Haven't played as mechanized infantry yet.
Key.Chinese: 尚未扮演過機械化步兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尚未担任过机械化步兵。

Key.Original: Played as mechanized infantry.
Key.Chinese: 已扮演過機械化步兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已担任机械化步兵。

Key.Original: Haven't played as infantry yet.
Key.Chinese: 尚未扮演過步兵部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尚未担任过步兵。

Key.Original: Played as infantry.
Key.Chinese: 已扮演過步兵部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已担任步兵。

Key.Original: But the peace did not last...
Key.Chinese: 但和平沒有持續多久...
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是和平并没有持续下去...

Key.Original: In 2030, hostilities ended with the signing of a ceasefire in Jerusalem.
Key.Chinese: 2030年在耶路撒冷簽訂的停火協議，使戰爭告一段落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 2030年，战争以在耶路撒冷签署停火协议而告终。

Key.Original: Hundreds were executed. Hundreds more disappeared, without a trace.
Key.Chinese: 上百人被處決。就此失蹤的人更多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 数百人被处死。还有数百人消失得无影无踪。

Key.Original: Acts of repression followed.
Key.Chinese: 隨之而來的是武力鎮壓。
Key.Chinesesimp: 镇压行为接踵而来。

Key.Original: The military might of the rebels prevailed against the rag-tag, People's Army.
Key.Chinese: 叛軍的武力凌駕於人民軍的民兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军的军事力量战胜了鱼龙混杂的人民军。

Key.Original: The tide however, gradually turned against loyalist forces.
Key.Chinese: 然而，情勢並未站在忠於政府者這一邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，形势逐渐开始对政府军不利。

Key.Original: heroically assaulting the town.
Key.Chinese: 他的表現對支持者是一大助力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对城镇发动了英勇的攻击。

Key.Original: Mavros' actions were instrumental for those supporting groups,
Key.Chinese: "馬夫羅斯"如英雄般攻擊城市，
Key.Chinesesimp: "马夫罗斯"的行动对那些支援团队起到了积极的推动作用，

Key.Original: The Battle of Galati was an early victory for the Free Republic.
Key.Chinese: 加拉蒂之戰是自由共和國最早取得的勝利之一。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加拉蒂之战是自由共和国取得的早期胜利。

Key.Original: But neither side intends to honor the terms...
Key.Chinese: 但雙方都沒打算遵守約定...
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是双方都不想执行条款...

Key.Original: A six-day ceasefire's agreed, so humanitarian aid can reach those worst affected.
Key.Chinese: 雙方同意停火六天，讓人道救援物資送達受戰火波及最慘烈的地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为期六天的停火协议已经达成，因此人道主义援助可以到达重灾区。

Key.Original: FIGHTING
Key.Chinese: 作戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 战斗

Key.Original: BRUTAL
Key.Chinese: 野蠻
Key.Chinesesimp: 野蛮

Key.Original: Cities, towns, and villages are ravaged by the brutal fighting.
Key.Chinese: 城市、村莊慘遭猛烈戰火波及。
Key.Chinesesimp: 野蛮的战斗摧毁了城市、乡镇和村庄。

Key.Original: DISOBEY
Key.Chinese: 士兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 违抗

Key.Original: SOLDIERS
Key.Chinese: 違紀
Key.Chinesesimp: 士兵

Key.Original: Hundreds of soldiers disobey their orders and join the people, sparking civil war.
Key.Chinese: 數以百計的士兵違紀加入民眾，掀起內戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 数百名士兵违背命令，加入人民，引发了内战。

Key.Original: Support for the army wanes.
Key.Chinese: 軍方威信不再。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对军队的支援减少了。

Key.Original: CRUSHED
Key.Chinese: 擊垮
Key.Chinesesimp: 遭到镇压

Key.Original: OPPOSITION
Key.Chinese: 反對者
Key.Chinesesimp: 反对派

Key.Original: Opposition groups are crushed and peaceful protests end in violence.
Key.Chinese: 反對者遭到攻擊，原本的和平抗爭以暴力結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反对派组织遭到镇压，和平抗议以暴力收场。

Key.Original: COUP
Key.Chinese: 政變
Key.Chinesesimp: 政变

Key.Original: MILITARY
Key.Chinese: 軍事
Key.Chinesesimp: 军事

Key.Original: A military coup has toppled the government in Kavala.
Key.Chinese: 軍事政變推翻了卡瓦拉政府。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一场军事政变推翻了卡瓦拉政府。

Key.Original: Altis, 2026.
Key.Chinese: 2026年，阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯，2026。

Key.Original: Possible QRF
Key.Chinese: 潛在的快速反應部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能的快速反应部队

Key.Chinesesimp: 拉米塔

Key.Chinese: 哈里森·斯帕德

Key.Chinese: 以"%1"身分遊玩任務，完成該身分

Key.Chinese: 行動後報告

Key.Chinese: 以"%1"身分遊玩所有任務，完成該身分
Key.Chinesesimp: 以"%1"的身份玩全部任务游戏，完成使命
